K12D0724_H0711:68b-38: sha la za ba mo dang /
K12D0724_H0711:69a-7: du ba'i mtha' can ma dang /

K12D0724_H0711:69a-16: pa gtor ma dang phreng ba nyid sdud par byed

K12D0724_H0711:69b-16: rab 'byams byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gang da

K12D0724_H0711:113a-13: chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa /

K12D0724_H0711:128a-2: pa gnyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung nas nam
K12D0724_H0711:128a-4: me tog gi tshogs chen po 'thor bar byed bzhin pa /
K12D0724_H0711:128a-5: shin tu mdzes pa dag mngon par bri'o //
K12D0724_H0711:128a-6: ras ris de'i khor yug du n'a ga ge sar
K12D0724_H0711:128a-7: la sogs pa'i me tog rab tu bkram pa bri
K12D0724_H0711:128a-8: bar bya ste / ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs gsum lhag par gnas pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:128a-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:128a-11: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:128a-12: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje phyag na rnga yab thogs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:128a-13: sgrub pa po ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs gsum po
K12D0724_H0711:128a-14: rnams gdon mi za bar 'drir gzhug par bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:128a-15: ji ltar 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:128a-16: dbyibs ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du'am /
K12D0724_H0711:128a-17: sgrub pa po ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar bri bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:128a-18: dbus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' gnyis su'ang phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12D0724_H0711:128a-19: kun tu bzang po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gdon mi za bar 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:128a-20: ji ltar rnyed pa'i ras kyi dum bu mtho gang ngam /
K12D0724_H0711:128a-21: khru gang tsam la bdag nyid dam /
K12D0724_H0711:128a-23: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong med pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:128b-0: tshul khrims dang ldan pa @128b pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:128b-1: tshul khrims 'chal ba'ang rung ste ri mo mkhan gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-2: sgrub pa po bdag nyid ni gdon mi za bar sngon spyad pa byas pa /
K12D0724_H0711:128b-3: dad pas byang chub sems bskyed pa gdon mi za
K12D0724_H0711:128b-4: bar 'gyur bas te de ltar na sngags 'grub par
K12D0724_H0711:128b-5: 'gyur gyi / gzhan du sdig pa byed pas nam yang ma yin no //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-6: de ltar dad par gyur pa yis //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-7: sngags kyi lha rnams bsgrub bya zhing //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-8: dad pa de yis gsang sngags rgyal //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-10: gang phyir dad pa theg pa'i mchog /
K12D0724_H0711:128b-12: dad pa med pa'i mi rnams la; ;dkar po'i chos rnams me skye ste //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-13: sa bon me yis tshig pa la //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-14: myu gu sngon po ji bzhin no //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-15: dad dang ldan pa'i mi rnams la //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-17: lha rnams kun dang khyad par du //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-18: gsang sngags rnams ni thams cad ni //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-19: dad pa med na mi 'grub bo //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-20: 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-22: dad dang ldan par brjod pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-24: yid ni byang chub der son pas //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-25: de rnams byang chub pas par 'grub //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-26: gzhan gyis grub par ma gsungs te //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-27: bstan pa 'di las zlog pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-28: ras ris chung dang chen po dang //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-29: par ma yongs su bsgrags pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-30: las rnams thams cad sgrub byed pa //
K12D0724_H0711:128b-31: de ni rab tu bshad par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:129a-1: sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen
K12D0724_H0711:129a-2: po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde las bcom ldan
K12D0724_H0711:129a-3: 'das ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brjes kyi cho
K12D0724_H0711:129a-4: ga las / ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byams lnga pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0724_H0711:129a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas byang chub
K12D0724_H0711:129a-6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0724_H0711:129a-9: khyod kyis sems can de rnams kyi don gyi phyir
K12D0724_H0711:129a-10: bstan pa gang yin pa de rnams ras ris kyi
K12D0724_H0711:129a-11: cho ga rab 'byams bshad pa 'di thabs nyung ngu
K12D0724_H0711:129a-12: nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur te de rnams kyi don
K12D0724_H0711:129a-13: gyi phyir sgrub par byed pa thabs yon tan rgyas
K12D0724_H0711:129a-14: pa rab tu dbye bas rnam par phye ba'am /
K12D0724_H0711:129a-15: rnam par dbye ba de yang dag par mthun par bshad par bya yi /
K12D0724_H0711:129a-16: de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:129a-17: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir bshad par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:129a-18: de nas yang byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0724_H0711:129a-20: bdag cag gis 'byor pa bstan par mdzad cing sngags
K12D0724_H0711:129a-21: kyi spyod pa'i yon tan sgrub pa'i mthu gsal bar
K12D0724_H0711:129a-22: mdzad pa legs par gsungs pa ni legs so //
K12D0724_H0711:129a-24: gang da lta de'i dus la bab par dgongs na
K12D0724_H0711:129a-25: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bka' stsal
K12D0724_H0711:129b-0: du gsol / de nas @129b bcom ldan 'das sh'akya
K12D0724_H0711:129b-1: thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
K12D0724_H0711:129b-2: 'khor la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K12D0724_H0711:129b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas zhal gyi sgo nas /
K12D0724_H0711:129b-8: shel gyi kha dog la sogs pa byung bar gyur to //
K12D0724_H0711:129b-9: 'od zer de byung ma thag tu thams cad dang
K12D0724_H0711:129b-10: ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:129b-11: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K12D0724_H0711:129b-12: kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong bar mdzad nas rgyu
K12D0724_H0711:129b-16: nyi ma 'di ltar mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che
K12D0724_H0711:129b-17: ba de dag gi 'od kyang spa bkong bar mdzad
K12D0724_H0711:129b-18: nas de rnams mi gsal zhing 'od med par gyur
K12D0724_H0711:129b-19: te rnam par snang bar mi 'gyur zhing spa bkong
K12D0724_H0711:129b-20: bar mdzad de nor bu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:129b-23: rin po che'i 'od thams cad med par byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:129b-24: slar yang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i zhal gyi
K12D0724_H0711:129b-26: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K12D0724_H0711:129b-27: po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de
K12D0724_H0711:129b-28: nyid na 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa de stan
K12D0724_H0711:129b-29: las langs nas rings pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das
K12D0724_H0711:129b-30: kyis zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das
K12D0724_H0711:130a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni @130a *//
K12D0724_H0711:130a-1: rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na /
K12D0724_H0711:130a-2: bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags /
K12D0724_H0711:130a-4: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:130a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
K12D0724_H0711:130a-6: chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa
K12D0724_H0711:130a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji skad smras pa de
K12D0724_H0711:130a-11: bzhin du rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi
K12D0724_H0711:130a-14: gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das ma
K12D0724_H0711:130a-15: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa pa'i cho ga rig pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:130a-16: spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa las sgrub par byed
K12D0724_H0711:130a-17: pa'i thabs la yang dag par gzhol ba /
K12D0724_H0711:130a-18: chos kyi sprin la brten cing yang dag par rjes
K12D0724_H0711:130a-19: su 'jug cing rjes su 'brang bar byed par 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:130a-23: gleg bam du bri bar byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:130a-31: ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:130a-32: sil snyan gyi rnam pa'i khyad par ram /
K12D0724_H0711:130a-35: tha na rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgyun tu thob pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:130b-0: spu zing zhes @130b byed pa skye bar byed par 'gyur ba 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:130b-2: nus pa thos nas dga' ba skye bar 'gyur pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:130b-3: rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:130b-4: spyod pa so sor sgrub par 'gyur ba de rnams
K12D0724_H0711:130b-5: ngas bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:130b-6: byang chub tu lung bstan te de rnams thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:130b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su byed par 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:130b-8: // de nyid kyi phyir rgyal ba 'dzum pa mdzad kyi rnam pa gzhan du ma yin no //
K12D0724_H0711:130b-9: dang po re zhig dam tshig mthong ba /
K12D0724_H0711:130b-10: sngon spyad pa rnams byas pa /
K12D0724_H0711:130b-11: mngon par dbang bskur thob pas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la rtsa ba'i rig pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:130b-14: gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzung nas yi ge gcig pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:130b-15: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin yang rung ste dgon pa
K12D0724_H0711:130b-16: chen por song nas lo bdun du bzlas pa bya
K12D0724_H0711:130b-20: 'dab ma bzang zhing sngon spyod pa rnams byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:130b-21: de nas ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te ras ris kyi thu bo zhal nub du phyogs par bzhag nas /
K12D0724_H0711:130b-22: bdag nyid shar du mngon par phyogs te ku sha'i
K12D0724_H0711:130b-23: khres la nye bar 'dug nas padma dkar po dang
K12D0724_H0711:130b-25: gur gum gyis mngon par btags te 'bum phrag gcig bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:131a-3: 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi ras ris kyi 'og nas dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:131a-4: ga bur gyi bdug pa'ang ji ltar 'byor pa bsreg go /
K12D0724_H0711:131a-5: lha'i bu rnams la ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gi mchod pa bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:131a-6: de nas cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi dkar po'i nya 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:131a-7: nya so so la mtshan mo phyed kyi dus kyi
K12D0724_H0711:131a-8: tshe ras ris kyi spyan sngar me thab padma'i rnam
K12D0724_H0711:131a-9: pa lta bu byas nas tsandan dkar po'i shing gi
K12D0724_H0711:131a-10: me sbar te gur gum dang /
K12D0724_H0711:131a-11: ga bur gcig tu byas nas sreg blugs ji ltar
K12D0724_H0711:131a-12: 'byor pas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas te de
K12D0724_H0711:131a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa las 'od
K12D0724_H0711:131a-15: zer byung ste ras ris kyi khor yug tu gcig
K12D0724_H0711:131a-17: de nas sgrub pa po tsandan dang /
K12D0724_H0711:131a-18: gur gum gyis btags pa'i padma dkar po'i me tog gis mchod yon dbul lo //
K12D0724_H0711:131a-19: de nas sgrub pa pos rings pa'i tshul gyis ras ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas /
K12D0724_H0711:131a-21: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12D0724_H0711:131a-22: rang sangs rgyas 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag
K12D0724_H0711:131a-23: btsal nas sngar sgrub pa pos bris pa'i ras mtha'i
K12D0724_H0711:131a-24: phyogs nas 'jigs pa med pas ras ris gzung bar
K12D0724_H0711:131a-25: bya'o // de nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'phur bar
K12D0724_H0711:131b-0: 'gyur te se gol gtogs pa tsam @131b la tshangs
K12D0724_H0711:131b-1: pa'i 'jig rten las 'das te bde ba can gyi
K12D0724_H0711:131b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu gnas par 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:131b-3: bya'o // // gang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
K12D0724_H0711:131b-4: gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang
K12D0724_H0711:131b-5: gi rgyal po de bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la
K12D0724_H0711:131b-6: chos kyang ston par byed pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:131b-7: bskal pa chen po stong du rga ba med pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:131b-8: 'chi ba med par rol par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:131b-9: bris sku gnas pa de nyid du sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0724_H0711:131b-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:131b-11: de rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyang shes so //
K12D0724_H0711:131b-12: zhing stong phrag kyang 'da' bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:131b-13: lus stong phrag ston par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:131b-14: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu du ma yang dag par 'byin par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:131b-15: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:131b-16: nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:131b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg
K12D0724_H0711:131b-18: pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i sde snod bcom
K12D0724_H0711:131b-19: ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen
K12D0724_H0711:131b-20: brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bris sku rab 'byams
K12D0724_H0711:131b-21: las / mchog gi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga las kyi 'bras bu drug pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0724_H0711:131b-22: de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos thams cad dang
K12D0724_H0711:131b-23: ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'dug pa'i lha
K12D0724_H0711:132a-4: las chen po dang bcas pa'i rig pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132a-5: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa'i las kyi cho ga /
K12D0724_H0711:132a-6: sgrub pa po srung ba'i don du gsang ba dam pa mchog gi snying po /
K12D0724_H0711:132a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa rig
K12D0724_H0711:132a-8: pa'i rgyal mo chen mo gang gis bzlas na sngags
K12D0724_H0711:132a-11: 'di ni 'da' bar byed pa ma yin pa'i rig
K12D0724_H0711:132a-12: pa'i rgyal mo byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu'i dbang
K12D0724_H0711:132a-13: phyug kyang rig pa 'dis 'gugs shing dbang du byed
K12D0724_H0711:132a-14: la / yang dag par 'dod par 'gyur bar byed
K12D0724_H0711:132a-15: na de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang
K12D0724_H0711:132a-17: 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams smos ci dgos /
K12D0724_H0711:132a-19: bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa ste 'di ni brtson 'grus che ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:132a-22: rig pa thams cad gcig kho nar sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bshad pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:132a-23: gcig kho na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'jigs pa chen po rnams las mchog tu bshad pa ste /
K12D0724_H0711:132a-25: las chen po thams cad byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-0: don thams cad sgrub @132b pa; bya ba thams cad byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-1: sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-3: sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-4: sngags thams cad so so rdzogs par byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-7: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-8: sngags thams cad kyi gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par gyur pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-11: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-13: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-14: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-17: mah'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-19: t'a re t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-21: 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba dam pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-22: las chen po thams cad byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-23: rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-24: sems can thams cad kyis 'da' bar byed pa ma yin pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-25: 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-26: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bkra shis pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-28: sngags thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-29: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-30: rig pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi dbang phyug /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-31: rnam par sdang ba thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-32: skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:132b-33: bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed de /
K12D0724_H0711:133a-1: ltar rab tu sbyor ba de lta de ltar rab tu byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:133a-2: ma bsgrubs par yang las rnams byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:133a-3: rig pa bzlas nas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:133a-4: gos la mngon par sngags nas gyon na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:133a-5: so shing la mngon par sngags te zos na so nad sel bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:133a-6: ka ra b'i ra dkar po la lan bdun mngon
K12D0724_H0711:133a-7: par sngags nas zos na don du ma gnyer bar
K12D0724_H0711:133a-9: mig gi nad la rgyam tshva phye mar byas pa
K12D0724_H0711:133a-10: la lan bdun mngon par sngags nas mig bkang na
K12D0724_H0711:133a-11: mig nad sel bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:133a-12: rna ba'i nad la glang po che'i rgyab nas 'thon
K12D0724_H0711:133a-13: pa 'brug sgrogs pa na 'byung ba'i tshva dhvi ka
K12D0724_H0711:133a-14: / ka bu ka'i lo mar btums te me chung dus btso bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:133a-15: tshos nas phyir btsos pa byas la chu dro 'jam
K12D0724_H0711:133a-16: la rgyam tshva dang sbyar ba byas nas lan bdun
K12D0724_H0711:133a-17: mngon par sngags te des rna ba dag par byas
K12D0724_H0711:133a-18: te skad cig de nyid la nye bar zhi bar

K12D0724_H0711:139b-16: bya rgod phung po'i ri rgyal du; ;las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:139b-17: rgya mtsho chen po'i brag dang ni //

K12D0724_H0711:140a-0: @140a *// rtag pa kho nar bshang lam la'o //

K12D0724_H0711:140a-11: rtag tu thub pa nyid kyis gsungs //

K12D0724_H0711:140b-20: dga' bas gshin rje'i 'jig rten du //

K12D0724_H0711:142b-18: ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing rab tu spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:142b-20: lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:142b-21: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:142b-22: de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:142b-23: mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:142b-24: de bzhin du dbyig pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:143a-4: mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:143a-5: sa'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par dang /
K12D0724_H0711:143a-9: bzhon pa'i khyad par seng ge dang /
K12D0724_H0711:143a-11: gzig la sogs pa rnams grog mkhar gyi sa dri zhim po'i dri zhim bsres pa las byas pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:143a-17: rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad dang /
K12D0724_H0711:143a-18: rin po che'i bye brag thams cad dang /
K12D0724_H0711:143a-19: rab tu byung ba'i yo byad kyi bye brag thams cad la bgrang phreng dang /
K12D0724_H0711:143a-24: gri la sogs pa rgyal gyi lcags las byas pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:143a-25: gzhan yang gang cung zad sems can gyi yo byad
K12D0724_H0711:143a-26: snod la sogs pa rgyal gyi lcags las byas pa'am
K12D0724_H0711:143a-28: chu klung gi sa las byas pa de thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:143a-29: pa'i rnam lngas bkrus nas mngon par bsang gtor byas
K12D0724_H0711:143a-30: te snga ma bzhin du sbyong ba'i sngags sam /
K12D0724_H0711:143a-31: yi ge gcig pa'i sngags sam /
K12D0724_H0711:143a-32: sngags gzhan gang yang rung ba brgya rtsa brgyad mngon
K12D0724_H0711:143a-33: par bsngags pa byas nas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir
K12D0724_H0711:143a-34: gsungs pa ma gtogs pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rig
K12D0724_H0711:143b-1: ji ltar mngon par dga' bas bdag nyid srung zhing grogs po yongs su bskyab par byas pa /
K12D0724_H0711:143b-2: shin tu gsang thub cing sngags dang /
K12D0724_H0711:143b-4: sngar bstan pa'i gnas su bris sku zhal nub tu bstan la bzhag ste bdag nyid sngar bzhin du'o //
K12D0724_H0711:143b-5: bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas gtso
K12D0724_H0711:143b-6: bor ga bur gyi bdug pa bsregs te sngar bstan
K12D0724_H0711:143b-9: sems can gyi khyad pa rnams sngar bstan pa'i bcos
K12D0724_H0711:143b-10: mar byas la yar ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan
K12D0724_H0711:143b-11: mo rdzas de rnams gang rung blangs te mtshan mo
K12D0724_H0711:143b-12: ji srid du bzlas pa byas na nyi ma 'char
K12D0724_H0711:143b-13: ba'i dus kyi tshe bar skabs 'dir bris sku la
K12D0724_H0711:143b-14: 'od zer gyi phreng ba chen po kun tu mthong
K12D0724_H0711:143b-15: ngo // gal te sgrub pa po bzhon pa'i khyad
K12D0724_H0711:143b-16: par blangs par gyur na de la zhon nas ji
K12D0724_H0711:143b-18: gal te rgyan gyi khyad par ram /
K12D0724_H0711:143b-19: mtshon cha'i khyad par blangs pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:143b-20: bcang pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por
K12D0724_H0711:143b-21: 'gyur ro; ;ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'gro zhing lha'i
K12D0724_H0711:143b-22: lus can nyi ma shar ba dang mtshungs pa 'od
K12D0724_H0711:143b-23: zer chen po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa glog ltar
K12D0724_H0711:143b-24: gsal ba'i sku / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag /
K12D0724_H0711:143b-25: ring du 'tshe zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa /
K12D0724_H0711:143b-26: rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor /
K12D0724_H0711:144a-0: lha'i nor bu rin po che'i gzhal @144a *//
K12D0724_H0711:144a-2: sngar yongs su brtags pa'i sa'i rang bzhin gyi bzhon
K12D0724_H0711:144a-3: pa gang gis grub pa de nyid mthu chen por
K12D0724_H0711:144a-4: 'gyur te de nyid 'di'i bzhon pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144a-5: de nyid 'di'i grogs po ste gzhan gyi sngags kyi
K12D0724_H0711:144a-6: dngos grub bzlog par gyur pa bdag gi sngags kyi
K12D0724_H0711:144a-7: dngos grub kun tu sbyar bar byas pa /
K12D0724_H0711:144a-9: phan par 'dod pa rtag tu rjes su bcings pa /
K12D0724_H0711:144a-12: rin po che'i bye brag dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144a-15: sems can la sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid 'di'i bsrung ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144a-17: sbya ba chen po rtag tu rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:144a-21: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mngon sum du mthong zhing
K12D0724_H0711:144a-22: legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste spyi bor byugs
K12D0724_H0711:144a-23: nas ji srid byang chub snying po rjes su thob
K12D0724_H0711:144a-24: kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad de stobs
K12D0724_H0711:144a-25: bcu po rnams nges par kun nas thob ste mchod
K12D0724_H0711:144a-27: sems can rnams kyis zil gyis mi non pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144a-28: 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro;
K12D0724_H0711:144a-29: ;yang dag pa'i mtha'i rigs rgyan mi gcod pa dang
K12D0724_H0711:144a-32: byang chub sems dpa' nyid du nges pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144b-0: ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur @144b mdor bsdus na las mchog thams cad dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144b-1: gnas mchog la gnas pas ras ris mchog gi spyan
K12D0724_H0711:144b-2: sngar mchod pa mchog la mngon par dga' bas las
K12D0724_H0711:144b-3: mchog gzhan nyid bya'o; ;rig pa 'dzin pa nyid nam
K12D0724_H0711:144b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144b-6: mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144b-7: sa rjes su thob par byed pa nyid dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144b-8: lus 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144b-9: stobs bcu'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144b-10: 'phags pa byams pa mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144b-11: chos bstan pa don yod pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144b-12: sangs rgyas gdung rgyun mi gcod pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144b-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu gnon cing
K12D0724_H0711:144b-14: rjes su thob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang;
K12D0724_H0711:144b-15: chos kyi sprin rnam par 'byor pa la rjes su
K12D0724_H0711:144b-17: nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba med cing bdud
K12D0724_H0711:144b-18: rtsi'i char gyi rgyun gyis rab tu zhi ba nyid
K12D0724_H0711:144b-19: kyi phyir dang / 'jig rten rjes su 'dzin pa
K12D0724_H0711:144b-20: la rab tu 'jug cing nan tan byed pa nyid
K12D0724_H0711:144b-21: kyi phyir dang / kyi phyir dang / de bzhin
K12D0724_H0711:144b-22: gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba nyid kyi phyir
K12D0724_H0711:144b-23: kyi phyir dang / kyi phyir dang / dang /
K12D0724_H0711:144b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung don yod par byed pa
K12D0724_H0711:144b-26: sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rab tu sgom pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
K12D0724_H0711:145a-0: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad @145a *//
K12D0724_H0711:145a-2: 'phags pa nyan thos bdag nyid chen po rnams 'byung
K12D0724_H0711:145a-3: ba nyid kyi phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub
K12D0724_H0711:145a-4: par bya ste sngags kyi mtha' rab 'byams dang ldan
K12D0724_H0711:145a-5: pa ras ris thu bo spyan snga dang nye bar
K12D0724_H0711:145a-7: 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad sngags kyi cho ga dang /
K12D0724_H0711:145a-8: rgyud thams cad du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lam
K12D0724_H0711:145a-9: ste mdor na 'dir rtog pa gzhan du gsungs pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:145a-10: las rnams kyis kyang ras ris kyi rgyal po 'di
K12D0724_H0711:145a-11: bsgrub par bya ste myur du de rnams kyi dngos
K12D0724_H0711:145a-12: grub tu 'gyur te gang ngas bstan pa de dag
K12D0724_H0711:145a-13: gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:145a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg
K12D0724_H0711:145a-15: pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom
K12D0724_H0711:145a-16: ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral ba gyen
K12D0724_H0711:145a-17: brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las /
K12D0724_H0711:145a-18: ras ris mchog gi sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0724_H0711:145a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa slar yang
K12D0724_H0711:145a-20: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas
K12D0724_H0711:145a-21: byang chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa
K12D0724_H0711:145a-23: khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs bar ma yod do //
K12D0724_H0711:145a-24: de mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya yi /
K12D0724_H0711:145a-25: legs par yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:145b-0: de nas yang byang chub @145b sems dpa' sems dpa'
K12D0724_H0711:145b-1: chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan
K12D0724_H0711:145b-4: ston pa 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can; sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa /
K12D0724_H0711:145b-5: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i don dang /
K12D0724_H0711:145b-6: ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas gang
K12D0724_H0711:145b-7: de'i dus la bab par dgongs na de gsung du
K12D0724_H0711:145b-8: gsol / de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:145b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
K12D0724_H0711:145b-10: gzigs dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
K12D0724_H0711:145b-12: sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
K12D0724_H0711:145b-13: dang po re zhig tshul khrims dang /
K12D0724_H0711:145b-15: gtsang sbra'i kun tu spyod pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:145b-21: gang du rab tu gnas pa ste sems can thams
K12D0724_H0711:145b-22: cad kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu dang
K12D0724_H0711:145b-23: bcas shing don med par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:145b-24: sngags thams cad kyi rab tu sbyar ba'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na /
K12D0724_H0711:145b-25: de ngas bshad kyi sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
K12D0724_H0711:145b-26: dang po re zhig rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang /
K12D0724_H0711:145b-27: tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba dang po nyid du yang dag par blangs te /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-0: dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis nye bar bstan pa'i dam tshig @146a *//
K12D0724_H0711:146a-1: la yang dag par rjes su 'jug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:146a-2: khyod kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-3: sngar nges par bstan pa gsal ba /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-4: yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-5: slob dpon du dbang bskur ba thob ba /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-6: khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho ga shes pa /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-15: ha cang mi rgan cing ha cang mi gzhon pa /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-17: bkur sti thams cad la 'dod pa med pa /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-22: rjes su chags pa'i rgyur yang brdzun mi smra na shin tu chung ngu tsam nyid dang /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-24: rmongs pa'i rnam pa lta smos /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-25: dam bcas pa brtan pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-26: 'byung po thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du snying brtse ba dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-30: khyod kyis gsang ba'i rig pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-31: sngags rjes su zlos pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-32: rig pa sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-33: khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par zhugs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-35: yang dag par rjes su 'dzin par byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-36: 'bras bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa /
K12D0724_H0711:146a-37: legs pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:146b-2: nad gang gis las su mi rung ba'i ngang tshul can dang /
K12D0724_H0711:146b-3: rigs che zhing mtho bar rab tu skyes pa zhes pa /
K12D0724_H0711:146b-4: yon tan 'di rnams dang ldan pa ni dkyil 'khor
K12D0724_H0711:146b-5: gyi slob dpon du 'gyur te sgrub pa po'ang de
K12D0724_H0711:146b-6: dang 'dra ba'am / yan lag cung zad ma rdzogs pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:146b-7: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la mchod
K12D0724_H0711:146b-8: pa byas nas 'di la don du gsol ba gdab
K12D0724_H0711:146b-9: par bya ste / slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:146b-11: bcom ldan 'das ma de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig
K12D0724_H0711:146b-12: la rjes su 'jug par 'tshal na bdag cag la
K12D0724_H0711:146b-13: rjes su brtse ba'i don dang /
K12D0724_H0711:146b-14: phan pa'i thugs bskyed nas de slob dpon gyis gsung du gsol //
K12D0724_H0711:146b-15: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar bstan
K12D0724_H0711:146b-16: pa'i cho gas slob ma ji lta ba bzhin rim
K12D0724_H0711:146b-17: gyis brtags nas bzhugs par bya zhing sngar bzhin du
K12D0724_H0711:146b-18: mngon par dbang bskur ba byin nas rig pa dang
K12D0724_H0711:146b-19: / sngags byin la rim pa ji lta bar dam tshig bstan par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:146b-24: las rnams kyang dus ring mo nyid nas yongs su brtags te bsam pa shes nas rgyud dang /
K12D0724_H0711:146b-26: las rnams thams cad bstan par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:146b-27: gzhan du ma yin no zhes pa'i cho ga 'di rab tu bsgrags so //
K12D0724_H0711:147a-1: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la ji ltar nus pas gang gis slob dpon dgyes pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:147a-3: longs spyod kyang dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:147a-4: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:147a-5: bu bzhin du bskyang bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:147a-6: ma bzhin longs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:147a-7: de nas sgrub po des rig pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:147a-8: sngags gang yang rung ba zhig bzung nas mtha' gcig
K12D0724_H0711:147a-9: tu song ste sngar bstan pa'i gnas rgya cher gong
K12D0724_H0711:147a-10: ma bzhin du sbyar bas rig pa la sogs pa
K12D0724_H0711:147a-11: de rnams nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:147a-17: lha bshos dag dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i cho ga
K12D0724_H0711:147a-18: nyid kyis rgyas par byas te spyan drangs nas gdan
K12D0724_H0711:147a-19: phul ba thun mtshams gsum du khrus gsum bya zhing
K12D0724_H0711:147a-20: gos lan gsum brjes te nyi ma so so la
K12D0724_H0711:147a-21: bzlas par bya'o // de la thun mtshams kyi dus
K12D0724_H0711:147a-22: zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i mtha' nas brtsams te
K12D0724_H0711:147a-23: ji srid nyi ma 'char ba'i dus tsam gyi bar
K12D0724_H0711:147a-25: nyi ma gung ni nyi ma shar ba'i mthar dus
K12D0724_H0711:147a-26: tsam gyi tshad kyi mtshams nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nam
K12D0724_H0711:147a-27: mkha' la yang dag par brten pa ni cho ga
K12D0724_H0711:147a-28: shes pas gung gi thun mtshams su shes par bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:147b-0: // @147b nub pa'i dus su'ang lhag ma bzhi cha tsam thun mtshams gsum par brjod par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-1: slob dpon mkhas pa bshes gnyen can //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-2: tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-3: chen po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-4: kun nas brtson 'grus brtan pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-5: sngags dang rgyud sogs yang dag ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-6: bya ba kun la blo gros byed //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-7: phra zhing mkhas la tshad shes pa //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-8: chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-9: spro ba che zhing gzi brjid ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-10: 'jig rten chos la ltos pa med //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-11: thub pa mchog gi chos la dad //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-12: 'jig rten pa rnams dor ba dang //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-13: bzlas pa bya zhing rnam dben byas //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-14: sngon du bsnyen pa rjes brten pa //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sngags shes //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-16: de las gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams mthong //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-17: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs gsang sngags dang //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-18: 'jig rten pa yi rab sbyor shes //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-19: srung ba byas shing mthu brtan pa //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-20: gtsang sbra'i kun spyod la rtag dga'//
K12D0724_H0711:147b-21: sangs rgyas nye bstan lam la ni //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-22: kun nas rjes su 'jug pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-23: gsang sngags rgyal bas gsungs pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-24: gsang sngags zlos la rtag tu brtson //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-25: rtag tu mthong chos 'bras bu dang //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-26: 'jig rten pha rol de bzhin nyid; ;sdig pa kun la 'jigs pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-27: phra mo tsam la 'ang de bzhin no //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-28: gtsang zhing mkhas la le lo med //
K12D0724_H0711:147b-29: yid gzhungs lta na sdug pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-2: de bzhin kho nar rgyal sras dang //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-3: 'jig rten pa yi sngags gang nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-4: rdo rje padma'i rigs dag la'ang //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-5: de la rtag tu ngal bar byas //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-6: gzhung dang bstan bcos don 'dzin pa //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-7: nad med nus pa med min pa //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-8: rga dang nad ni rnam par spangs //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-9: de bzhin ba shes gnyen can sngags grub //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-10: kun nas myur du byed pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-11: mtha' yi ring min zhing de bzhin //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-12: tshangs par spyod cing shes rab che //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-13: khyad par du ni shes pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-15: dpa' zhing dbang bskur thob pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-16: de 'dir byang chub pha rol son //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-17: srid pa zhi bar byed la brtson //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-18: de bzhin nyid du rig sngags byas //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-19: mthu chen 'jig rten shes pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-20: 'gro ba sems can rjes sems pa //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-21: dpa' nyid dang ni rab tu ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-22: sbyin dang 'byung bo phan la dga'//
K12D0724_H0711:148a-23: de bzhin khyad 'phags slob dpon la //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-24: rtag tu gsol ba gdab par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-25: des ni dkyil 'khor bris pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-26: sngags kyi dngos grub ster bar byed //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-27: de nyid kyis ni dbang bskur gyi //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-29: dngos grub 'dod pa'i slob mas kyang //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-30: thub pa bzhin du rtag tu mchod //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-31: de yi gsung ni mi 'gom pa //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-32: slob mas 'bad pas bya ba yin //
K12D0724_H0711:148a-33: ji ltar 'byor cing bdog pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-0: longs spyod de la @148b dbul bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-1: nyung du tsam mam mang yang rung //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-2: gang gi mnyes par 'gyur ba dang //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-3: lus ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu yi phyir //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-4: pha la nor ni ster ba ltar //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-5: de bzhin slob ma chos shes pas //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-6: slob dpon la ni nor dbul bya //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-7: mtha' yi dbang phyug dngos grub thob //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-8: tshe dang de bzhin nad med dang //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-10: slob mas bla ma de mchod na //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-12: lam dang cho ga nyer mthong dang //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-13: bsnyen pa las kyang brten pa las //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-14: de bzhin ri mor byas mchod las //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-16: de bzhin rgyal mchog sras rnams dang //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-17: lha rnams thams cad dgyes par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-18: bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur na //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-19: bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba yi //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-21: sgrub pos ston dang thog mar ni //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-22: dam tshig la ni rjes 'jug bya //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-23: dman rnams de dag mnyam yang rung //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-24: gal te ches mchog gyur pa yang //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-25: rmongs pa'am lhag par khro ba yis //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-26: rtag tu bla ma brnyas mi bya //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-27: des kyang rgyud 'dir de la ni //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-28: man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-29: gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub byin //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-30: 'dis ni ser sna byas pa min //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-31: sngar bstan slob ma de la ni //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-32: man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-33: gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub byin //
K12D0724_H0711:148b-34: lus can zhen pa 'phel byed pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-2: de nyid slob ma nyid bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-3: slob dpon 'am ni slob ma'i rgyur //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-4: phan tshun rjes su 'jug byed pa //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-5: gang du zhen pa'i rgyun skyong pa //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-7: de la sngags ni sbyin par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-8: slob dpon de bzhin slob ma ni //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-9: slob ma bla mar mthong ba la //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-11: gnyis kas dngos grub yang dag 'byor //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-12: de la rtag tu lam nyid dang //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-13: sngags kyi spyod pa rjes bstan bya //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-14: gnyis kas pha dang bur shes pas //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-16: brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-17: rtag tu slob mas bla ma ni //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-18: rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-19: bu ni bdag nyid chen po rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-21: de med mgon med de rnams la //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-22: ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags rnams sbyin //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-23: sems can bkren dang ma ning la'ang //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-24: thams cad la ni khyad par du //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-25: sngags kyi sbyod pa khyad par du //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-26: sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-27: tha ma mchog dang bar ma la //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-28: dus rnams kun tu bya ba'o //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-29: yongs su thob pa'i chos rnams la //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-30: rjes su gzung ba'i rgyun bya'o; ;'gro ba blo gros nges pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-31: 'dod pa rnams la'ang rab sbyin bya //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-32: de phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i sngags //
K12D0724_H0711:149a-33: slob ma nyid kyis blang bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-0: de nyid kyis ni nyer bstan @149b pas; ;lam nyid yin no gzhan du min //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-1: dngos grub 'dod pas gang de la //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-2: pha ni pha rol song ba na //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-3: pha bzhin mgo bos phyag byas te //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-5: de nas 'dir ni song nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-6: mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-7: slong mo slong ba'i rjes 'jug cing //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-8: smra ba bcad de dus gsum bzlas //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-9: de ltar bstan pa nyid du 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-10: ji lta'i lam la rab 'jug pa //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-11: de tshe rnam 'gyur de gcod pa //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-12: khang stong dang ni dgon pa che //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-13: ri bo che dang chu klung ngogs //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-14: gtsang dang ba lang gnas mtsho chen //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-15: rnam dben skye bo sbangs pa bsten //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-16: lha khang dang ni shing drung dang //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-17: mtshan gcig ri ni mthon po dang //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-18: rgya mtsho che 'gram nyams dga' dang //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-19: chu gling ngam ni gling rnams dang //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-20: rnam pa sna tshogs sngar bstan pa'i; ;yul rnams sna tshogs yid 'ong ba //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-21: 'di rnams las kyang phyogs gzhan du //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-22: mnyam par bzhag pas sngags bzlas bya //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-23: grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-24: sngags don nges pa'i rtog ge ba //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-25: ltas ni rnam pa de nyid shes //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-26: dpa' zhing g-yul las rnam rgyal ba //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-27: snying stobs ldan zhing bzod pa can //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-28: dad dang tshul khrims phun tshogs ldan; ;rgyal bas gsungs pa'i yul 'dir ni //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-29: rab bsngags mtshan nyid dang ldan pa //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-30: bzod dang ldan pa'i grogs po yis //
K12D0724_H0711:149b-31: 'bad pa med pa'i nyin gyis ni //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-2: tho rangs mal nas langs nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-3: 'bab chu mtsho chen las byung ba'i //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-4: srog chags med cing dri ma med //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-5: chu de nyid la khrus byas nas //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-6: sa dang ba byung phye ma yis //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-7: sngags shes lus ni dril phyis bya //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-8: de nas sngags kyis sbyang byas pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-9: chu nyid shin tu dri med la //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-10: zlos po brtson pas khrus bya 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-11: ha cang yun ring khrus mi bya //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-12: de nas langs la lag pa dag /
K12D0724_H0711:150a-13: sa dag gis kyang bkru bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-14: bdun dang bdun dang yang lan bdun //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-15: nyi shu rtsa gcig nye reg bya //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-16: yang der so shing kun tu spyad //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-17: so sbyangs nas ni dor bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-18: de nas skyob la phyag byas shing //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-19: 'jig rten mgon la phyag byas nas //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-20: sngags rig mchod pa yid 'ong bya //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-21: bya ba sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-22: yang dag yang du yang dag bstod //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-23: de bzhin dri zhim me tog gis //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-24: ston pa skyob la mchod yon dbul //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-25: sangs rgyas rnams la mgos phyag byas //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-26: de tshe slob mar gyur pa rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-27: 'jig rten mgon po de rnams kyi //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-28: spyan snga nyid du sdig pa bshags //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-29: bdag nyid ngag kyang phul byas nas //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-30: ras ris spyan sngar 'khod par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-31: ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug /
K12D0724_H0711:150a-32: sngags rig gnyis ka 'dug nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-33: mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin te //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-34: der ni bgrang phreng nyid kyis ni //
K12D0724_H0711:150a-35: rab tu 'bad pas bzlas pa bya //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-0: de @150b tshe sngags gzhan mi bzlas so //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-1: cho ga dman pa yang spang zhing //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-2: ha cang mchog kyang de bzhin no //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-3: bar ma bar ma'i las dag la //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-4: brtul zhugs can dag sngags bzlas bya //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-5: ha cang mthon po spang bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-6: gal te tshig ni dman pa'ang min //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-7: bar ma bar ma'i las rnams la //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-8: rab tu bsngags par rgyal bas gsungs //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-9: ha cang mtho min dma' ba min //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-10: bar mar rtag tu bzlas pa bya //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-11: sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-12: tshig ni dpal dang ldan par gsungs //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-13: gzhan gyi drung du mi bzlas shing //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-14: gzhan gyi las lam rtag tu gsang //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-15: bdag nyid rig pa'i yul du bzlas //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-16: sngags ni bar ma de bzhin du //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-18: sngags ni legs par thos pa 'ga'//
K12D0724_H0711:150b-20: sngags ni dge bar bzlas par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-21: de phyir skye bo dang bral bar //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-22: sngags kyi de nyid don legs thos //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-23: tshogs dang bral zhing rnam dben par //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-24: zlos pa pos ni sngags bzlas bya //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-25: mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-26: de yi phyed kyi phyed nyid kyi //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-27: skya reng dmar po'i dus tsam ste //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-28: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba na //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-29: thun ni dang bor de bzhin du //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-30: thub pa'i skyes mchog gis gsungs so //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-31: dus kyi tshad ni bzhi yin te //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-32: bar mar yongs su bsgrags pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-33: de nas nyi ma phyed nub na //
K12D0724_H0711:150b-34: sngags kyi bzlas pa de tshe btang //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-1: zlos bor ba de yi tshe //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-2: mchod yon phul nas gshegs su gsol //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-3: brtul zhugs can gyi rnam gzhan spangs //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-4: de tshe bor ba'i gdugs lhag na //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-5: thub pa'i bstan la dge ba bya //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-6: shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-7: dam pa'i chos ni klog pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-8: sa bcu pa ni glegs bam ni //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-9: mchod dang klog pa rtag tu'o //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-10: de nas dus la bab gyur na //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-11: rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-12: thub pa skyes mchog phyag byas nas //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-14: de bzhin dus su spyod par ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-15: dus su za zhing dbang po thul //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-16: sgrub po chos dang ldan pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-17: sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang brtson //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-18: grong gzhan du ni 'jug pa na //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-19: mi smra gtsang spra spyod la dga'//
K12D0724_H0711:151a-20: sems can rtag tu chos ldan pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-21: khyim du bsod snyoms dag la 'jug /
K12D0724_H0711:151a-22: zlos po srog chags med pa'i chu //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-23: tshos bar grub pa gtsang mar 'dod //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-24: yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-25: sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dad //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-26: de lta'i khyim du rtag tu ni //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-27: bsod snyoms don du slong mo blang //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-28: dper na brtson pas go bgos te //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-29: nyam nga'i yul du rab tu 'jug /
K12D0724_H0711:151a-30: rtag tu dgra ni 'joms par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-31: dgra rnams kyis gzhom mi nus pa //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-32: de bzhin sngags pa slong mos 'tsho //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-33: rtag tu grong du 'jug pa na //
K12D0724_H0711:151a-34: de bzhin chags par 'os pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-0: gzugs @151b sgra mthong nas mi dge ba //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-1: 'dod chags zhi ba'i don gyi phyir //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-2: mi sdug dge ba bsgom par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-3: lang tsho'i rnam pas brgyan pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-4: bud med lus ni mthong nas kyang //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-5: smad cing rul ba'i lus rnams ni //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-6: srin bus zos shing dur khrod gnas //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-7: lus kyi mi rtag sdug bsngal ba //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-8: mi gtsang dri mi zhim par bsgom //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-9: gang la byis pa rmongs pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-11: las kyi srad bus brgyus pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-12: yun ring dus su mya ngan byed //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-13: mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-14: dmus longs sdug bsngal rgyu can no //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-15: gang du blo ni phyin ci log /
K12D0724_H0711:151b-16: chags pas skye ba phongs par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-17: rnam pa sna tshogs las lam gyis //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-18: rnam pa du mar chags gyur pa //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-19: ring nas khyogs kyis 'gro ba ni //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-21: rtag pa nyid phyir rjes chags pa //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-22: 'dzin pa'i kun tu spyod pa spyod //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-23: gang du sems can mi dge dga'//
K12D0724_H0711:151b-24: lam du yun ring rgyu bar byed //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-25: zo chun khyud mo'i rnam pa bzhin //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-26: srid pa'i mtsho chung 'byung ba rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-27: 'gro ba de rnams mi bzad pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-28: sdug bsngal chu bos kun tu g-yengs //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-29: de bzhin bud med sdug bsngal gyi //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-30: rtsa ba 'ba' zhig yin pa ru //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-31: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-32: de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-33: thub pa rnams kyis gsungs pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:151b-34: srid pa'i rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:152a-2: dka'// bud med rnams kyis bslus pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:152a-3: sems can gnas gang bying ba de //
K12D0724_H0711:152a-5: yi dvags 'jig rten lha ma yin; ;de bzhin mi yi 'jig rten nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:152a-7: rtag tu kun nas yongs su 'khor //
K12D0724_H0711:152a-8: bud med chags pas bslus pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:152a-9: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btson ra yi //
K12D0724_H0711:152a-11: bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi //
K12D0724_H0711:152a-12: ro la chags pa'i ce sbyang bzhin //
K12D0724_H0711:152a-13: gang la sems can rtag dga' ba //
K12D0724_H0711:152a-14: mi bzad sdug bsngal bzod par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:152a-15: dkar po chos la nges par nyams //
K12D0724_H0711:152a-16: sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu gnas //
K12D0724_H0711:152a-17: srid pa'i mtsho yi sdug bsngal nyid //

K12D0724_H0711:152b-0: rtag tu @152b bud med chags gyur ba //
