K12D0724_H0711:156b-2: bar gyur to // // gyi phyir dang / bkres pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:156b-3: skom pa bsal ba'i don gyi phyir dang /
K12D0724_H0711:156b-4: khyad par du sngags zlos pa po thams cad kyi
K12D0724_H0711:156b-5: phyir gsungs pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang
K12D0724_H0711:156b-6: ngo // dang po re zhig zlos pa pos sngags 'di bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:156b-7: gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar mi spron ri'i
K12D0724_H0711:156b-8: rtse mor 'dzegs nas 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pa bya
K12D0724_H0711:156b-9: // de nas dkar gsum bza' ba 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:156b-11: ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags ma sgrol ma'i
K12D0724_H0711:156b-12: ras ris bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhag nas mchod
K12D0724_H0711:156b-13: pa chen po byas te gtor ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:156b-14: lha bshos rgya chen po byas nas yang dag par
K12D0724_H0711:156b-15: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'i gsang
K12D0724_H0711:156b-16: sngags 'di nyid kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing rnams
K12D0724_H0711:156b-17: kyi me sbar nas au dum b'a ra'i yam shing
K12D0724_H0711:156b-18: la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang /
K12D0724_H0711:156b-19: mar la btags pa rlan dang bcas pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:156b-20: dpal 'bras kyi yam shing kyang rung ste stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:156b-21: de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi che sbrin nag po chen po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:156b-22: rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'ong bar 'gyur te 'jigs par mi bya //
K12D0724_H0711:156b-23: langs na 'gro bar yang mi bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:156b-24: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying pos
K12D0724_H0711:156b-25: bdag nyid bsrung bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor bcing ba
K12D0724_H0711:156b-26: dang / grogs rnams kyang sngar bzhin bsrung bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:157a-1: nag po'i dkyil 'khor mi snang bar 'gyur te bud
K12D0724_H0711:157a-2: med kyang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa
K12D0724_H0711:157a-3: / 'od kyi phreng ba dang ldan pas phyogs rnams
K12D0724_H0711:157a-4: kyang kun tu snang bar byed bzhin pa sgrub pa
K12D0724_H0711:157a-6: kye kye sems dpa' chen po longs shig /
K12D0724_H0711:157a-7: grub po yin no zhes so //
K12D0724_H0711:157a-8: de nas sgrub pa pos sna ma'i me tog dang bsres pa'i dri chus mchod yon dbul lo //
K12D0724_H0711:157a-9: de nas de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:157a-10: nyi ma de nas bdag nyid dam /
K12D0724_H0711:157a-11: 'di'i grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga la deng nas
K12D0724_H0711:157a-12: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba rnams rab
K12D0724_H0711:157a-14: ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang kun tu sbyin par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:157a-15: de nas sgrub pa pos mchod yon phul nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:157a-16: ras ris la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ras ris blangs te sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0724_H0711:157a-17: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas de nas ri'i rtsa mo'am /
K12D0724_H0711:157a-18: mi med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:157a-20: grogs pos phyag dar byas nas dgram par bya ba
K12D0724_H0711:157a-21: rnams bkram la gnas der nam mkha' la 'gro ba
K12D0724_H0711:157a-22: la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:157a-23: de nas sgrub pa pos sngar bzhin du ku sha'i
K12D0724_H0711:157a-24: khres la nye bar 'dug ste ras ris bar ma
K12D0724_H0711:157b-0: sngar bzhin du bzhugs su gsol nas seng ldeng @157b
K12D0724_H0711:157b-1: gi shing gi me sbar la thun gsum du padma
K12D0724_H0711:157b-2: dkar po'i me tog zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:157b-4: mar la btags pa rnams kyis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu rtsa ba'i rig pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:157b-6: nye ba'i snying pos las chen po thams cad kyi ched du 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:157b-7: yi ge gcig pa'i ched du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:157b-8: de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sbyin sreg
K12D0724_H0711:157b-9: gi mthar bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma mngon gsum
K12D0724_H0711:157b-10: du mthong bar 'gyur zhing 'dod pa'i mchog gi gnang
K12D0724_H0711:157b-11: bar byed do // nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:157b-15: mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam /
K12D0724_H0711:157b-18: longs spyod chen po nyid kyi ched dam /
K12D0724_H0711:157b-19: rgyal po chen po mnyes pa nyid dam /
K12D0724_H0711:157b-20: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rjes su rnam par spyod pa nyid dam /
K12D0724_H0711:157b-21: mdor na yid la 'dod pa de thams cad gnang bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:157b-22: gang blangs kyang rung sta de mthun par gnang bar
K12D0724_H0711:157b-23: byed cing grub pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad kyang thob
K12D0724_H0711:157b-24: bo // sems can chen po rnams 'gugs par byed pa 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:157b-25: mdor na ji lta ji ltar zhus pa de thams cad mdzad de //
K12D0724_H0711:157b-26: las kyi nyes pa rab tu sbags pa'ang yang dag
K12D0724_H0711:157b-27: par sbyong bar byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das sh'akya
K12D0724_H0711:158a-1: pa bar ma'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni dang po re zhig khyad par gyi gnas sam /
K12D0724_H0711:158a-4: chu gling gi 'gram du sngar bzhin du thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:158a-5: byas nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhag
K12D0724_H0711:158a-6: la bdag nyid kha shar du phyogs pas gnas nas
K12D0724_H0711:158a-7: ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste rgyas par
K12D0724_H0711:158a-8: gong bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste thun gsum du
K12D0724_H0711:158a-10: bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:158a-11: dong ka'i me tog tsandan dkar po dang bsres pa
K12D0724_H0711:158a-12: 'am; gur gum dang bsres pas snga ma de bzhin
K12D0724_H0711:158a-13: kho nar me sbar nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg
K12D0724_H0711:158a-14: bya'o // sbyin sreg gi mthar ras ris 'gul na blon po nyid do //
K12D0724_H0711:158a-15: ras ris la 'od kyi snang ba byung na 'od las rgyal srid do //
K12D0724_H0711:158a-16: ras ris kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs na
K12D0724_H0711:158a-17: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs kyi rgyal srid do
K12D0724_H0711:158a-18: // ras ris la me byung na sum cu rtsa
K12D0724_H0711:158a-19: gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid de brgya byin nyid do
K12D0724_H0711:158a-20: // // ras ris chos ston par byed pa byung
K12D0724_H0711:158a-21: na byang chub sems dpa' gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid
K12D0724_H0711:158a-22: // // do // ras ris kyi phyag spyi bor reg na mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K12D0724_H0711:158a-23: sa bdun rjes su thob pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:158a-24: stobs bcu nges pa nyid rim gyis thob par byed pa nyid do //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-0: de nas sgrub pa pos bcom @158b ldan 'das 'od
K12D0724_H0711:158b-1: srungs kyi gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrub te bkres pa dang
K12D0724_H0711:158b-2: / skom pa phyir gzhil ba'i don rjes su thob pa de nyid kyis dang /
K12D0724_H0711:158b-3: cho ga de nyid kyis yo byad kyi rig pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:158b-4: spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i chos
K12D0724_H0711:158b-5: la yang dag par nan tan bya yi /
K12D0724_H0711:158b-6: gzhan du grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-7: de ltar rim gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes
K12D0724_H0711:158b-8: su 'jug cing mdor na nan tan nges par sgrub
K12D0724_H0711:158b-11: yo byad kyi khyad par dang /
K12D0724_H0711:158b-12: nor bu rin po che rnams ji ltar sngar nges par bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-13: sngags shes sngags ni zlos pa po'ang //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-14: cho ga bshad pa la sems pa //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-15: sngags pa de tshe de phyogs su //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-16: gtsang ma'i 'gro bas zas kyang ni //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-17: zos nas yid ni dga' pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-18: dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-19: lhung bzed lhag ma rtag blangs te //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-20: sems bzang chu bo gtsang mar 'gro //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-21: mtha' gcig tu ni bor nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-22: brtul zhugs can gyis dud 'gro sbyin //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-23: dud 'gro rnams la mthun byin nas //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-24: 'bad pas lhung bzed bkru bar byed //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-25: lhag ma lhung bzed bya ba ni //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-26: snum med zas dang dri bral gang //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-27: lhung bzed lhag mar thub pas gsungs //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-28: gang du slong ba'i snod du ni //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-29: de ru zan ni mi bza' ste //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-30: der ni bza' ba 'bras bu dang //
K12D0724_H0711:158b-31: rdzas rnams rtag tu bza' mi bya //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-2: autpa la las byung bas sam //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-3: dri bzang ldan rnams spangs pa ste //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-4: sngags pas der ni mi bza' 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-5: gang yang sngags pas ku mu da //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-6: sla ksha au dum b'a ra las byung //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-7: ba ti'i 'dab ma dang yang ni //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-8: cher ma'i yal ga'i ri khrod byung //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-9: a'a mra'i 'dab ma ru yang min //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-10: de bzhin s'a ta la las byung //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-11: s'a la'i 'dab ma shi ri sha //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-12: byang chub shing las byung ba dang //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-13: gang du bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-15: shing de 'bad pas spang bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-16: shing de yi ni yal ga dang; ;n'a ga ge sar shing la'ang min //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-17: gang du nam yang bza' mi bya //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-18: mkhas pas de kun cis kyang spang //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-19: thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil po ni //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-20: rmongs pas nam yang 'gom mi bya;/
K12D0724_H0711:159a-21: sdigs pa dam tshig nyams par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-22: zas ni lo ma de rnams las //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-23: gzhan pa'i lo ma rnams su bza'//
K12D0724_H0711:159a-24: sa byung zangs su nges bstan dang //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-25: de bzhin gser dang dngul las byung //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-26: shel dang rdo ba las byung ba //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-27: de bzhin bza' ba blangs nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-28: rtag tu sngags pas der ni bza'//
K12D0724_H0711:159a-29: lo ma'i rgyab tu mi bza' ste //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-30: de bzhin lag pa'i mthil du'ang min //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-31: stobs bcu pa yi sras rnams dang //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-32: rang rgyal bse ru lta bu gang //
K12D0724_H0711:159a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos gtso //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-0: lo ma gzhan dang @159b lha bshos 'byung //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-1: zlos pos de rnams spang bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-2: yi ge rkang pas kyang mi 'gom //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-3: sna tshogs bza' ba snum khur dang //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-4: de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-5: sngags pas 'bad pas blang bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-6: rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnams dang //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-7: de bzhin nyan thos skyes bu mchog /
K12D0724_H0711:159b-8: dkon mchog gsum la phul ba yi //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-9: lha bshos thams cad nyid dang ni //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-10: zlos pos rtag tu spang bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-11: chung ngu tsam yang lus can la //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-12: sngags rnams de yis mi 'grub ste //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-13: kun nas bkra shis thams cad dang //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-14: rtag tu dpal ni smos ci dgos //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-15: rgyal ba can dang zhi ba can //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-16: lha bshos gtor ma za byed pa //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-17: de tshe de yi kun mi 'grub //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-18: gtsang zhing mkhas la tshul khrims ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-19: snying rje snying rje'i las can dang //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-20: gtsang sbra'i spyod pa la dga' ba //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-21: rig sngags kun tu sgrub par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-22: sems can gzhan la byin pa'i zas //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-23: zlos pos de ni bza' mi bya //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-24: gzhan gyis rab tu ma brtags pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-25: zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-26: rang la byin pas kha zas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-27: cung zad tsam yang blang bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-28: sngags shes de ltar 'jug pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-29: de yi dngos grub sdig pa'i dgra //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-30: yongs su rdzogs par byed par gnas //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-31: zlos pos cho ga 'di yis ni //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-32: bza' ba len pa'i brtul zhugs can //
K12D0724_H0711:159b-33: thub pa rnams kyis legs par bsngags //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-0: @160a *// sngags rnams thams cad sgrub pa la //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-1: mdor na cho ga mthong ba yis //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-2: bza' ba kun dang las rnams la'o //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-3: de nas gzhan yang rab 'chad byed //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-4: sngags ni thams cad sbyong bar byed //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-5: de nas zlos pos nye reg bya //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-6: de tshe sngags 'di brjod par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-7: de tshe sngags pas lan bdun du //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-8: lus sbyong byed pa bzlas byas nas; ;'byung po'i tshogs dang lha rnams 'dir //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-9: de don rgyas pa mnyan par gyis //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-10: lus kun nye reg byas nas su //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-11: thub pas sngags 'di brjod par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-12: na ma: sarba bud dh'a n'am/
K12D0724_H0711:160a-13: a'a pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am/
K12D0724_H0711:160a-19: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra h'um ja: sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:160a-20: sngags 'dis brlab pa'i zas gzhan gang yang rung ba
K12D0724_H0711:160a-21: yongs su spyod pa na sngags lan bdun mngon par
K12D0724_H0711:160a-22: sngags pa byas nas yongs su longs spyod par bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:160a-23: // zos nas snga ma bzhin du nye reg byas
K12D0724_H0711:160a-24: te spyi bo la sogs pa'i lus thams cad du
K12D0724_H0711:160a-25: byug nas de nas ngal bso bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-26: ngal sos nas yud tsam phyed dam /
K12D0724_H0711:160a-29: sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:160a-30: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:160b-0: 'phags @160b pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12D0724_H0711:160b-3: 'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang /
K12D0724_H0711:160b-4: 'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs te 'di rnams las gzhan dang /
K12D0724_H0711:160b-5: gzhan gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:160b-6: nyi ma'i dus kyi tshad bzhi cha tsam du'o //
K12D0724_H0711:160b-7: de nas yongs su zhi nas ji ltar 'dod pa
K12D0724_H0711:160b-8: bzhin du bklag par bya ste glegs bam brtul nas
K12D0724_H0711:160b-9: gos gtsang ma bgos te dam pa'i chos la phyag
K12D0724_H0711:160b-10: byas nas de nas khrus kyi ched du chu klung
K12D0724_H0711:160b-11: gi 'gram mam / mcho phran chen por 'jug pas
K12D0724_H0711:160b-12: song nas srog chags med pa'i sa blangs te lan
K12D0724_H0711:160b-13: bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas rig pa 'dis
K12D0724_H0711:160b-14: gi 'gram mam / chul gdab bo // gang zhe na /
K12D0724_H0711:160b-15: na ma: sa manta bud dh'a n'am aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am/
K12D0724_H0711:160b-17: aom sarba dushta stam bha ya h'um/
K12D0724_H0711:160b-18: n'a d'i bar dh'a ri ne /
K12D0724_H0711:160b-19: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:160b-20: 'dis srung ba byas nas phyogs rnams bcing ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:160b-25: rab tu gdug pa rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:160b-26: bgegs bcing ba la'ang srad bu la lan bdun bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:160b-27: nas rked pa'i phyogs su bcings pas thams cad yongs
K12D0724_H0711:160b-29: bzlas pa'i dus thams cad dang /
K12D0724_H0711:160b-30: khrus kyi dus thams cad dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161a-2: rab tu zhi ba'i don du sngags 'di stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:161a-3: de nas las thams cad byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:161a-4: padma'i gdan la phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:161a-5: las rnams thams cad du thams cad kyi rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:161a-6: de nas sgrub pa pos sa las byung ba'i phye
K12D0724_H0711:161a-7: ma la sogs pa rnams blangs nas ji ltar bde
K12D0724_H0711:161a-8: bar khrus bya zhing srog chags med pa'i chus khrus
K12D0724_H0711:161a-9: byas te thams cad du las thams cad la srog
K12D0724_H0711:161a-10: chags med pa nyid kyis bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:161a-11: de nas khrus byas nas sa'i rang bzhin nam /
K12D0724_H0711:161a-12: gzhan dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161a-13: yo byad kyi khyad par gyis rjes su byug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:161a-14: chu'i nang du mchil ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161a-16: gci ba la sogs pa'ang dor bar mi bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:161a-18: snying rje dang ldan pas bdag dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161a-19: sems can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya ste bdag med pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161a-21: sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161a-22: sdug bsngal nye bar 'gags pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161a-23: tshor bas mngon par non pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161a-24: chu rlabs bzhin du mngon par 'byung ba'i rab tu
K12D0724_H0711:161a-25: sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams
K12D0724_H0711:161a-26: 'di ltar sgrub pa dang bral ba sngags shes pas
K12D0724_H0711:161a-27: gang de bzhin du dug dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161b-1: rnam par 'jigs pa la sogs rnams kyis sdug bsngal
K12D0724_H0711:161b-2: gyi phung po nye bar 'gog par bya bzhin pa
K12D0724_H0711:161b-3: / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thibs po gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong zhing gnas med pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161b-6: shin tu dman pa'i yid can gyi bdag nyid du
K12D0724_H0711:161b-7: brtags nas sgom pa po mgrin pa nub tsam gyi
K12D0724_H0711:161b-9: lte ba tsam du gnas pa'i chu de nyid kyi
K12D0724_H0711:161b-10: nang du sems rtse gcig tu nye bar gzung bar
K12D0724_H0711:161b-11: bya'o // dang por re zhig padma chen po'i 'dab ma la me tog chen po dang ldan pa /
K12D0724_H0711:161b-12: padma chen po'i lo mas nye bar mdzes pa /
K12D0724_H0711:161b-14: rin po che beed'urya'i rang bzhin las byung ba'i sdong bu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161b-15: rin po che ma da ka las grub pa'i padma'i ge sar dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161b-16: shel las byas pa'i sdong po legs par kha phye ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161b-17: de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang /
K12D0724_H0711:161b-18: padma r'a ga'i me tog rnams kyis mdzes pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:161b-19: de'i steng du seng ge'i khri rin po che du
K12D0724_H0711:161b-20: mas nye bar mdzes pa; ras bcos bu zung gis
K12D0724_H0711:161b-21: bkab pa'o // de'i stengs su bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
K12D0724_H0711:161b-22: bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya ste chos ston par
K12D0724_H0711:161b-24: gser gyi mdog tu snang ba /
K12D0724_H0711:161b-25: kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa /
K12D0724_H0711:161b-26: tshad chen po nam mkha' lta bu mchog tu bris bzhin pa /
K12D0724_H0711:162a-2: g-yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12D0724_H0711:162a-3: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
K12D0724_H0711:162a-4: padma chen po'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:162a-6: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i grva na 'khod de lus
K12D0724_H0711:162a-7: dmar ser gur gum btags pa'i kha dog lta bu'o
K12D0724_H0711:162a-8: // g-yon du 'phags pa mthu chen po thob ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12D0724_H0711:162a-9: phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:162a-10: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brgyad la 'phags pa byams pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:162a-14: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:162a-16: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12D0724_H0711:162a-17: nor bzang zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bcu
K12D0724_H0711:162a-18: po 'di rnams kyi g-yas su rang sangs rgyas brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:162a-27: nye ba'i mu khyud brgyad do //
K12D0724_H0711:162a-28: de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la /
K12D0724_H0711:162a-30: 'phags pa moong+ga la gyi bu chen po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:162a-33: bha ra dhva dza bsod snyoms len dang /
K12D0724_H0711:162b-1: 'phags pa kun dga' bo zhes pa'i nyan thos chen
K12D0724_H0711:162b-2: po de rnams dang nye bar dge slong gi dge
K12D0724_H0711:162b-3: 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:162b-5: nye bar rang sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:162b-6: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po rnams kyi gnas su'ang
K12D0724_H0711:162b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom
K12D0724_H0711:162b-8: par bya'o // de bzhin du kun nas 'khor gyi
K12D0724_H0711:162b-9: dkyil 'khor du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang
K12D0724_H0711:162b-11: byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang lte
K12D0724_H0711:162b-12: ba tsam gyi chu la gnas bzhin du lha dang
K12D0724_H0711:162b-13: / mi'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la me tog man d'a ra ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:162b-14: man d'a ra ba chen po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:162b-17: dh'a nu sk'a ri ka dang /
K12D0724_H0711:162b-19: aintra ba r'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa tshad chen po phung po chen por gnas pa /
K12D0724_H0711:162b-20: ri rab tsam gyi me tog gi phur mas bcom
K12D0724_H0711:162b-21: ldan 'das la mchod pa bya zhing 'phags pa nyan
K12D0724_H0711:162b-22: thos dang; rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12D0724_H0711:162b-23: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phye ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:162b-30: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:162b-31: de bzhin du gtor ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:163a-2: bsnyen bkur la sogs pa yo byad lha dang /
K12D0724_H0711:163a-3: mi'i nyer mkho rnams dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-4: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod
K12D0724_H0711:163a-5: spu nas 'od zer mngon par 'phro bzhin pas bdag
K12D0724_H0711:163a-6: nyid dang / phyogs thams cad kyang kun tu snang bzhin par bsgom par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-7: sgom pa po bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu thob bo //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-8: nges par byang chub mchog tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-9: de lta bu sogs bsam gtan rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-10: 'jig rten skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-11: 'byung po kun kyang legs pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-12: sngags pa rnams la phan don dang //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-13: de tshe bsam gtan dang po'i gtso //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-14: sngags pa kun la phan don du; ;sems can rnams kyi phyir gsungs so //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-15: de nas thub mchog bdun pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-16: dkyil 'khor rnam par brjod par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-17: thub pas dang por gsungs pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-18: gnyis pa yi ni dkyil 'khor dang //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-19: gsum par yang ni de las gzhan //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-20: dang por mchog gi dngos grub ste //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-21: bar ma la ni de bzhin gzhan //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-22: chung ngu la ni phran tshogs 'grub //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-23: thub pa mchog gis nges par gsungs //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-24: de bzhin ras ris bsam gtan ni //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-25: thu bo bar ma chung ngu ste //
K12D0724_H0711:163a-26: thams cad sdig pa 'jig byed pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-0: de las gzhan yang @163b mkhas pas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-1: bsam gtan rnam par bsgrub bya //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-2: bsam gtan de la rab gnas na //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-4: ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bshad //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-5: zlos pos bsam gtan bsgoms nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-6: sngags kyi mchod yon der phul nas //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-7: ji ltar bde bar gshegs su gsol //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-8: chu tshogs de las bsgral nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-9: de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-10: gnas ni sngon du nges bstan par //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-11: cho ga mthong bas legs zhi bar //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-12: de la sngags pas gsang sngags bzlas //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-13: sngar las ji ltar brjod pa bzhin //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-14: rang gi lha ni spyan drangs pa //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-15: der ni sngags kyis gshegs su gsol //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-16: de nas bdag nyid de bzhin nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-17: grogs po rnams ni bsrungs byas nas //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-18: dge ba'i las kyis de nyid shes //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-19: cho ga'i las la dga' zhing 'dud //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-20: rnam pa sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-21: gang zag mchog la kun bstod nas //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-22: rang sngags sngags kyis mgon po dang //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-23: nyan thos rang rgyal bse ru dang //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-24: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-26: de nas gsang sngags zlos pa pos //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-27: stan de las ni slar langs nas //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-28: thag ring gnas su song nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-29: phyi rol rlung gi rnam par spangs //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-30: snabs dang mchil ma rnam par dor //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-31: bshang dang gci ba'ang de bzhin no //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-32: nyin par byang du kha phyogs shing //
K12D0724_H0711:163b-33: mtshan mo lho ru kha blta'o //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-1: zlos pos ni nam yang der //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-2: don rnams bsam par mi bya 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-3: der ni rang las byed gsungs pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-4: sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-5: rab sngags 'gro ba mtshan sogs kyi //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-6: de tshe sa steng nyer 'dug ste //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-7: dag pa'i chu yis nye reg bya //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-8: gtsang ma'i gos mtha' chur gzhug bya //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-9: sa yi phung po bdun nyid kyis //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-10: 'bad pas rkang pa bkrus byas nas //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-11: rab tu 'dzag pa bdun blangs nas //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-12: bshang ba 'dzag pa sum cu ste //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-13: gnyis ka'i mtha' la lag pa dag /
K12D0724_H0711:164a-14: mchil ma dor ba nyid dang ni //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-15: snabs la'ang gnyis te de bzhin no //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-16: de nas 'bad pas nye reg bya //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-17: gnas la ring du song ba'i sar //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-18: de bzhin sgra tsam song nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-19: lam la sogs pa yangs pa ru //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-20: de nas gzhan gyi ci 'dod bzhin //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-21: lho phyogs mtha' yi phyi rol tu //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-22: chu dang g-yangs med pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-23: de bzhin bye mas khyab pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-24: chu klung spangs shig ngos kyang spangs //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-25: 'bad pas mi gtsang chu spangs par //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-26: gsang zhing shin tu sbyangs pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-27: bas mtha' ljongs ni spangs pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-28: rnam par dben pa'i sar song nas //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-29: sngags pas mi gtsang dor bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-30: zlos po dus ni shes byas nas //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-31: ji ltar 'dod pa'i shugs dag min //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-32: de nas dag pa'i phyogs song ste //
K12D0724_H0711:164a-33: bas mthar de bzhin ba shang ba dang //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-0: @164b gci ba'i bya ba byas nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-1: de ru lus ni ci bde bar //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-2: gnyis ka'ang gsang g-yogs sbas pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-3: skye bo med pa'i sa spang bar //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-4: gsang sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-5: de bzhin kho nar thams cad du //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-6: ri bo dang ni tshang tshing dang //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-7: bas mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' ba //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-8: de bzhin rgyal bas spangs pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-9: gdug pa'i sems can rnams bral bar //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-10: gsang sngags rgyal po thams cad sgrub //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-11: rgyal po chos dang ldan pa'i yul //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-12: skye bo gtsang sbra spyod la dga'//
K12D0724_H0711:164b-13: ma dang pha la gus pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-14: gnyis skyes rigs kyis dor ba ru //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-15: lha rnams dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-16: gnas der yin gyi gzhan du min //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-17: nyams dga' skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-18: ya mu na nyid rab mdzes pa //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-19: sin dhu nar ma da bakshe //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-20: zla ba'i cha ni gtsang ma'i 'gram //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-21: k'a be r'a dang dbyangs can nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-22: chu klung chen po sh'i ta nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-23: 'di grub zhing gzhan ma yin par //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-24: stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-25: stobs bcu pa yis gsungs pa'i phyir //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-26: byang phyogs lam med ri bo dang //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-27: kha che dang ni rgya yul dang //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-28: bal yul de bzhin mang yul dang //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-29: rgya nag che dang li yul nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-30: de dag ma lus grub pa'i zhing //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-31: byang gi phyogs su brten pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-32: gang yang ri dang chu bo dang //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-33: bsod nams yul du rab tu brjod //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-34: nas dang gro ni za ba 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:164b-35: gang du sems can snying rje ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-2: dpal gyi ri bo brag ri che //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-3: lho phyogs yul du gnas pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-4: dpal ldan 'bras spung mchod rten ni //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-5: sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel 'jin //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-6: der ni sngags rnams bsgrub par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-7: myur du las dang las rnams so //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-8: rdo rje gdan dang mchod rten che //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-9: chos kyi 'khor lo mdzes pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-10: gang du thub gtso zhi bar gshegs //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-11: der yang dngos grub blta bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-12: lha las babs pa'i mchod rten ni //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-14: ser skya zhes bya'i grong mchog dang //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-15: lum bi'i tshal du 'khrungs pa der //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-17: rgyal bas bstod cing rab bsngags pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-18: bya rgod phung por ri der dang //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-19: de bzhin brag dang bsir ba'i tshal //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-20: me tog ces bya'i grong mchog dang //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-21: de bzhin rtag tu ka sha'i grong //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-22: bcom brlags ka n+ya kub dzi dang //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-23: sa steng grong ni 'phags rgyal dang //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-24: mchod rten de bzhin yangs pa can //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-25: rtag tu sa steng mi thi la //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-26: grong dang grong khyer gtso bo rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-27: gang gzhan rgyal ba yang dag 'byung //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-28: rab bsngags bsod nams yul dag tu //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-29: de rnams su ni dngos grub sgrub //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-30: 'di rnams las gzhan yul rnams ni //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-31: grong dang ljongs dang ri bo dang //
K12D0724_H0711:165a-32: gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-0: 'o ma'am 'bab chu la bsten @165b pa; ;der ni rnam dben rjes 'jug cing //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-1: bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' bar 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-2: gnas ni bla gab med pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-3: rtag tu khang pa stong pa ru //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-4: sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-5: sngags rnams rjes mthun las rnams ni //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-6: sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus su //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-7: sngags bzlas yang dag 'dod par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-8: bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-9: sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms /
K12D0724_H0711:165b-10: tshul khrims spyod cing shin tu brtan //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-11: 'byung po kun la phan par dga'//
K12D0724_H0711:165b-12: sngags kyi spyod pa la dad pa //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-13: brtul zhugs can gyis sngar bzhin bzlas //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-14: gtsang ma'i yul dang gtsang sbra can; ;kla klo rkun ma spangs pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-15: der ni bskal pa chen por gnas //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-16: dam tshig snang ba bral ba'i phyir //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-17: dmyal ba mi bzad mun pa ru //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-18: byis pa'i skye bo 'tshed par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-19: dam pa'i chos la smad pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-20: mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-21: ye shes byis pa'i ngo bo 'am //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-22: rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal can //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-23: rig pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-24: mi bzad dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-25: de phyir sdig pa mi bya zhing //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-26: log par smra ba'ang smad pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-27: dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-28: log par lta ba smad pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-29: de phyir rtag tu dad gyur nas; ;gsang sngags cho ga rtag tu bsten //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-30: bden par smra zhing chos shes pa //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-31: sems can rnams la rtag tu phan //
K12D0724_H0711:165b-32: sngags shes sngags ni sten par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-2: mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yis //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-3: las ni rnam pa sna tshogs byed //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-4: las rnams bya ba rnams kyis byed //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-5: rtag tu phan pa'i bya ba yis //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-6: bya ba'i las dang yang dag ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-7: de la rtag tu grub par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-8: bya ba'i don dang don kun phyir //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-9: las don rtag tu bya ba 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-10: bya ba'i don du bya min gang //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-11: bya ba'i las la sbyar bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-12: 'bras bcas nyid kyi bya don gyi //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-13: bya ba nyid du rtag tu bya //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-14: bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-19: thams cad nyid kyang 'bras bu bcas //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-20: rnal 'byor sngags ni bsgrub bya ste //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-21: yang dag sbyor dang bral ba yang //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-22: bral dang yang dag ldan sgrub bo //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-23: bsgrub bya sgrub byed med par ni //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-24: de la grub pa yod ma yin //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-25: grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-26: grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba yin //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-27: sngags kyi dngos grub ma grub pa //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-28: sngags ni sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-29: byed par 'dod pa de las te //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-31: las min las ni thams cad la //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-32: las kyi rgyud ni mi bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-33: sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-34: las ni mtha' dag brtsam par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-35: brtsams dang rtsom pa'i 'dud pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:166a-36: las nyid brtsam par mi bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-0: bya ba ma brtsams @166b sngags rnams ni //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-2: sems can kun rjes skyong ba yi //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-3: thub pa'i gtso bos sngon gsungs pa //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-4: gsang sngags smra bas bstan pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-5: rgyal ba'i sras kyi yang dag sdom //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-6: sgrub bo sngags ni kun shes shing //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-7: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la tshig /
K12D0724_H0711:166b-8: sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-9: lam ni byang chub rgyur gyur pa //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-10: sngags kun nyid ni sgrub bar byed //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-11: rig pa mnyam par 'gyur ba yin //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-12: de ni ring por mi thogs par //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-13: mkhas pas dngos grub 'gyur ba yin //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-14: 'byung po thams cad zhi don du //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-15: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsgrags //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-16: gsang sngags tshul gyi lam 'dis ni //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-18: de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-19: chos don thams cad rdzogs par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-20: de yi mthar thug dpung gnyen ni //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-21: dang po gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-22: de bzhin 'dir ni lhun grub tu //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-23: 'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub thob //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-24: sna tshogs las dang chos shes pa //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-25: sngags rnams byed par 'gyur ba yin //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-26: tshul khrims bsam gtan rnam thar rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-27: 'di rnams mdor bsdus thob pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-28: dngos grub don kun sgrub byed pa //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-29: rgyal ba gtso bos gsungs pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-30: gang zag rkang pa'i don thob pa //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-31: dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-32: de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin gtso //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-33: tha mas rgyal srid rgyu yin te //
K12D0724_H0711:166b-34: lha min lha yi 'jig rten gyi //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-2: sngags pas thams cad thob par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-4: gtsang sbra'i kun spyod yang dag ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-5: tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag tu dga'//
K12D0724_H0711:167a-6: sngags rnams kun tu gsungs pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-7: de nas sngags pas sngags bzlas bya //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-9: rnam pa sna tshogs las byas te //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-10: de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-11: tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-12: tha mas longs spyod 'phel ba yin //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-13: bar mas gong ma'i lus can nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-14: mchog nyid kyis ni ldang ba nyid; ;zlos pos rtag tu thob par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-15: sngags pas bzlas mthar ngal bso zhing //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-16: ji srid dus su brtag par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-17: bzlas pa'i dus la bab pa na //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-18: der ni bsgrub pa bya ba yin //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-19: de bzhin las rnams sgrub par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-20: de la rtag tu bzlas pas skyes bu rang gi sdig pa zad par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:167a-21: sngags pas sngon las kyi cho ga gang byas pa
K12D0724_H0711:167a-22: skye ba brgyud pa rnams su grub par gnas pa
K12D0724_H0711:167a-23: de de bzhin du las tshogs la rnyed par 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:167a-24: ba de skyes pas sngags bzlas pas slar yang sngags
K12D0724_H0711:167a-25: zlos pa po'i sdig pa zad pa'i don dang /
K12D0724_H0711:167a-26: las de 'joms shing sngags grub par 'gyur te de bzhin du mchog dang /
K12D0724_H0711:167a-28: tha ma'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:167a-29: bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus par zad par byed
K12D0724_H0711:167b-0: cing skye ba brgyud pa @167b rnams su gang bar
K12D0724_H0711:167b-1: byas / sdig pa de thams cad 'jig par byed
K12D0724_H0711:167b-2: de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas pas
K12D0724_H0711:167b-3: lus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa
K12D0724_H0711:167b-4: byas / dang / thub pa rnams kyis gnas pas dga' ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:167b-5: yon tan thams cad kyis grags par 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:167b-6: gnod sbyin gyi khang par gnas pa'i rgyal po nyid dang /
K12D0724_H0711:167b-7: rtag tu don thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob pa dang ldan no //
K12D0724_H0711:167b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg
K12D0724_H0711:167b-9: pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde bcom
K12D0724_H0711:167b-10: ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen
K12D0724_H0711:167b-11: mdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las /
K12D0724_H0711:167b-12: ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byams dgu pa rtogs so ////
K12D0724_H0711:167b-13: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas thams
K12D0724_H0711:167b-14: cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs
K12D0724_H0711:167b-15: nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
K12D0724_H0711:167b-16: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa
K12D0724_H0711:167b-17: / byang chub sems dpa' chen po /
K12D0724_H0711:167b-19: khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rjes su spyod pa /
K12D0724_H0711:167b-20: sems can mtha' dag gi don la brtson pa /
K12D0724_H0711:167b-21: sems can rnams gang gis bzlas par bya ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang /
K12D0724_H0711:167b-22: gang dang ldan pas bgrang bar bya ba'i bgrang phreng gi cho ga /
K12D0724_H0711:167b-23: rgyud thams cad kyi thun mong gi sgrubs thabs kyi cho ga /
K12D0724_H0711:167b-24: sngags thams cad kyi cho ga de legs par nyon la legs par yid la zungs shig /
K12D0724_H0711:168a-2: sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0724_H0711:168a-7: bdag cag la rjes su brtse bas nye bar blangs
K12D0724_H0711:168a-8: nas rig pa'i sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang
K12D0724_H0711:168a-9: / dam tshig la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang /
K12D0724_H0711:168a-10: sems can thams cad la don gyi phyir yang de bka' stsal du gsol /
K12D0724_H0711:168a-11: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:168a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
K12D0724_H0711:168a-13: chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad
K12D0724_H0711:168a-15: sems dpa' chen po rnam par dbye ba rgyas par bshad par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:168a-17: gang gis sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa /
K12D0724_H0711:168a-18: sems can gyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa de gang zhe na /
K12D0724_H0711:168a-19: dang po re zhig sngags su 'gyur ba ni //
K12D0724_H0711:168a-24: aom ku ru ku ru sarba aartha s'a dh'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:168a-25: sarba dushta bi mo ha ni /
K12D0724_H0711:168a-26: ga ga n'a ba lam be /
K12D0724_H0711:168a-28: rig pa 'dis bgrang phreng thams cad la las bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:168a-32: rgyu ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:168a-33: dang po bgrang phreng shing la ni //
K12D0724_H0711:168a-34: lan grangs sum cu rtsa bdun du //
K12D0724_H0711:168a-35: de yis mngon par sngags byas nas //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-0: brtul zhugs can gyis bsrung @168b ba bya //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-1: mtshan mo gcig tu gnyid log nas //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-2: der ni rmi lam brtag par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-3: mi ma yin gzugs kun rdzogs pa //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-4: mi sdug lhag par mche ba gtsigs //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-5: sngags pa la ni des smras pa //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-6: bcom ldan sems pa ji bzhin longs //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-7: sgrub po tho rangs langs nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-8: shing de ru ni 'gro bar byed //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-9: mi sdug gzugs ldan gtsigs pa che //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-10: rmi lam du yang ma mthong na //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-11: sngags pas shing de bor bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-12: de nas gzhan du 'gro bar gyis //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-13: dang po ru raksha yin te //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-14: de la gzhan pa dbang po'i shing //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-17: shing la 'dzegs pa'i legs rdzogs pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-18: grogs dang lhan cig 'dzeg par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-19: grogs po med par gyur na ni //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-20: rang nyid de la 'dzeg par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-21: steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-22: 'dzeg nas phun tshogs brtul zhugs can //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-23: de la rtag tu bag yod pas //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-24: steng gi yal ga'i 'bras bu blangs //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-25: steng gi sa la legs sbyar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-26: steng gi mchog gi dngos grub tu //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-27: gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-28: bar mar dngos grub 'bring po ste //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-30: srog chags rnams kyis ma smad pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-31: 'bras bu de rnams yang dag blangs //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-32: nub kyi yal ga las thob pa //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-33: rdzas kyi rgyur ni bsgrub par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-34: byang gi gnod sbyin mo la sogs //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-35: lha rnams lhan cig 'gugs par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:168b-36: dgug pa'i bya ba bshad pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-2: lha dang lha min g-yul 'gyed dang //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-3: mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-4: 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-5: 'byung po thams cad rgyas pa'i phyir //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-6: 'bras bu dang bcas las rnams ni //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-7: ma lus spyod pa byed pa 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-8: shar gyi phyogs su yal ga dang //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-10: de bzhin 'bad pas byas gyur na //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-11: tshe ring po yi don gyi rgyu //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-12: rtag tu sngags kyis dngos grub 'bras //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-13: rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-14: gang zhig lhor ni 'gro ba yi //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-15: yal ga lo mar rab ldan pa //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-16: sems can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-17: de na zlos pos 'bad pas spang //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-18: lho ru rten pa'i yal ga la //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-19: 'bras bu gang du yang dag brjod //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-20: phyogs der gdung dbye dgra rnams kyi //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-21: srog ni 'jig par byed pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-22: bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-23: de ni zlos pos 'bad pas spang //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-25: 'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-26: lha ma yin dang ldan pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-28: de rnams 'bras bcas phreng ba ni //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-29: blangs nas yang dag rab bsgrags pa //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-31: de nas de ni sa 'og 'gro; ;de ru rab tu zhugs nas lha'i //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-32: bde nyid zlos pos der 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-33: lha min bu mos yang dag ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:169a-34: de ni bskal par gnas par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-0: bgrang phreng 'bras bu kun @169b blangs nas //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-1: de nas zlos pos bzlas pa bya //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-2: lhan cig srung ba byas nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-3: de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-4: de nyid ring po'i gnas su ni //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-5: gtsang ma'i phyogs der sngags pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-6: de bzhin rtag tu 'dug par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-7: bgrang phreng skyes pa sbyar bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-8: brtson pas bgrang phreng 'bras bu blang //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-9: de nas kun tu yang dag sbyang //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-10: der ni phreng ba dbugs par grags //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-11: gsum bdun brgyad dang gcig dang ni //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-12: lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-13: sngags shes der ni sbyang bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-14: rtag tu snga ma'i sngags kyis ni //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-15: brgyad dam bdun du bzlas byas pa //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-16: de nas de ni dag par 'dod //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-17: padma'i rtsa lag legs brjod pas //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-18: bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu yis //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-19: sum 'gyur lnga dang ldan pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-20: brtul zhugs can gyis phreng thag bya //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-21: sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgyu //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-22: 'bras bu phra mo zlum par bcas //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-23: rtag tu srog chags bug med //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-24: yan lag ma nyams ma smad pa //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-25: mdzes shing kha dog sdug pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-26: bu ga med cing gas pa med //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-27: ril bu zlum po ji bzhin pa //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-28: de bzhin ru raksha dang ni //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-29: bo de tse dang ainta ksha //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-30: 'bras nyid rtag tu lung thang mdzes //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-31: 'bras bu dam pa'am gang gi tshe //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-32: sngags pa mchog tu brtson pa yis; ;'bad pas bgrang phreng brgyu bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-33: gser ram yang na dngul dag gam //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-34: nor bu shel las byung ba dang //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-35: mu tig dung nyid mu sa ra //
K12D0724_H0711:169b-36: byu ru yis kyang bya ba ste //
K12D0724_H0711:170a-2: gzhan yang rin chen las byung ba'i //
K12D0724_H0711:170a-3: bgrang phreng bzang po bya ba dang //
K12D0724_H0711:170a-4: sa las byung ba'i ldum po yi //
K12D0724_H0711:170a-5: ril bus bgrang phreng can dag ni //
K12D0724_H0711:170a-6: mnyam par bzhag ste srad bu brgyu //
K12D0724_H0711:170a-7: gzhan yang ril bu 'ga' zhig gam //
K12D0724_H0711:170a-8: 'bras bu'am khams las byung ba yis //
K12D0724_H0711:170a-9: ku sha'i rtse mos brgyus pa yang //
K12D0724_H0711:170a-10: zlos pos 'bad de bya ba yin //
K12D0724_H0711:170a-11: brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu lnga //

K12D0724_H0711:176a-11: chos kyi mdzod las byung ba /

K12D0724_H0711:179a-1: med kyi sor mos ril bu bzhi byas la padma'i 'dab mas bkab la skam du gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:179a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi cho ga bzhin du

K12D0724_H0711:179a-6: rgya chen por byas te phyogs brgyad du p'a la
K12D0724_H0711:179a-7: sha'i shing gis me sbar nas zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:179a-9: mar la btags pa'i rnam par 'dren pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:179a-10: de nas phyogs bzhi rnams su dkyil 'khor byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:179a-11: phyogs skyong ba rnams bzhag ste dkyil 'khor gnyis par
K12D0724_H0711:179a-12: rab tu sad par byed pa lag tu yungs kar
K12D0724_H0711:179a-13: thogs pa'o // dkyil 'khor gsum par legs par grogs bzang po 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:179a-14: grogs med kyang rung ste sngags kyi mchod pa chen
K12D0724_H0711:179a-15: po byas nas bsrung ba bya ste kha shar du
K12D0724_H0711:179a-16: phyogs pas nye bar 'dug la ku sha bting zhing
K12D0724_H0711:179a-17: bkram nas aa shvadtha'i 'dab ma gsum gyi steng nas
K12D0724_H0711:179a-18: dang / bzhis 'og nas g-yogs te lag pas mnan la ji srid dro bar gyur pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:179a-20: rab tu 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:179a-21: dang po dngos grub ni 'dis rgyal ba'i bdag nyid kyi spyan te gang mthong ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:179b-0: gang rnams mthong ba de rnams thams cad dbang du @179b 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:179b-1: gnyis pa'i dngos grub ni glang po che dgu'i stobs dang /
K12D0724_H0711:179b-4: glang po che bcu 'phrogs pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:179b-5: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi zil gyis gnon pa ma yin pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:179b-6: 'bar zhing 'char ba'i nyi ma dang 'dra ba /
K12D0724_H0711:179b-7: lus rin po ches brgyan pa /
K12D0724_H0711:179b-8: bar gyi bskal par gnas shing gzhan 'dren par byed
K12D0724_H0711:179b-9: pa; rig pa 'dzin pa zil gyis mi non pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:179b-12: rlung gi lam bdun du rnam par rgyu bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:179b-13: rna ba'i mig sman bsten pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:179b-14: ldong ros lag pa'ang dngos grub rnam pa gsum mo //
K12D0724_H0711:179b-15: de nas rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na thog phog
K12D0724_H0711:179b-16: pa'i shing blangs nas sor bcu drug pa'i tshad kyi
K12D0724_H0711:179b-17: rdo rje'i rnam pa bya'o; ;zlum skor du khru gang
K12D0724_H0711:179b-18: tsam gyi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas de'i spyan
K12D0724_H0711:179b-19: sngar cho ga 'di mthong bas zla ba nya la
K12D0724_H0711:179b-20: mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas sangs rgyas
K12D0724_H0711:179b-21: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas
K12D0724_H0711:179b-22: nas rdo rje de nyid la nges par sems pas
K12D0724_H0711:179b-23: lta bzhin pa dang ldan pas rdo rje blangs te
K12D0724_H0711:179b-25: shar du rgyun 'bab pa dang mthun pa'i rgyun bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:179b-26: chu klung gi 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas ba byung lngas zlum skor bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:180a-0: zlum skor byas nas khru gang tsam gyi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas de'i @180a *//
K12D0724_H0711:180a-1: spyan sngar cho ga 'di mthong bas mchod pa bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:180a-2: de nas dur khrod du ras ris de'i drung du
K12D0724_H0711:180a-3: rdo rje bzhag ste de'i steng du bzhag nas lag
K12D0724_H0711:180a-4: pas mnan la ji srid du gong bu'i 'og gi
K12D0724_H0711:180a-5: khung bur ltung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:180a-6: // de nas khrus byas nas de nyid du lag pas rdo rje blangs nas rab tu 'jug go /
K12D0724_H0711:180a-7: bslangs pa'i bsod snyoms blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la
K12D0724_H0711:180a-8: gtor nas nye bar mchod de khrus byas nas rdo
K12D0724_H0711:180a-9: rje de nyid la dur khrod kyi thal ba ji
K12D0724_H0711:180a-10: srid spags par so sor gzhag go /
K12D0724_H0711:180a-11: cho ga 'dis dur khrod kyi sha la bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:180a-12: mthar mtshan mo gsum du cho ga bzhin du gtor
K12D0724_H0711:180a-13: ma'i mchod pa dbul bar byas nas bdag nyid dam
K12D0724_H0711:180a-14: / grogs bzang po la bsrung ba byas te lag
K12D0724_H0711:180a-15: pa gnyis kyis mnan te ji srid du dngos grub
K12D0724_H0711:180a-16: rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:180a-17: / pa bya'o // dngos grub dang po la gang bltas pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:180a-18: gang gis mthong ba de rnams rab tu dga' zhing dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:180a-19: gnyis pa ras ris kyi sa'i rdul phyis pa tsam gyis mi snang ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:180a-20: glang po che stong phrag dgu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:180a-25: rnam par snang par byed pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:180b-1: gsum pa la ni nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:180b-2: lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho zhing 'khor los bsgyur ba'ang 'dren par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:180b-3: rdo rje'i lag par rnam par rgyu ste de bzhin du padma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:180b-4: dgra sta lag pa'i chogs kyang ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:180b-5: de nas ril bu sgrub par 'dod na sngon du
K12D0724_H0711:180b-6: bsnyen pa byas te lor skyes pa'i sdigs mdzub kyi
K12D0724_H0711:180b-7: sor mo blangs sngar gyi chogs mchod rten byas te
K12D0724_H0711:180b-8: dur khrod du mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:180b-9: kha shar du phyogs pas rab tu zhugs la de
K12D0724_H0711:180b-10: srid du sor mongs par rig bya ston pas mnan
K12D0724_H0711:180b-11: nas rdo rje las 'od zer 'phro ba de srid
K12D0724_H0711:180b-13: nyin mo nam mkha'i rlung la bsrung ba bya zhing
K12D0724_H0711:180b-14: mtshan mo gnyid mi log par tho rangs ji srid
K12D0724_H0711:180b-15: du sor mo rnams dgug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:180b-16: bkug pa'i gnas der mtshan mo gsum du smyur bar gnas pa /
K12D0724_H0711:180b-17: ba dang be'u rgyud mtshungs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:180b-18: grags pa dang ldan pa'i 'o ma blangs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tsandan gyi mandal dang /
K12D0724_H0711:180b-19: mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas ku sha'i
K12D0724_H0711:180b-20: khres la 'dug ste stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags
K12D0724_H0711:180b-21: par byas nas sa'i snod du 'o ma blug par
K12D0724_H0711:180b-22: bya zhing thal bas kyang dkyil 'khor bcings la tho
K12D0724_H0711:180b-23: rangs khrus byas nas sngar 'di nyid kyis nges par
K12D0724_H0711:180b-24: bsrubs pa'i mar gsar blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la
K12D0724_H0711:181a-1: stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags nas ma reg
K12D0724_H0711:181a-2: pa zos nas mthong ba zhes bya ste 'dod pa
K12D0724_H0711:181a-4: grol bar 'dod na gnas la phan pa'i dri thams
K12D0724_H0711:181a-5: cad la sogs pa la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos
K12D0724_H0711:181a-6: te mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas par byas
K12D0724_H0711:181a-7: te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya
K12D0724_H0711:181a-8: chen po byas te mar gyi mar me rab tu
K12D0724_H0711:181a-9: sbar nas rang nyid sngags zlos shing brtag par bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:181a-10: // de nas gzugs brnyan byas nas aa shvadtha'i 'dab
K12D0724_H0711:181a-11: ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das
K12D0724_H0711:181a-12: kyi spyan sngar ji srid du rang gis rig pa
K12D0724_H0711:181a-13: de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:181a-14: de nas phye mar byas nas phye ma des kun
K12D0724_H0711:181a-15: tu rig pa de dbang du 'gyur ro; ;cho ga
K12D0724_H0711:181a-16: 'di nyid kyis n'a ga ge sar gyi phye ma
K12D0724_H0711:181a-17: la gzugs brnyan byas te bdug pa'i kham phor brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:181a-18: brgyar sbyin sreg byas na gang la rjes su sems
K12D0724_H0711:181a-19: pa de dbang du byed do; ;cho ga 'di nyid
K12D0724_H0711:181a-20: kyis aa b'a ma rga'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg
K12D0724_H0711:181a-21: bya'o // nor 'dod na ba lang gi gnas su
K12D0724_H0711:181a-22: song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
K12D0724_H0711:181a-23: sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis lag pas
K12D0724_H0711:181a-24: ma bzos ba'i mchod rten byas la cho ga bzhin
K12D0724_H0711:181a-25: du mchod nas gu gul bsregs te stong phrag brgyar
K12D0724_H0711:181b-0: bya'o // bzlas pa bya'o // ba lang stong @181b ngam; nor rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:181b-1: cho ga 'di nyid kyis mar dang /
K12D0724_H0711:181b-2: sbrang rtsi sogs bsreg cing stong phrag brgyar bzlas pa bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:181b-3: grong bcu gnyis kyis bskor brnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:181b-4: cho ga 'di nyid kyis mchod rten byas nas tsandan gyis btags pa'i padma'i gdan dang /
K12D0724_H0711:181b-5: lha bshos stong phrag brgya dbul te yul gyi dpon po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:181b-6: cho ga 'di nyid kyis gu gul gyi bdug pa
K12D0724_H0711:181b-7: bsregs te tsam pa ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya
K12D0724_H0711:181b-8: dbul te gser stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:181b-9: cho ga 'di nyid kyis n'a ga ge sar gyi
K12D0724_H0711:181b-10: me tog stong phrag brgyar dbul bar bya ste ras
K12D0724_H0711:181b-11: bcos bu'i gos stong rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:181b-12: de bzhin du me tog thams cad 'dod pa'i cho
K12D0724_H0711:181b-13: ga thams cad dur khrod du ro bsregs pa'i thal
K12D0724_H0711:181b-14: ba blangs nas zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du
K12D0724_H0711:181b-15: smyung bar gnas te ming med kyi sor mo'i khrag
K12D0724_H0711:181b-16: gis zlum skor byas nas gzugs brnyan bris te rkang
K12D0724_H0711:181b-17: pa g-yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa
K12D0724_H0711:181b-18: byas na dang po gos bdun dang /
K12D0724_H0711:181b-19: mdor na rigs dang bcas pa thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:181b-20: mchod rten byas nas shing aa dhi ba la dza la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:181b-22: mar la btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:181b-23: gang ston pa'i bu mo des sbyin par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:182a-0: s'a la'i rgyab nas byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la yungs mar @182a *//
K12D0724_H0711:182a-1: gyis 'di bkang nas lcags kyi thur mas pug ste
K12D0724_H0711:182a-2: tsha ba'i til mar gyis byugs te dur khrod du
K12D0724_H0711:182a-3: stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:182a-4: lus gcig pa'i bud med dam /
K12D0724_H0711:182a-6: gnyis pa la rje rigs dang /
K12D0724_H0711:182a-8: gsum pa la dge slong dang /
K12D0724_H0711:182a-9: bram ze ma'o zhes te mdor na ma bsgrubs par yang las byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:182a-10: gi wang la lan bdun mngon par sngags pas khyad par du byas nas gang mthong ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:182a-11: gang rnams mthong ba de thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:182a-12: de bzhin du mig sman gyis so //
K12D0724_H0711:182a-13: tho rangs langs nas lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:182a-14: chus bde bar khrus byas na gang la bltas pa
K12D0724_H0711:182a-15: de sbyin par byed cing de 'bangs su'ang 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:182a-16: // de bzhin du til mar so la ma reg
K12D0724_H0711:182a-17: par bza' bas 'dod pas khyor ba'i chu la lan
K12D0724_H0711:182a-18: bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas 'thungs na don
K12D0724_H0711:182a-19: du ma gnyer bar yang bza' ba rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:182a-20: rgyal po'i khab du zhugs nas chos gos kyi mtha'
K12D0724_H0711:182a-21: nas bzung ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu yongs
K12D0724_H0711:182a-22: su bzlas nas lag pa g-yon pas mdud pa bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:182a-23: // rgyab tu mi lta bar song na smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:182a-24: chom rkun gyi nang du song bas kun tu 'phrog
K12D0724_H0711:182b-0: par bya ba nyid la bzlas @182b pas gtsang bar
K12D0724_H0711:182b-2: 'bugs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags rnams so //
K12D0724_H0711:182b-4: k'a ra bi ra dkar po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:182b-6: k'a ba rnams kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas lag pa
K12D0724_H0711:182b-7: g-yon pas mnan te stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas
K12D0724_H0711:182b-8: na steng du langs par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:182b-9: rims gzhom par 'dod na gi ri kang+na ka ra'i
K12D0724_H0711:182b-10: me tog stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na nyi
K12D0724_H0711:182b-11: ma bdun gyis sha za ba'i rims nyams par byed
K12D0724_H0711:182b-12: do // seng ldeng gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg
K12D0724_H0711:182b-13: stong phrag brgyad byas na gdon thams cad 'joms par
K12D0724_H0711:182b-14: do // byed do // thal ba la lan bdun
K12D0724_H0711:182b-15: bzlas pas pha rol gyi sngags rnams 'ching bar byed
K12D0724_H0711:182b-16: do // byed do // do // chu la lan gcig bzlas pas grol lo //
K12D0724_H0711:182b-17: de lta bu la sogs pa'i las rnams so //
K12D0724_H0711:182b-18: de'ang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas slar yang 'khor
K12D0724_H0711:182b-19: gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de la gzigs nas byang
K12D0724_H0711:182b-20: chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K12D0724_H0711:182b-22: 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa zhes bya ba yod do //
K12D0724_H0711:182b-23: de ni rigs kyi bdag po /
K12D0724_H0711:182b-24: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba
K12D0724_H0711:182b-25: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir sgrub thabs kyi cho ga
K12D0724_H0711:182b-26: / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gsang chen du gyur pa /
K12D0724_H0711:182b-27: sgrub pa pos gdon mi za ba kho nar dran
K12D0724_H0711:182b-28: par bya ba ste de sems dpa' chen po khyod
K12D0724_H0711:183a-1: de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:183a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
K12D0724_H0711:183a-3: gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:183a-4: don du rigs kyi bdag po gsung du gsol /
K12D0724_H0711:183a-5: 'dod pa phun sum tshogs byed pa //
K12D0724_H0711:183a-6: bcom ldan 'das rdul mun rnam par grol //
K12D0724_H0711:183a-7: chags pas mngon par zhi ba dang //
K12D0724_H0711:183a-8: byang chub nges 'byin sdig pa las //
K12D0724_H0711:183a-9: kun tu gzigs pa'i zla ba la //
K12D0724_H0711:183a-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12D0724_H0711:183a-11: srid pa'i sa bon rnam 'joms par //
K12D0724_H0711:183a-12: phyag 'tshal mchod de khyod la brten //
K12D0724_H0711:183a-13: bshad bya gal te 'byung bar byed //
K12D0724_H0711:183a-16: shve te shve tem ge shve bhu dze shve ta /
K12D0724_H0711:183a-17: ma lye ra lam kri te /
K12D0724_H0711:183a-18: dza ye bi dza ye aa dzi te aa pa r'a dzi te sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:183a-19: dran pa nyid las 'di'i sngags kyi dngos grub myur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:183a-20: de la 'di'i sngags ni tho rangs langs nas bcom
K12D0724_H0711:183a-21: ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa pos
K12D0724_H0711:183a-22: gtsang mar gyur pa lan bdun byas chu bor zhugs
K12D0724_H0711:183a-23: shing thal mo sbyar te yongs su bzlas nas shar
K12D0724_H0711:183a-24: du mngon par phyogs pas gtor bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:183a-25: bgegs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing las kyi dngos grub kyang 'byung ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:183a-26: snying gar mthe bong byin nas lan gcig bzlas na
K12D0724_H0711:183b-0: lha rnams kyis @183b byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:183b-1: // bdag nyid rnam par dge par yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:183b-2: de'i phyag rgya'ang 'dir sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:183b-3: bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur zhing las kyi dngos grub kyang 'byung ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:183b-4: snying gar mthe bong byin nas lan gcig bzlas na lha rnams kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:183b-5: bdag nyid rnam par dag par yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:183b-6: de'i phyag rgya'ang 'dir sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:183b-7: de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho gar 'gyur te mnyams pa'i ras skra dang bral ba /
K12D0724_H0711:183b-9: ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis ri mo mkhan gso sbyong
K12D0724_H0711:183b-10: can gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir
K12D0724_H0711:183b-11: gzhug par bya'o // padma'i snying po la 'dug pa /
K12D0724_H0711:183b-12: stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can /
K12D0724_H0711:183b-13: ral pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12D0724_H0711:183b-15: phyag na bya ma bum thogs pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:183b-16: padma dkar po'i 'dab ma bsnams pa /
K12D0724_H0711:183b-17: g-yon gyi gzhogs su lha mo 'phags ma dkar mo chen mo seng+ge'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa /
K12D0724_H0711:183b-20: sgrub pa po ni sngon bzhin no //
K12D0724_H0711:183b-21: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:183b-22: nas zan bza' zhing bris sku'i spyan sngar sngon du bsnyen pa bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:183b-23: dri zhim po'i me tog lag pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:184a-1: rig pa 'dzin pas de bzhin du dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:184a-5: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ke ti shva ra ya /
K12D0724_H0711:184a-14: su ru me karma s'a dh'a ya /

K12D0724_H0711:199b-27: yatstshe sarba stv'a hi t'arth'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:199b-28: stobs chen pos pha rol gnon pa'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:199b-29: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K12D0724_H0711:199b-30: gang du gnas pa bkug nas gnod sbyin thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:199b-31: kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa'i mthu las phyag
K12D0724_H0711:199b-32: na rdo rjes gsang ba'i dbang po phran tshegs ma
K12D0724_H0711:199b-33: yin pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan
K12D0724_H0711:200a-0: @200a *// sems can gyi don la brtson par sems pas gang
K12D0724_H0711:200a-1: la la sgrol ma sgrub pa de'i dngos grub nges
K12D0724_H0711:200a-2: par byin cig phyed phyed rtag tu phan pas bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:200a-3: // sems can thams cad kyis de dran par byas
K12D0724_H0711:200a-4: nas lha mo sgrol ma 'di lus can rnams bsrung
K12D0724_H0711:200a-7: gang bdag gis bka' mi byed na phyag na rdo rjes gsang ba'i bdag po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:200a-8: rdo rje 'chang ba stobs chen pos mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:200a-9: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sngon ma can 'di
K12D0724_H0711:200a-10: ni mthu chen po thob pa gnod sbyin thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:200a-11: 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal
K12D0724_H0711:200a-12: po bklags pa tsam gyis gdug pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:200a-13: 'jigs pa thams cad las srung ba'o //
K12D0724_H0711:200a-14: de nas 'di sgrub pa'i thabs brjod par bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:200a-15: sngar gsungs pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga 'phags pa
K12D0724_H0711:200a-16: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug par bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:200a-17: / ral pa gyen du brdzes pa /
K12D0724_H0711:200a-18: padma'i sdong po phyag na bsnams pa /
K12D0724_H0711:200a-19: phyag na padma g-yang gzhi nag po 'phyang ba /
K12D0724_H0711:200a-21: skyil krung gis bzhugs pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:200b-0: g-yas kyi gzhogs su gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen @200b po dag bri bar bya ba la /
K12D0724_H0711:200b-9: dpa' bo bzang po'i bu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:200b-11: chu la sems te de lta bu la sogs pa
K12D0724_H0711:200b-12: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po mang po 'drir gzhug par
K12D0724_H0711:200b-13: bya ste khug ma dang sa bon gyis gang ba
K12D0724_H0711:200b-14: phyag na bsnams pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams
K12D0724_H0711:200b-16: g-yon gyi gzhogs su rnam par rgyal ba'i mtha' dang /
K12D0724_H0711:200b-17: sdong po dang; rnam rgyal thob pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:200b-19: mkha' lding rgyal po zhes pa gnod sbyin gyi sde
K12D0724_H0711:200b-20: dpon 'di rnams thams cad sngar bzhin kha dog ljang
K12D0724_H0711:200b-21: gu'o // bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas su rig pa
K12D0724_H0711:200b-22: 'dzin pa'ang lag na spos phor thogs pa sngar bzhin
K12D0724_H0711:200b-23: gu'o // no // rgyu skar skag la 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:200b-24: de nas ras ris ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12D0724_H0711:200b-25: phyogs gtsang ma gzhan du bzhugs su gsol nas sngags 'dis spyan drang bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:200b-26: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:200b-27: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:200b-28: na ma: yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12D0724_H0711:200b-29: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:200b-33: dza ye bi dza ye aa gu ru ae hi ae hi sth'a n'am/
K12D0724_H0711:201a-1: ba ha sh'anti ka ra sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:201a-3: gnod sbyin thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:201a-4: na mo ratna tra y'a ya; na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:201a-5: na ma:sarba yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12D0724_H0711:201a-6: na mo a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:201a-9: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:201a-10: ra ra ra ra shanti bi dza ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:201a-12: bdug pa la sogs pa thams cad dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:201a-13: de bzhin du ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:201a-14: zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas bcom ldan 'das la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:201a-15: 'o ma'i zan gyis gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:201a-16: g-yas kyi gzhogs su gnas pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:201a-18: g-yon gyi gzhogs su bris pa rnams la til dang /
K12D0724_H0711:201a-19: til gyi thug pa dbul bar bya'o; ;spyan ras gzigs
K12D0724_H0711:201a-20: dbang phyug la aa ga ru'i bdug pa dbul lo
K12D0724_H0711:201a-22: phreng ba sna ma'i me tog dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:201a-23: g-yas kyi gzhogs su gnas pa'i sde dpon rnams la thang chu lnga'i bdug pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:201a-24: ka ra b'i ra dkar po'i me tog go /
K12D0724_H0711:201a-25: g-yon gyi gzhogs su sra rtsi pog gi bdug pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:201b-0: aa ti mukta @201b ka'i me tog dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:201b-1: de ltar ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:201b-2: de nas dus gsum du de bzhin du mchod pa bya zhing 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:201b-3: nas zan bza' zhing padma dkar po re re la
K12D0724_H0711:201b-4: yongs su bzlas nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bcom
K12D0724_H0711:201b-6: de ltar ji srid 'bum phrag gcig gi mthar bris
K12D0724_H0711:201b-7: pa'i gnod sbyin thams cad rdzu 'phrul ston par byed
K12D0724_H0711:201b-9: me tog g-yo ba thun mtshams su mthong ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:201b-10: de nas grub par 'gyur te gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:201b-11: nam mkha' la'ang grub bo zhes pa'i sgra thos so //
K12D0724_H0711:201b-12: rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog stsol bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:201b-13: tshol ba de gnod sbyin gyi bka' byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:201b-14: ma grub na las thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:201b-15: rtag tu rmi lam du gnod sbyin rnams dge ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:201b-16: mi dge ba mthong ba sbyin par byed do; ;bcom
K12D0724_H0711:201b-17: ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen
K12D0724_H0711:201b-18: brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan
K12D0724_H0711:201b-20: nges par skyes pa gnod sbyin thams cad kun tu
K12D0724_H0711:201b-21: 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen
K12D0724_H0711:202a-0: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa @202a *//
K12D0724_H0711:202a-1: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'byung po'i bdag po lha'i bu dbang ldan la smras pa /
K12D0724_H0711:202a-2: lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul chen po can /
K12D0724_H0711:202a-3: khyod kyi rigs bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ba /
K12D0724_H0711:202a-4: bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal po chen mo rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po bshad par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:202a-5: de la sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams ni 'jig rten
K12D0724_H0711:202a-6: pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i sngags su yang dag
K12D0724_H0711:202a-7: par 'dod do // na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:202a-8: na ma a'arya aa pa lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:202a-11: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:202a-13: ai sha na ku la ma ba tu yi shya mi /
K12D0724_H0711:202a-15: a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a te dza
K12D0724_H0711:202a-16: na ra ra ra ra ra bi pu tsi bi
K12D0724_H0711:202a-18: pra ma tha pra ma tha /
K12D0724_H0711:202a-27: bha ga b'a na a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:202a-28: pa ra ma hri pa yi /
K12D0724_H0711:202a-29: dha ra yi shya ti ai shv'a ra sya bi po ma ti tv'am pra s'am tha /
K12D0724_H0711:202a-38: b'i tyo kri ta ha ti kri ta yaksha kri ta /
K12D0724_H0711:202a-39: na ma a'arya aa pa lo ki te shva r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:202a-40: dbang ldan gyi rigs kun nas 'dren pa'i sngags byang
K12D0724_H0711:202a-41: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhal
K12D0724_H0711:202b-0: @202b nas gsungs pa lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul chen po
K12D0724_H0711:202b-2: sa steng gi mi sems can gyi don 'dod pa
K12D0724_H0711:202b-3: rnams kyi 'dod pa sgrub pa'i don du sngags 'di
K12D0724_H0711:202b-4: rab tu gsungs so; ;gang 'di sgrub pa'i sgrub pa
K12D0724_H0711:202b-5: po gang la la dngos grub 'dod pa la khyod
K12D0724_H0711:202b-6: kyis de la mchog sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:202b-7: sems can gyi don la brtson pa'i bsam pa can bye ba phrag bcu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:202b-8: rang gi rab tu gsungs pa'i sngags rnams sa stong
K12D0724_H0711:202b-9: du sgrub pa la lha rnams 'gugs pa rab tu
K12D0724_H0711:202b-10: brjod pa'i sngags 'di stobs chen po sgrub pa dang
K12D0724_H0711:202b-11: / rig pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can gyi sgrol ma de'i gzi brjid dang /
K12D0724_H0711:202b-13: 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis skyobs shig /
K12D0724_H0711:202b-14: de nas 'di'i sgrub pa'i cho gar 'gyur te /
K12D0724_H0711:202b-15: sngar brjod pa'i cho gas ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12D0724_H0711:202b-16: gser gyi mdog ltar snang ba /
K12D0724_H0711:202b-17: phyag na padma g-yas kyis mchog sbyin pa /
K12D0724_H0711:202b-18: phyag g-yon pas padma bsnams pa /
K12D0724_H0711:202b-20: spyi bor bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:202b-21: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g-yas su
K12D0724_H0711:202b-22: yangs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
K12D0724_H0711:202b-23: 'dzin gyi gzugs can gyi byang chub sems dpa' la
K12D0724_H0711:203a-1: dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:203a-2: g-yon gyi gzhogs su dbang ldan la sogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams bri bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:203a-3: gang gi tshe mig gsum pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:203a-4: sngar brjod pa'i gnas su ras ris 'di'i steng gi
K12D0724_H0711:203a-5: phyogs kyi cha rnams su bzhag nas nag po'i bcu
K12D0724_H0711:203a-6: bzhi pa nas brtsams te mchod pa'i cho ga bya
K12D0724_H0711:203a-7: zhing 'di nyid kyis 'bum bzlas par bya ste sngon
K12D0724_H0711:203a-8: du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:203a-9: nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa nag po'i bcu
K12D0724_H0711:203a-10: bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
K12D0724_H0711:203a-11: dkar po'i gtor ma dbul bar bya zhing aa ga
K12D0724_H0711:203a-12: ru dang / du rushka'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:203a-13: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'o ma
K12D0724_H0711:203a-14: dang lhan cig pa'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing
K12D0724_H0711:203a-15: kha dog thams cad du snang ba thams cad 'dod
K12D0724_H0711:203a-16: pa'i rigs la zho dang; bu ram gyi bza' ba
K12D0724_H0711:203a-17: dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:203a-18: ras ris kyi phyi rol du 'byung po thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:203a-19: pa'i gtor ma dbul zhing dge slong rnams la yon
K12D0724_H0711:203a-20: dang bcas pa'i ston mo dbul lo //
K12D0724_H0711:203a-21: phyugs bdag rnams la zho zan dbul zhing de'i zhi ba thob par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:203b-0: ji srid du zla ba nya ba'i bar du dus gsum @203b du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:203b-1: de nas srod nas brtsams nas ji srid dngos grub
K12D0724_H0711:203b-2: kyi mtshan ma dbang ldan gyi mig 'phro bar byed
K12D0724_H0711:203b-3: pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o; ;'dir dngos grub
K12D0724_H0711:203b-4: kyi mtshan ma byung ba de nas me tog phreng
K12D0724_H0711:203b-5: ba dbul bar bya zhing gu gul gyi bdug pa
K12D0724_H0711:203b-6: dbul lo // gang dka' thub pa rnams kyis ji ltar byung ba zos nas yon dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:203b-7: de nas thams cad byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:203b-11: gos la sogs pa la mngon par sngags nas gang
K12D0724_H0711:203b-12: la byin pa de bran nyid du nye bar gnas
K12D0724_H0711:203b-13: so // rgyal srid kyi longs spyod 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:203b-15: 'o thug gis sbyin sreg bya ste 'bum phrag gcig
K12D0724_H0711:203b-16: gis mthar rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtsug phud 'bar bar
K12D0724_H0711:203b-17: 'gyur ro // chad pa dbang du bya bar 'dod
K12D0724_H0711:203b-18: na ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo gsum thun
K12D0724_H0711:203b-20: til gyi thug pa'i sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:203b-21: bu mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na ras ris
K12D0724_H0711:203b-22: kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo gsum thun gsum du dang
K12D0724_H0711:203b-23: po btsas pa'i 'o ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:203b-25: phyugs kyi bdag po rnams dbang du bya bar 'dod
K12D0724_H0711:203b-26: na thal ba'i sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:204a-1: du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na de ji srid 'jig
K12D0724_H0711:204a-2: rten pa'i las las 'das pa rnam pa sna tshogs
K12D0724_H0711:204a-3: pa'i sa'i steng gi mi rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
K12D0724_H0711:204a-4: thams cad byed de sngags 'di la the tshom med
K12D0724_H0711:204a-5: do // 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes
K12D0724_H0711:204a-6: kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa yangs pa dang ldan pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:204a-7: ting nge 'dzin las nges par skyes pa dbang ldan
K12D0724_H0711:204a-8: gyi rigs kun tu 'ong ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po
K12D0724_H0711:204a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0724_H0711:204a-11: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slar yang yangs pa dang
K12D0724_H0711:204a-12: ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po sgom bzhin
K12D0724_H0711:204a-13: du sems can la rjes su brtse bas bcom ldan
K12D0724_H0711:204a-14: 'das ma rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por 'jug par
K12D0724_H0711:204a-15: byed bzhin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po
K12D0724_H0711:204a-16: rjes su dran nas gsungs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:204a-17: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:204a-18: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:204a-21: na mo bidy'a r'a dz'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:204a-24: karsha karsha bha shi she bidy'a dha ra gu hye
K12D0724_H0711:204a-25: ka ma nu sm'a ra buddha satye na dharma satv'a
K12D0724_H0711:204a-26: n'a / sam gha sa tye na /
K12D0724_H0711:204a-27: a'arya aa ba lo ki shva r'a sa tye na /
K12D0724_H0711:204a-28: sidhyantu me mantra pa d'a phat phat y'a /
K12D0724_H0711:204a-30: sa ma tha sa m'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:204a-31: auddha ram te ko ka r'ante ma nu sm'a ra ta /
K12D0724_H0711:204b-0: hri da ta sa k'a r'a to ti ka @204b ta te sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:204b-1: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa 'jug par byed
K12D0724_H0711:204b-2: bzhin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen
K12D0724_H0711:204b-3: po bzlas pas gdug pa de thams cad 'jigs par
K12D0724_H0711:204b-5: rig pa thams cad zlog par byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:204b-6: mdor na re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:204b-7: de nas 'di'i sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur te bcom
K12D0724_H0711:204b-8: ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dir bzhugs par
K12D0724_H0711:204b-9: bya ste sku mdog dkar po /
K12D0724_H0711:204b-12: phyag g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa; phyag g-yon pas padma bsnams pa /
K12D0724_H0711:204b-13: gser gyi them skas bzang po la 'jug bzhin pa bri bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:204b-18: ne tso la sogs pa rab tu bsngags pa'i bya
K12D0724_H0711:204b-19: rnams g-yas kyi g-yas su 'jug pa skor ba byed
K12D0724_H0711:204b-21: mi'am ci gnyis glu len bzhin pa bri bar bya
K12D0724_H0711:204b-22: ste g-yon pas rna ba 'gebs ba bri bar bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:204b-23: // sgrub po'ang 'og tu kha phyogs pa spos phor lag na thogs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:204b-24: bcom ldan 'das 'jug par byed bzhin pa la lta bar byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:204b-26: g-yas kyi 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'od kyis mnan pa bri bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:205a-0: rnam pa de lta bu'i ras ris 'drir @205a *//
K12D0724_H0711:205a-1: bcug nas sngar brjod pa'i gnas su ras ris bzhugs su gsol te yang dag par brtsam par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:205a-2: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:205a-3: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:205a-6: dza ti hu ti ma ma aa b'a tady'a sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:205a-8: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /

K12D0724_H0711:210a-15: na ma: padma he st'a y'a /
K12D0724_H0711:210a-16: na mo manda la shi kh'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:210a-17: na mo aa sh'i tyan'u byam dza na /

K12D0724_H0711:210a-19: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa dpe byad brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:210a-20: cu'i rjes su byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:210a-21: rgyal po chen po sgrol ma'i rtog pa don chen
K12D0724_H0711:210a-22: po sbyin pa ste gang la la 'di dran par
K12D0724_H0711:210a-23: byed pa de'i don thams cad grub par 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:210a-24: // de nas 'di'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ni rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung ngam /
