K12D0724_H0711:210b-0: / bdug pa la sogs pa ji @210b ltar 'byor
K12D0724_H0711:210b-1: pas re re'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgyad bzlas par
K12D0724_H0711:210b-2: / bya'o // ji srid du mchod rten stong phrag brgyad po rdzogs kyi bar du'o //

K12D0724_H0711:211a-2: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /

K12D0724_H0711:211a-6: mah'a ka ru ni k'a ya /

K12D0724_H0711:211a-20: sarba k'a tyam ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:211a-21: 'di ni mthu chen po thob pa yon tan gyi rgyan zhes bya ba /

K12D0724_H0711:211a-31: ;g-yas kyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0724_H0711:211b-0: @211b bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o //

K12D0724_H0711:211b-2: thogs pa pus mo btsugs pa ste sngar bzhin no
K12D0724_H0711:211b-3: // ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris de bzhugs su gsol nas tshes grangs dang /

K12D0724_H0711:253a-1: po'i g-yas kyi lus la rig pa brgyad brgyar bzlas te khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:253a-3: 'od ma lhags pa blangs nas lcags gsum gyis de la dkri bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:253a-4: de nas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dur khrod du song nas dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:253a-6: bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:253a-7: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'ang byas nas de
K12D0724_H0711:253a-8: nas sgrub pa pos thod pa lag pa g-yon pas
K12D0724_H0711:253a-9: blangs te lag pa g-yas pas mnan nas ji srid
K12D0724_H0711:253a-10: ca co'i sgra sgrogs pa de srid du rig pa
K12D0724_H0711:253a-11: bzlas par bya'o // rig pa dran pas blang bar
K12D0724_H0711:253a-12: bya ste blangs pa tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:253a-13: ro; ;sa'i cha drug 'phrog cing lo stong du 'tsho'o
K12D0724_H0711:253a-15: lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:253a-16: nag po'i brgyad pa la bud med shi ba de'i
K12D0724_H0711:253a-17: lce blangs nas lcags gsum gyis dkris te yid rlung
K12D0724_H0711:253a-18: ltar 'gro'o // 'di'i tshangs par sbyad pas 'dod pa
K12D0724_H0711:253a-19: rnams la sems bskyed na de gcig pu 'jig rten
K12D0724_H0711:253a-20: gyi khams su 'gro zhing bskal ba chen por gnas
K12D0724_H0711:253a-21: ltar 'gro'o // so // yid kyis skye ba 'dzin par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:253a-22: gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dur khrod du
K12D0724_H0711:253b-0: zla ba drug @253b rig pa bzlas na mi snang
K12D0724_H0711:253b-2: 'ug pa'i mig sman dang lhan cig btags par bya /
K12D0724_H0711:253b-3: lcags gsum gyis dkris pa'i ril bu byas nas dbang
K12D0724_H0711:253b-4: phyug chen po'i g-yas kyi lus la kham phor kha
K12D0724_H0711:253b-5: sbyar du bzhag par byas nas lag pa g-yas pas
K12D0724_H0711:253b-6: mnan te rig pa dam pa dpag tu med pa
K12D0724_H0711:253b-7: bzlas par bya ste ji srid du rnam par chad
K12D0724_H0711:253b-8: do'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:253b-9: // rig pa dran pas ril bu blangs te khar bcug na mi snang par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:253b-10: lo stong phrag gnyis su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:253b-14: padma ge sar mnyam par 'gro ba'i rdzas mnyam par byas te lcags gsum gyis dkri bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:253b-15: rgyal la sbyor ba rnam par shes par bya zhing
K12D0724_H0711:253b-16: de nas bsgrub par bya zhing sha za sgrub par
K12D0724_H0711:253b-17: 'dod pas dur khrod du ba lang gi pags pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:253b-18: tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas
K12D0724_H0711:253b-19: nas sha dang / chang la sogs pa'i gtor ma
K12D0724_H0711:253b-20: byas te kha shar du phyogs par mi'i skra la
K12D0724_H0711:253b-21: khrag gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas
K12D0724_H0711:253b-22: na sha za thams cad 'ong ste 'jigs bar mi
K12D0724_H0711:253b-23: bya zhing srung bar yang mi bya bar 'di skad
K12D0724_H0711:253b-25: bdag gi dbang du gyur cig ces brjod pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:254a-2: de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod pa dang mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:254a-3: nyi ma re re la'ang dong tse lnga lnga ster bar byed do de rnams kyang zad par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:254a-4: dur khrod du yi dvags dri med nyid kyi ming nas smos pa dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:254a-5: dur khrod du gzugs brnyan byas nas rkang pa la phur bus gdab par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:254a-6: de nas rig pa bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:254a-7: de la'ang ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad tsam gyi
K12D0724_H0711:254a-8: dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas mchod pa rgya chen
K12D0724_H0711:254a-9: po byas nas rig pa 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:254a-10: dur khrod du til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:254a-11: bya ste nyi ma bdun du mtshan mo sbyin sreg
K12D0724_H0711:254a-12: bya'o // nyi ma re re la dngul lnga lnga sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:254a-13: ku mu ta la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:254a-15: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na nges par mthong ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:254a-16: dur khrod kyi thal ba la gzugs brnyan byas te
K12D0724_H0711:254a-17: de la nye bar 'dug nas aarga'i shing la me
K12D0724_H0711:254a-18: sbar nas dri zhim po'i til mar gyis btags pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:254a-19: sna ma'i me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:254a-20: byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:254a-21: cho ga 'di kho nas ming nas smos na l'anydza'i rgyal po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:254a-23: bud med dbang du byed na aa ti mukta'i me
K12D0724_H0711:254b-0: tog gi sbyin @254b sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:254b-1: te nyi ma bdun nas yid kyis gang gi tshe
K12D0724_H0711:254b-3: dur khrod du song nas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs
K12D0724_H0711:254b-4: te sha chen gyis sbyin sreg byas nas nyi ma
K12D0724_H0711:254b-5: bdun pa la sha zas zin pa rnams bltas pas
K12D0724_H0711:254b-7: dur khrod du sha chen gyis sbyin sreg stong phrag
K12D0724_H0711:254b-8: bcu byas na sha za thams cad kyang dbang du
K12D0724_H0711:254b-9: 'gyur ro // ne le'i spu'i sbyin sreg stong phrag
K12D0724_H0711:254b-10: brgyad byas na 'byung po thams cad kyang dbang du
K12D0724_H0711:254b-11: 'gyur ro // 'gyur ro // dur khrod du bshang
K12D0724_H0711:254b-12: ba'i sbyin sreg byas na srul po'i zin pa rnams
K12D0724_H0711:254b-14: khrag gis sbyin sreg byas na mkha' 'gro ma rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:254b-15: dur khrod du botta ka'i sbyin sreg byas na'ang sha za mi 'ong ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:254b-16: sbrul gyi shun pa'i sbyin sreg byas na sbrul rnams 'bros par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:254b-17: de nas sgrub pa pos gtor ma byas nas aarga'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:254b-18: rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can gyi gnod sbyin ma
K12D0724_H0711:254b-19: 'ong bar 'gyur te 'jigs par mi bya bar rig
K12D0724_H0711:254b-22: de de'i tshe mchog gsum po rnams kyi gcig 'dam du stsal te /
K12D0724_H0711:255a-0: ma ni bu'i bya ba thams cad byed @255a *//
K12D0724_H0711:255a-1: do; ;sring mo ni nyi ma re re la dong tse re ster bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:255a-2: chung ma ni de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed
K12D0724_H0711:255a-3: de lo lnga brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro; ;gang gi
K12D0724_H0711:255a-4: tshe rig pa 'dzin pa nyams pa de'i tshe 'di
K12D0724_H0711:255a-5: bya'o // mtshan mo gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos
K12D0724_H0711:255a-6: te bsrung ba byas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K12D0724_H0711:255a-7: dang; 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12D0724_H0711:255a-9: bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod ba byas nas shar
K12D0724_H0711:255a-10: du phyogs pas rig pa'i lha thams cad la bdug
K12D0724_H0711:255a-11: spos phul nas rig pa 'dzin pas dug la khrag
K12D0724_H0711:255a-12: gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:255a-13: ku sha bting ba la nyal lo //
K12D0724_H0711:255a-14: gal te gzhon nu mdung thung thogs pa mthong na de'i tshe dri zas rdzas nyams par byas pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:255a-15: gang gi tshe bram ze mthong na de'i tshe lha rnams kyis nyams par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:255a-16: gang gi tshe rdo rje mthong na de'i tshe rdo
K12D0724_H0711:255a-17: rje'i rigs kyis rdzas nyams par byas par 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:255a-18: // gang gi tshe dga' ba mthong na de'i tshe
K12D0724_H0711:255a-19: nam mkha' lding gis nyams par byas pa'o; ;gang gi
K12D0724_H0711:255a-20: tshe lha min rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i
K12D0724_H0711:255a-22: gang gi tshe klu rnams kyi nyams par byas pa
K12D0724_H0711:255b-0: de'i tshe sbos kyi glang po'i rgyal @255b po mthong
K12D0724_H0711:255b-1: ngo // gang gi tshe pha rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i tshe mthong ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:255b-2: gang gi tshe mi gtsang bas nyams par byas pa
K12D0724_H0711:255b-3: de'i tshe glang po'i phags pa gyon pa'i dbang phyug
K12D0724_H0711:255b-5: gang gi tshe gnod sbyin rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i tshe nor bu bzang po mthong ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:255b-6: gang gi tshe sha za rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i tshe skyes bu gcer bu mthong ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:255b-7: gang gi tshe 'byung po rnams kyis nyams par byas pa de'i tshe sbrin mthong ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:255b-8: aarga'i yam shing gis me sbar nas mar dang; sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:255b-9: sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:255b-10: dri za rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni rnam par dben
K12D0724_H0711:255b-11: pa'i phyogs su ba byung gis dkyil 'khor nye bar
K12D0724_H0711:255b-12: byugs te bcom ldan 'das la gtor ma'ang phul nas
K12D0724_H0711:255b-13: ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste k'amba dza'i
K12D0724_H0711:255b-16: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:255b-17: sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa na rdzas lag tu
K12D0724_H0711:255b-18: phyin par 'gyur ro; ;rdo rje'i rigs la'ang sbyin sreg
K12D0724_H0711:255b-19: ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri
K12D0724_H0711:256a-0: bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod cing bcom @256a *//
K12D0724_H0711:256a-1: ldan 'das la'ang gtor ma'i cho ga byas la de
K12D0724_H0711:256a-2: nas sgrub pa pos kha shar du phyogs la gu
K12D0724_H0711:256a-3: gul gyi ril bus sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas
K12D0724_H0711:256a-4: na rdzas lag tu phyin par gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:256a-5: nam mkha' lding rnams la dur khrod du mandal la nye bar byugs pa byas nas mchod pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:256a-6: gtor ma'ang ji ltar 'byor pa bya ste ka ra
K12D0724_H0711:256a-7: b'i ra'i me tog la sogs pa'i mar gyis btags
K12D0724_H0711:256a-8: pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag
K12D0724_H0711:256a-10: lha ma yin rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni dbang phyug
K12D0724_H0711:256a-11: chen po la dri sna tshogs kyis mchod pa dang
K12D0724_H0711:256a-12: / bcom ldan 'das la'ang gtor ma byas nas g-yas
K12D0724_H0711:256a-13: kyi lus la shar du phyogs pas ka ra b'i
K12D0724_H0711:256a-14: ra'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas
K12D0724_H0711:256a-15: na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:256a-16: ma mo'i sbyin sreg ni smin pa'i zas dang /
K12D0724_H0711:256a-17: sha'i gtor ma phul nas phag pa'i rul ma la
K12D0724_H0711:256a-18: chang gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas
K12D0724_H0711:256a-19: na rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:256a-20: gnod sbyin rnams kyi sbyin sreg bya ba ni phyag
K12D0724_H0711:256a-21: na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:256a-22: gtor ma phul nas kha shar du phyogs nas aarga'i
K12D0724_H0711:256a-23: me tog gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyar byas na
K12D0724_H0711:256b-0: @256b rdzas lag tu phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:256b-1: sha za rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni dur khrod du
K12D0724_H0711:256b-2: dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas til gyi
K12D0724_H0711:256b-3: til mar gyis btags pa'i nim pa'i me tog gis
K12D0724_H0711:256b-4: sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu
K12D0724_H0711:256b-6: 'byung po rnams kyi sbyin sreg ni dur khrod kyi
K12D0724_H0711:256b-7: thal bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas gtor ma'ang
K12D0724_H0711:256b-8: ci 'byor pa phul te ba lang gi sha'i sbyin
K12D0724_H0711:256b-9: sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag tu phyin
K12D0724_H0711:256b-10: par 'gyur ro // yi dvags rnams la n'ir ma
K12D0724_H0711:256b-11: la'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas lag
K12D0724_H0711:256b-13: bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ma mo dang /
K12D0724_H0711:256b-17: sha za thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u bcu pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0724_H0711:256b-18: ma bsgrubs yang yang las su 'gyur te char ma
K12D0724_H0711:256b-19: babs pa la chur zhugs te rig pa bzlas na
K12D0724_H0711:256b-20: nyi ma bdun gyis char 'bab bo //
K12D0724_H0711:256b-21: khu ba 'ching ba la srad bus so //
K12D0724_H0711:256b-22: myos pa rnam par 'joms pa rnams la dur khrod kyi thal bas so //
K12D0724_H0711:256b-23: bsung ba la ni rgya skyegs kyis so //
K12D0724_H0711:256b-24: gzer gyis nyam thag pa la aardza nas zug rngu dang bral bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:257a-2: gcod par byed chu gri dang gsum gyis mche ba 'jug par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:257a-3: gu gul gyi bdug pas gnas nas skrod par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:257a-4: 'di rnams ma bsgrubs par yang byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:257a-8: 'di bdag dpe'i don du 'chang bar byed /
K12D0724_H0711:257a-9: klog par byed pa de bzhin du 'di'ang gtsang ma
K12D0724_H0711:257a-10: bgos pas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste
K12D0724_H0711:257a-11: bklags par bya ste cho ga 'di nyi ma bdun
K12D0724_H0711:257a-12: du bklag pa byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:257a-13: char ches na grog mkhar la 'dzegs te bcom ldan
K12D0724_H0711:257a-14: 'das ma stong phrag brgyad nye bar bzlas na de
K12D0724_H0711:257a-15: nas nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:257a-18: bdug pa gang la sbyin par bya ste rig pa thams cad 'gugs pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:257a-22: rig pa thams cad gsod pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:257a-23: gdug pa'i yid skrag pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:257a-25: des 'di'i las bya ste gur gum gyis chus rmongs par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:257a-26: ser mos sbrul 'gugs par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:257a-28: padma'i rtsa ba las skyes pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:257b-0: me tog bzang po rnams kyis @257b 'byin par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:257b-1: bdug spos kyis smra bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:257b-2: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog gis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:257b-3: aa ka ru'i bdug pas 'phral du bdug pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:257b-4: bcom ldan 'das ma'i las stong rtsa brgyad po 'di
K12D0724_H0711:257b-5: rnams rab tu sbyar bar bya ste yam shing gi
K12D0724_H0711:257b-6: mtshan nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba rtsa ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:257b-7: rked pa dang; rtse mo'ang bskrad pa'i don gyis sdong bu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:257b-9: rked pas ni nor 'dod pas so //
K12D0724_H0711:257b-10: rtse mos ni zhi ba can dang /
K12D0724_H0711:257b-12: nor 'dod pas tho rangs kyi dus su gnod sbyin yongs su rgyu bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:257b-13: des na de'i nor sbyin pa'i las kyi dngos grub du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:257b-14: bskrad par 'dod pas bar du gnas pas mtshan mo'i snga ma la rtsa ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:257b-15: sdigs mdzub kyi tshad tsam la dug dang /
K12D0724_H0711:257b-16: khrag gis btags pas dur khrod kyi me la sbyin
K12D0724_H0711:257b-17: sreg bya'o; ;mtshan mo phyed nas yi dvags rab tu
K12D0724_H0711:257b-18: rgyu ste des de las mngon spyod kyi las rab
K12D0724_H0711:257b-20: sgrub pa chen po la khru'i tshad kyi yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /
K12D0724_H0711:257b-21: mar gyis btags pas kha shar du phyogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:257b-22: des sgrub pa po de'i sgrub pa chen po sgrub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:258a-0: dbang du byed pa la byang @258a *//
K12D0724_H0711:258a-1: chub kyi shing gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:258a-2: sdigs mdzub kyi tshad tsam 'dis so //
K12D0724_H0711:258a-3: nyin zhag bdun du nyi ma 'char kar aa p'a
K12D0724_H0711:258a-4: marga'i yam shing khrag gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg byas
K12D0724_H0711:258a-6: rnam pa gzhan du ma yin no //
K12D0724_H0711:258a-7: nad bskyed par 'dod na p'a n'a ya'i ril ma'i
K12D0724_H0711:258a-8: sbyin sreg nyi ma bdun du byas na nad bskyed
K12D0724_H0711:258a-9: par byed do // ming nas smos nas sgrub par 'gyur te rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:258a-10: bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo'i le'u bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12D0724_H0711:258a-11: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs
K12D0724_H0711:258a-12: ris kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i cho ga gsungs so
K12D0724_H0711:258a-13: // sgrub pa pos phug gi sgo ru dur khrod
K12D0724_H0711:258a-14: du gos gtsang ma bgos pas ku sha'i khres la
K12D0724_H0711:258a-15: nye bar 'dug ste phug gi sgo la mngon par
K12D0724_H0711:258a-16: phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par
K12D0724_H0711:258a-17: 'gro ma stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya ste thams
K12D0724_H0711:258a-19: dogs pa med par rab tu 'jug par bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:258a-20: lha ma yin sel bzhes bya ba'i rig pa dran
K12D0724_H0711:258a-21: bzhin pas rab tu blang bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:258a-22: bud med la dga' ba dang bcas pas yongs su
K12D0724_H0711:258a-23: bzlas nas gtogs par bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:258b-0: // @258b de nas sgrub pa pos gsum pos 'di
K12D0724_H0711:258b-1: byed par 'dod pas ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te snying
K12D0724_H0711:258b-2: po mnyam par 'gro ma 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par
K12D0724_H0711:258b-3: // bya'o // de nas ba lang gi pags pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:258b-4: tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor la tsandan na dmar pos
K12D0724_H0711:258b-5: nye bar byugs te srung ba byas nas ku sha'i
K12D0724_H0711:258b-6: khres la nye bar 'dug ste phug gi sgo la
K12D0724_H0711:258b-7: mngon par phyogs pas rig pa snying po mnyam par
K12D0724_H0711:258b-8: 'gro mas aa p'a marga'i yam shing la dug dang
K12D0724_H0711:258b-9: // bya'o // / khrag gis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:258b-10: de nas sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa nas thal ba la yongs su bzlas nas gtor bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:258b-11: gsum po 'dir 'gyur te dogs pa med par rab
K12D0724_H0711:258b-12: tu 'jug par bya zhing lha ma yin gyi bu
K12D0724_H0711:258b-13: mo des mthong nas dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:258b-14: de nas sgrub pa'i rdzas de blang bar bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:258b-15: gang 'dod pa de rig pas mngon par sngags nas
K12D0724_H0711:258b-16: blang bar bya'o // 'khor los sems can thams cad dang /
K12D0724_H0711:258b-17: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:258b-19: skar ma gnas kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:258b-20: de bzhin du ldong ros dang /
K12D0724_H0711:259a-1: chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa rnams kyis zla ba nyi ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:259a-2: skar ma'i bar du 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:259a-5: sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K12D0724_H0711:259a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams
K12D0724_H0711:259a-7: su la'ang phyag 'tshal bar mi byed pa ma gtogs
K12D0724_H0711:259a-9: de nas rnam pa gzhan ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i
K12D0724_H0711:259a-10: sngags 'di rnams thams cad bgags par byed pa ni
K12D0724_H0711:259a-12: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs
K12D0724_H0711:259a-13: ris kyis dam pa mchog tu gsang ba gsungs pa
K12D0724_H0711:259a-14: / lha ma yin gyi bu ga'i sgor song nas 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:259a-15: nas zan za bas bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po mnyam par 'gro ma 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:259a-16: lha ma yin gyi bu mo mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:259a-17: de rnams ral gri sbyin pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:259a-18: grub pa'i rdzas gzhan snang bar byed de de blangs
K12D0724_H0711:259a-19: pas rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin
K12D0724_H0711:259a-20: du 'gyur ro; ;lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag
K12D0724_H0711:259a-21: bzangs ris kyis bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma rig
K12D0724_H0711:259a-22: pa'i rgyal mo le'u bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0724_H0711:259b-0: byang chub sems @259b dpa'i sde snod phal po che
K12D0724_H0711:259b-1: las bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rgyal mo'i skyed
K12D0724_H0711:259b-2: par byed pa'i gsang chen zhes pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:259b-3: de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos thams cad dang
K12D0724_H0711:259b-4: ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas bsam
K12D0724_H0711:259b-5: pa rnam par dag pas 'dir bcom ldan 'das ma
K12D0724_H0711:259b-6: 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i don du rtog pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:259b-7: rgyal pos rig pa'i sngags 'jig rten gsum las rnam
K12D0724_H0711:259b-8: par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po
K12D0724_H0711:259b-9: gsungs so // bar skabs 'dir byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0724_H0711:259b-10: chen po'i thugs kar phyogs nas bdud rtsi thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:259b-11: yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
K12D0724_H0711:259b-13: 'od zer des thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten
K12D0724_H0711:259b-14: gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag yongs
K12D0724_H0711:259b-15: su bskor nas sems can rnams snang bar byas te
K12D0724_H0711:259b-16: slar yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i lus su
K12D0724_H0711:259b-18: bar skabs 'di gsungs par gyur pa de gang zhe na /
K12D0724_H0711:259b-19: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:259b-20: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:259b-23: a'a ro lika 'di ni mchog gi snying po 'jig
K12D0724_H0711:259b-24: rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba
K12D0724_H0711:259b-25: de yin te bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol
K12D0724_H0711:260a-0: ma sgrub pa'i cho ga gdon mi za ba @260a
K12D0724_H0711:260a-1: *// kho nar sgrub pa po rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:260a-2: don med ba thams cad zlog par byed pa; sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:260a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags pa de'i sngags so //
K12D0724_H0711:260a-5: tho rangs stan las langs nas gtsang mar gyur pas
K12D0724_H0711:260a-6: khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags te
K12D0724_H0711:260a-7: shar du mngon par phyogs te btung bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:260a-8: las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:260a-9: bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal por zhi ba can gyis las thams cad 'grub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:260a-10: nye bar gnod pa med par dran par 'gyur zhing stobs dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:260a-11: gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:260a-12: lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:260a-13: de bzhin du rgyas pa can ni nyi ma gzhan la 'di rnams bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:260a-14: bar ma la mngon spyod can barna ta rab tu
K12D0724_H0711:260a-15: 'jug pa la ming med kyi sor mo lan bdun
K12D0724_H0711:260a-19: mngon spyod can la sdigs mdzub la bzlas pa nyid kyis de brtsams par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:260a-20: gang la la rnam pa de lta'i cho ga byed pa de la dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:260b-0: bzlas pa'i @260b dus su bdag nyid kyi snying gar 'dis mngon par sngags par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:260b-1: de'i dngos grub nges par brjod do //
K12D0724_H0711:260b-2: sgrol ma'i ched du sgrub pa ni nges par myur bar bshad pa de bzhin du bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:260b-3: sgrub pa pos blo dang ldan pas rig pa thams
K12D0724_H0711:260b-4: cad la de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po stobs
K12D0724_H0711:260b-5: chen po bdag gi sngags kyi rig pa shin tu
K12D0724_H0711:260b-6: dge ba dga' bar rab tu bsgrags so //
K12D0724_H0711:260b-7: sgrub pa pos kyang bdag nyid srung ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:260b-8: dag pa byas la de rtag tu rig pa'i rgyal
K12D0724_H0711:260b-9: po chen po 'di rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po
K12D0724_H0711:260b-10: 'dir bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i thabs
K12D0724_H0711:260b-11: kyi cho ga 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
K12D0724_H0711:260b-12: ba chen po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i las 'ga'
K12D0724_H0711:260b-14: gang la la sgrub pa byed par 'gyur ba de
K12D0724_H0711:260b-15: rnams gdon mi za bar rig pa 'dzin pas byang
K12D0724_H0711:260b-16: chub tu sems bskyed de dkon mchog gsum la mngon
K12D0724_H0711:260b-18: yang 'di'i cho gar 'gyur te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12D0724_H0711:260b-20: gzhan du'ang rung ste gtsang ma'i phyogs su gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:260b-22: rig pa so sor sgrub pa'i ston mo'i bza' ba
K12D0724_H0711:260b-23: yongs su spangs la mchod pa yongs su rdzogs pas
K12D0724_H0711:261a-1: gso sbyong la mi gnas par yang rung ste 'bum phrag phyed dang gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:261a-2: sngon spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:261a-3: mchod pa byas nas bsnyen pa'ang sa ga'i nya'am /
K12D0724_H0711:261a-4: cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi nya la mchod pa byas nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:261a-5: snying po sgrub bar 'gyur ro de nas las rnams
K12D0724_H0711:261a-6: su 'gyur te cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi nya la
K12D0724_H0711:261a-7: aa ka ru'i yam shing zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:261a-9: mar las btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:261a-10: me tog stong phrag brgyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:261a-11: me tog stong phrag brgyad po rnams kyis gzugs brnyan la bsnun par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:261a-12: yang na slar yang mtshan mo thams cad du bzlas na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:261a-13: de nas ma mthong na dong tse lnga rtag tu rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:261a-14: mtshan mo bdun du thun mtshams gsum du mar gyis
K12D0724_H0711:261a-15: btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rgyal
K12D0724_H0711:261a-17: myos byed kyi shing la gzugs brnyan byas nas rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12D0724_H0711:261a-18: rgyal po'i yam shing gis me sbar nas thur mas
K12D0724_H0711:261a-19: rkang pa phug ste thun mtshams gsum du brgyad brgyar
K12D0724_H0711:261b-0: sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma gnyis pa la @261b
K12D0724_H0711:261b-1: rkang ba dag gis 'ong bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:261b-2: mya ngan med pa'i shing gis sor mo drug pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:261b-3: sha la bhanydzi ka byas nas ri'i rtse mor gnas
K12D0724_H0711:261b-5: nas zan bza' zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:261b-6: mthar zla ba nya la mchod pa bya ste mtshan
K12D0724_H0711:261b-7: mo gsum smyung bar gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas
K12D0724_H0711:261b-8: pa'i mchod rten du aa shvattha'i 'dab mar bzhag ste
K12D0724_H0711:261b-9: ji srid 'ongs ba de srid bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:261b-10: legs par 'ongs sam zhes brjod par bya zhing mchog sbyin par bya'o zhes zer na chung ma'am /
K12D0724_H0711:261b-12: grogs mo'ang rung ste bdag nyid dang bcu gnyis la bza' ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:261b-14: dong tse'ang rab tu stsol bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:261b-16: zla ba gza' yis zin pa na rgyud mtshungs pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:261b-17: ba'i mar sar blangs nas sor drug pa'i gzugs brnyan
K12D0724_H0711:261b-19: smyung bar gnas pas aa shvattha'i 'dab mar bzhag nas
K12D0724_H0711:261b-20: ji srid zla ba grol gyi bar bzlas par bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:261b-21: // de la dngos grub rnam pa gsum ste dro
K12D0724_H0711:261b-22: bzhin pa la rkang pas rab tu rgyu ba dang
K12D0724_H0711:261b-23: // / tshe lo lnga brgya thub ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:261b-24: dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'gro bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:261b-25: thams cad du mi snang bar gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:261b-26: du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:261b-27: sor mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa la mi reg pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:261b-29: dpag tshad stong du 'gro bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-1: lo stong phrag gnyis su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-2: rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis mi tshugs so //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-5: mar gyis btags pa'i padma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu'o //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-6: sol ba'i dbus su dpal lha mo'i gzugs padma phyag na bsnams pa kun tu bkod do //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-7: de mchog sbyin par byed de ma'am /
K12D0724_H0711:262a-9: grogs mo gyis shig ces bya bar brjod par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-10: des dong tse stong stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-11: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-12: gso sbyong la gnas pas 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:262a-13: nas zan bza' zhing dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos gcig
K12D0724_H0711:262a-14: nas brtsams nas sngar gyi nas yam shing gi sbyin
K12D0724_H0711:262a-16: nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-17: lte ba tsam gyi chur zhugs nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-18: gter thams cad mthong bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-23: shi ba sogs par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-27: mo gsham la bu ster bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-28: stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags na sdang ba gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:262a-29: rgyal po'i sgor srung ba byas na dgra rnams la mtshams bcad bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:262b-0: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod @262b rten gyi drung du 'bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:262b-1: ras dkar pos bgo ba byas nas ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:262b-2: 'khor stong dang bcas par 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:262b-3: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i las rnams byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:262b-4: ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba /
K12D0724_H0711:262b-5: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan ba /
K12D0724_H0711:262b-7: mchod phyir thogs dkar po can 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0724_H0711:262b-8: gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhin pa
K12D0724_H0711:262b-9: 'di la mchod pa chen po byas nas 'bum phrag
K12D0724_H0711:262b-12: gtsang ma'i phyogs su chu klung 'gram du gso sbyong
K12D0724_H0711:262b-13: la gnas pas mchod rten rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
K12D0724_H0711:262b-14: ba'i snying po can byas nas de la mchod pa
K12D0724_H0711:262b-15: byas te snying po bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:262b-16: bar ma la slar yang mchod rten byas nas nyi
K12D0724_H0711:262b-17: ma nub pa nas ji srid stong phrag brgyad de
K12D0724_H0711:262b-19: de nas cho ga 'dis rig ba 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:262b-20: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang thabs cig
K12D0724_H0711:262b-21: tu bde ba can du 'gro bar byed cing sangs
K12D0724_H0711:262b-22: rgyas mthong ngo // bskal bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:262b-24: rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed na aa p'a marga'i yam shing la mar dang /
K12D0724_H0711:262b-25: sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:263a-0: bud med dang skyes pa dbang du @263a *//
K12D0724_H0711:263a-1: byed pa la thun gsum du gu gul gyi ril
K12D0724_H0711:263a-2: bu'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du
K12D0724_H0711:263a-3: 'gyur ro // aa ga ru'i ril bus stong phrag
K12D0724_H0711:263a-4: brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste skye bo thams cad dga'
K12D0724_H0711:263a-5: 'gyur ro // bar 'gyur ro // rgyal po'i khab tu'ang smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:263a-6: shu dag khar bcug nas ji srid dngos grub rnam
K12D0724_H0711:263a-7: pa gsum du gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:263a-8: // dro bzhin pas ni yid gzhungs shing dpa' bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:263a-9: du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:263a-11: rig pa 'dzin pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0724_H0711:263a-12: phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bcu drug bzlas par
K12D0724_H0711:263a-13: bya'o // slong mo za zhing dus gsum du khrus
K12D0724_H0711:263a-14: byas nas dpa' bo'i stan la nye bar 'dug te
K12D0724_H0711:263a-16: de nas yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'byung ste
K12D0724_H0711:263a-17: lha rnams kyis lhan cig gnas shing gang 'dod pa
K12D0724_H0711:263a-18: de rnyed do // de nas za ma tog dkar
K12D0724_H0711:263a-19: po yi ges dkris pa ldong ros bcug nas ji
K12D0724_H0711:263a-20: srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de
K12D0724_H0711:263a-22: dro bzhin pa la yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:263a-23: du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:263a-25: rig pa 'dzin pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0724_H0711:263b-0: phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bcu drug bzlas @263b
K12D0724_H0711:263b-1: bar bya'o // slong mo za zhing mi smra bar
K12D0724_H0711:263b-2: ku sha bting ba la nyal nas na ga ge
K12D0724_H0711:263b-3: sar gyis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:263b-4: nyi ma bdun pa la 'dod pa'i bu mo rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:263b-5: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:263b-6: nyi ma bdun pa la mchog tu yid gzhungs shing dpa' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:263b-7: dga' ba 'khyil ba'i me tog gis stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na bud med dang /
K12D0724_H0711:263b-8: skyes pa rnam par ldang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:263b-9: dbang du byed pa la zla ba nya la nyin
K12D0724_H0711:263b-10: mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0724_H0711:263b-11: gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar byang chub shing gi
K12D0724_H0711:263b-12: yam shing gis me sbar nas til gyi sbyin sreg
K12D0724_H0711:263b-13: stong phrag brgyad byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:263b-14: seng ldeng la phur bu sor bzhi ba'i tshad byas
K12D0724_H0711:263b-15: nas phyogs bzhir gdab par byas te mtshams bcings pa

K12D0724_H0711:279b-16: me tog la sogs pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:279b-17: gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas de nas rim lam
K12D0724_H0711:279b-18: du bcom ldan 'das ral pa'i cod pan byas pa
K12D0724_H0711:279b-20: sa ga'i zla ba dkar po'i phyogs la 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:279b-21: nas zan bza' zhing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:279b-22: me tog la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas nyi ma re re la ston mo bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:279b-23: chus gang ba'i bum pa bzhi sman dang /
K12D0724_H0711:279b-24: sa bon thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba byas nas gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:279b-25: mtshan mo re re la stong phrag brgyad du mngon
K12D0724_H0711:279b-26: par sngags par byas nas bya rog gi tshang du
K12D0724_H0711:279b-27: bu byung gi bar khye'u dang /
K12D0724_H0711:280a-0: @280a *// longs spyod kyi don zla ba phyed kyi nang du 'grub bo //
K12D0724_H0711:280a-1: nag po'i brgyad pa la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:280a-3: bdug pa la sogs pa dbul bar byas nas 'o
K12D0724_H0711:280a-4: ma can gyi shing gi yam shing gi me sbar
K12D0724_H0711:280a-5: te me tog brgya pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:280a-6: bya'o // zla ba gcig tu bza' ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:280a-7: btung ba mi zad pa 'byung ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:280a-8: dur khrod kyi thal ba blangs nas lan bdun mngon par bzlas te bdag nyid kyi dpral ba'am /
K12D0724_H0711:280a-9: gzhan gyi mgo bor btab par byas nas grong du zhugs na thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:280a-10: bzlas pas 'ching ba la sgrol bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:280a-11: gtan pa gcog par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:280a-12: lpags bdun nyams par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:280a-13: m'a le ka'i me tog la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:280a-15: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:280a-17: nas zan za zhing zla ba drug tu 'dod pa bzhin du dong rtse rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:280a-18: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te autpa la sngon
K12D0724_H0711:280a-19: po'i snying po'i sbyin sreg stong bya ste ming nas
K12D0724_H0711:280a-20: smos te nyi ma bdun la dbang du 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:280a-22: karni ka'i dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya zhing ming
K12D0724_H0711:280a-23: nas smos na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:280a-24: ro // cho 'phrul gyi phyogs la 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:280b-0: nas zan za zhing dus @280b gsum du stong phrag brgyad du bzlas pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:280b-1: ras ris kyi spyan sngar aa ga ru'i yam shing gis 'bum phrag gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:280b-2: bco lnga las grub ba la rab tu 'jug ste
K12D0724_H0711:280b-3: ji srid bcom ldan 'das byon pa de srid du
K12D0724_H0711:280b-4: bzlas par bya'o // sa g-yo ba'am /
K12D0724_H0711:280b-6: ras ris g-yo bar byed pa dang grub bo //
K12D0724_H0711:280b-7: grub bo zhes tshig 'don par byed na rgyal srid dam /
K12D0724_H0711:280b-8: yul gyi bdag po nyid rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:280b-9: sngon spyad pa byas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:280b-10: mchod rten du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
K12D0724_H0711:280b-11: gi spyan sngar zla ba drug gi nang du stong
K12D0724_H0711:280b-12: phrag lnga so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:280b-13: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa
K12D0724_H0711:280b-14: byas nas stong phrag brgya bzlas par byas te dngul
K12D0724_H0711:280b-15: stong rnyed do // ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la stong phrag brgya bzlas bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:280b-16: 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:280b-17: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'dod pas gzhon
K12D0724_H0711:280b-18: nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:280b-19: mngon par sngags par byas nas blangs nas bskor ba
K12D0724_H0711:280b-20: bya ste skal ba bzang po nyid rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:280b-21: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas til
K12D0724_H0711:280b-22: nag po la stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:281a-0: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du dkar po'i tshe @281a *//
K12D0724_H0711:281a-1: gcig nas brtsams nas bco lnga la mtshan mo gsum
K12D0724_H0711:281a-2: du smyung bar gnas pas au dum b'a ra'i shing
K12D0724_H0711:281a-3: gis me sbar nas yungs kar dkar po la zho
K12D0724_H0711:281a-5: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:281a-6: yul gru lnga'i dpon por 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:281a-7: byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me sbar nas til la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:281a-9: sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:281a-10: bco lnga la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas
K12D0724_H0711:281a-11: pa byas nas gal te til de rnams phyogs dang;
K12D0724_H0711:281a-12: phyogs bral du song na de'i tshe grub pa yin
K12D0724_H0711:281a-13: te sems can thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:281a-14: ro // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
K12D0724_H0711:281a-15: spyan sngar sngon du stong phrag brgya bzlas te zla
K12D0724_H0711:281a-16: ba gzas bzung ba na til mar lan bdun cu
K12D0724_H0711:281a-17: phul nas ji srid wu ba 'byung ba de srid
K12D0724_H0711:281a-20: kun du ru skal stong phrag brgya bzlas nas blangs na grong gcig rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:281a-21: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar
K12D0724_H0711:281a-22: nyi ma so sor brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:281a-24: aa p'a marga'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:281b-0: mar gyis btags te nyi ma so sor sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas @281b na grong rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:281b-1: bu mang po can gyi yam shing la me sbar
K12D0724_H0711:281b-2: nas shu dag stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:281b-3: // thal ba des thig le bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:281b-5: gal te ma gyur na lan gsum du yang bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:281b-6: zla ba gzas bzung ba na chu klung gi 'gram
K12D0724_H0711:281b-7: du song nas bil ba'i yam shing gis me sbar
K12D0724_H0711:281b-8: nas bil ba'i me tog la mar gyis btags pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:281b-9: sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya byas na gnod sbyin gzhon
K12D0724_H0711:281b-11: mtshan mo phyed na rig pa stong phrag bzlas nas
K12D0724_H0711:281b-12: de nas gcig 'ong bar byed de gter rnams sam;
K12D0724_H0711:281b-13: nor gyi bdag po gang tshig gis brjod de byed
K12D0724_H0711:281b-14: do // nag po'i brgyad pa la bcom ldan 'das la dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:281b-16: bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas
K12D0724_H0711:281b-17: nas nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gtor ma'i cho
K12D0724_H0711:281b-18: ga bya ste rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par
K12D0724_H0711:281b-19: bya'o // sha za rnams 'ong bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:281b-20: gter rkos shig ces brjod par bya'o; ;de nas gter
K12D0724_H0711:281b-21: stsol bar byed de blangs nas bdag nyid dkon mchog
K12D0724_H0711:281b-22: gsum po rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:281b-23: de bzhin du ras ris bcing ba'i las kyang bcom
K12D0724_H0711:281b-24: ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ba ru ra'i shing gis
K12D0724_H0711:281b-25: me sbar nas nyi ma so sor til dang /
K12D0724_H0711:281b-26: 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg stong bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:282a-0: blon po dbang du byed pa la yungs kar dkar @282a *//
K12D0724_H0711:282a-1: po'i sbyin sreg gis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:282a-2: sra rtsi pog gi sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:282a-4: skyes ba dbang du byed pa la phub ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:282a-5: aa ru ra'i shing gis me sbar nas bcom ldan
K12D0724_H0711:282a-6: 'das kyi spyan sngar nyi ma so sor sgron shing
K12D0724_H0711:282a-7: gis sbyin sreg stong bya ste dong tse brgya rnyed
K12D0724_H0711:282a-8: do // slong mo za bas nyi ma so sor
K12D0724_H0711:282a-9: dus gsum du pa l'a sha'i sbyin sreg bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:282a-10: gser brgya so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:282a-11: rgya mtshor song nas rig pa stong phrag brgya bzla
K12D0724_H0711:282a-12: ste ji srid rin po che rnams sbyin par byed
K12D0724_H0711:282a-13: do // blang bar bya ste dkon mchog gsum la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:282a-14: sngags 'di nyid kyis sa ga'i zla ba nya ba
K12D0724_H0711:282a-15: la mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa bar ma chad
K12D0724_H0711:282a-17: byang chub kyi shing drung du bcom ldan 'das la
K12D0724_H0711:282a-18: mchod pa byas nas aa p'a marga'i yam shing la
K12D0724_H0711:282a-20: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:282a-21: bdag nyid ston pa yungs kar gyis grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:282a-22: zhi bar 'dod na 'bras yos kyi sreg blugs kyis
K12D0724_H0711:282a-23: sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:282a-24: // rgyas par 'dod na 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis me sbar nas til dang /
K12D0724_H0711:282b-0: 'bras thug po ches thun gsum du sbyin sreg brgyad @282b brgyar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:282b-1: nyi ma gsum du aa mra'i yam shing gis me sbar nas dur bha dang /
K12D0724_H0711:282b-2: tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:282b-3: rtsod par 'dod pa rnams kyi smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:282b-4: nyi ma so sor 'bru rlon pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:282b-5: phub ma rnams lag pa g-yon pas sbyin sreg byas
K12D0724_H0711:282b-6: na ming nas smos na mtshan mo bdun gyis dbang
K12D0724_H0711:282b-7: du 'gyur ro // rgyal po'i yam shing gis me sbar nas til dang /
K12D0724_H0711:282b-8: 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg thun mtshams gsum du stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:282b-9: nyi ma gsum du aa mra'i yam shing gis me sbar nas dur bha dang /
K12D0724_H0711:282b-10: tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:282b-11: nyi ma bdun gyis skyes bu chen po rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:282b-16: mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs kun tu spyad cing gtsang mas gos gtsang ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:282b-17: shing shun 'chang bas sgrub pa byas te gang g'ar
K12D0724_H0711:282b-18: gtun shing gi sgra dang bral ba gtsang ma'i phyogs
K12D0724_H0711:282b-19: su chu bo'i 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas khru bdun
K12D0724_H0711:282b-20: pa'i sa'i gong bu bzhi byas nas dbus su 'dab
K12D0724_H0711:282b-21: ma stong gi padma byas te de'i steng du bde
K12D0724_H0711:282b-22: bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi lcags lnga
K12D0724_H0711:282b-23: las byas pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas dkyil
K12D0724_H0711:282b-24: 'khor gyi dbus su bris sku'i spyan sngar bsgrub par
K12D0724_H0711:283a-2: tsandan dkar dmar gyis mchod nas man d'a ra ba'i me tog dang /
K12D0724_H0711:283a-4: phreng ba brgya phul nas bcom ldan 'das la dri dang me tog dang /
K12D0724_H0711:283a-5: bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:283a-6: mar gyi mar me'i phreng ba bdun dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:283a-7: phyogs bzhir mar gyi bum pa bzhi rab tu sbar bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:283a-8: phyogs bzhir bum pa bzhi sa bon thams cad kyis
K12D0724_H0711:283a-9: gang bar rin po che rnams bcug nas bzhag par
K12D0724_H0711:283a-13: gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:283a-14: gtor ma'i cho ga byas nas phyogs bzhir sngar brjod pa'i zho zan sngon ma can dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:283a-15: lho ru ni na bhu taktra ra dar ba chu dang bsres pa sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:283a-16: byang phyogs su 'o thug gis gang ba'i gtor mas nye bar mchod par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:283a-17: sems can thams cad la phyogs bzhir rgyun mi 'chad pa 'byung bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:283a-18: p'a la sha'i yam shing gis me sbar nas aa
K12D0724_H0711:283a-19: p'a marga'i yam shing la mar gyis btags la lan
K12D0724_H0711:283a-20: bdun mngon par sngags te sbyin sreg brgyad brgya bya'o;
K12D0724_H0711:283a-21: ;ming nas smos pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:283a-22: byang chub kyi yam shing gis me sbar nas lan
K12D0724_H0711:283a-23: tshva las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas te mgo bo
K12D0724_H0711:283b-0: nas brtsams te ji srid @283b rkang pa'i bar du
K12D0724_H0711:283b-1: sreg blugs re re la lan bdun bdun mngon par
K12D0724_H0711:283b-2: sngags pa byas nas sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:283b-3: // ming nas smos pa'i rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:283b-4: dkar po'i bco lnga la yan lag brgyad dang ldan
K12D0724_H0711:283b-5: pa'i gso sbyong can gyis nyin mtshan du smyung bar
K12D0724_H0711:283b-6: gnas te sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis
K12D0724_H0711:283b-7: ba lang gi lpags pa'i tshad kyis dkyil 'khor nye
K12D0724_H0711:283b-8: bar byugs nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten
K12D0724_H0711:283b-9: dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
K12D0724_H0711:283b-10: zhabs kyi drung du gser dngul gyi snod du ser
K12D0724_H0711:283b-11: skyar rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i mar gzhon nu mas bsrubs
K12D0724_H0711:283b-12: pa blangs nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug
K12D0724_H0711:283b-13: te lag pa g-yon pas snod bzung lag pa g-yas
K12D0724_H0711:283b-14: pa'i ming med kyi sor mos dkrug par bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:283b-15: ji srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du'o //
K12D0724_H0711:283b-16: de nas btung bar bya ste yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:283b-17: lan gcig brjod pas thos pa 'dzin par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:283b-18: de la du ba 'thul bas ni dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:283b-19: 'bar bas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:283b-20: yan lag thams cad na ba nye bar zhi bar
K12D0724_H0711:283b-21: 'dod pas dkar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can
K12D0724_H0711:283b-22: gyis snga dro las brtsams par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:283b-23: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gzhu'i tshad kyi dkyil
K12D0724_H0711:283b-24: 'khor nye bar byugs nas dbus su nad pa'i so
K12D0724_H0711:284a-1: bzhi rnams su bum pa chus gang ba bzhi la brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas la gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:284a-2: so phag rnams kyi steng du sen rtsi'i go sa gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:284a-3: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i tshon sna lnga'i skud pas
K12D0724_H0711:284a-4: yongs su dkris te dri zhim pos yongs su bkang
K12D0724_H0711:284a-5: bas so // phyi rol du dkyil 'khor bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:284a-8: dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod pa byas nas gu gul gyi dud ba dbul lo //
K12D0724_H0711:284a-9: zangs kyi snod mar gyis bkang ba gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:284a-10: de nas ku sha ljang gu bzung nas nad pa
K12D0724_H0711:284a-11: gos dkar mo can la ji srid rkang pa'i bar
K12D0724_H0711:284a-13: mar gyi steng du ku sha dor bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:284a-14: de bzhin du brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:284a-15: de nas mar zos pas blta bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:284a-16: de nas ku sha ljang gu blangs nas zlos bzhin du gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:284a-17: sbyangs pa las 'byung ba'i snod dang /
K12D0724_H0711:284a-18: gos byas nas sangs rgyas dang; byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0724_H0711:284a-19: thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byed du gzhug go
K12D0724_H0711:284a-20: / de nas pri yang ku dang /
K12D0724_H0711:284a-23: bzhi po cig tu byas nas mnyam par thob par
K12D0724_H0711:284a-24: byas la mar dang lhan cig pa'i zas mchog zos
K12D0724_H0711:284a-25: na nad med pa rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:284a-26: ro // skud pa sngon po la lan bdun mngon
K12D0724_H0711:284b-0: par sngags @284b pa byas nas rked pa la bcing
K12D0724_H0711:284b-1: ro // bar bya'o // shu ba mched pa nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:284b-2: de bzhin du mgrin pa la nye bar bcing bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:284b-3: dbugs mi bde ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:284b-4: gso sbyong can gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0724_H0711:284b-5: phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas
K12D0724_H0711:284b-6: dri bzang po'i me tog rnams kyis mchod pa byas
K12D0724_H0711:284b-7: te mar gyi mar me dbul lo //
K12D0724_H0711:284b-8: de nas byang chub shing gis yam shing gis me rab tu sbar ro //
K12D0724_H0711:284b-9: spar nas sra rtsi pog la lan bdun mngon par
K12D0724_H0711:284b-10: sngags pa'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:284b-11: // nad nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:284b-12: rig pas bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed /

K12D0724_H0711:290a-3: 'bum bzlas pas las thams cad kyis mi chugs par
K12D0724_H0711:290a-4: 'gyur ro // 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas sdig pa zad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:290a-5: 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas mchog rnams sgrub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:290a-6: 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas pas mngon par shes pa so
K12D0724_H0711:290a-7: sor rnyed do; ;'bum phrag lnga bzlas pas lha'i shes
K12D0724_H0711:290a-9: 'bum phrag drug bzlas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:290a-10: 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pas mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:290a-11: 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pas rgyal srid chen po so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:290a-12: 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:290a-13: de nas mig sman ldong ros aa shvat+tha'i 'dab ma
K12D0724_H0711:290a-14: bdun gyi nang du btums te bcom ldan 'das kyi
K12D0724_H0711:290a-15: spyan sngar ji srid dro ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:290a-17: 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:290a-18: de la dro bar gyur pas ni dbang du byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:290a-19: du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba'o //
K12D0724_H0711:290a-21: mar gyi sreg blugs 'bum sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:290a-22: 'bum phrag bcu gsum bzlas par bya ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:290a-23: de mthong nas gang tshol ba de rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-0: tsandan dkar po'i @290b yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-2: zhabs 'ching ba thob cing yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-3: aa ga ru nag po'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-6: tsandan dmar po'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-7: grub pa thams cad la stong phrag bsdus pa rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-8: byang chub shing gi 'og tu 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-10: bcud kyis len rnams rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-13: rtag tu bzlas pas bya rgod sel bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-14: 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas rgyal po'i btsun mo mchog dang rnam par 'phrul bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-15: yungs kar rgyal pos rtag tu sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-16: 'di la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-18: gso sbyong can gyis 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-20: btung ba zhim po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-21: aarga'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-23: pi n+ya kam gi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-24: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:290b-25: yid la byas nas bzlas pa bya ste rtag tu bzlas pas nad thams cad dang /
K12D0724_H0711:290b-29: 'jigs pa thams cad 'joms par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:291a-0: gu gul gyi ril bu la ma @291a *//
K12D0724_H0711:291a-1: gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:291a-3: 'bum phrag gsum gyis rgyal srid rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:291a-4: rgyu skar gyis gnod pa la 'o ma dang phan
K12D0724_H0711:291a-5: tshun bsres pa'i zho'i sbyin sreg bya sta zhi par
K12D0724_H0711:291a-7: gzhan gyis sna ma'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:291a-8: d'ur ba'i myu gus sbyin sreg bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:291a-10: gzhan gyi rgyas par 'dod na til dang /
K12D0724_H0711:291a-11: 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg bya ste nor chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:291a-13: so so la ka la brgyad brgyar mngon bar sngags
K12D0724_H0711:291a-14: pa byas nas 'byung po'i nye bar 'tshe bas btab
K12D0724_H0711:291a-15: pa'i sems can thams cad la ston du gzhug par
K12D0724_H0711:291a-16: bya'o // mthong ba la rab gnas 'gro'o //
K12D0724_H0711:291a-17: mig la brgyad brgyar bzlas na dang po gang mthong bde dag tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:291a-18: chu la yongs su bzlas nas gdong bkru bar bya ste skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:291a-19: bya rog ma 'phur ba la rtag tu bzlas pas gang 'dod pa de rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:291a-20: chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i khyor chu nyi ma so sor tho rangs btung bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:291a-22: de nas bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod pas
K12D0724_H0711:291a-23: lan tshva las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan byas nas rkang
K12D0724_H0711:291a-24: pa g-yon pas mnan te spyi bor stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:291b-0: bzlas par bya ste nyi ma bdun gyi @291b dbang
K12D0724_H0711:291b-1: du 'gyur ro zhes pa sgrub thabs kyi grub pa
K12D0724_H0711:291b-2: dang / yid la grub pa'i don thams cad sgrub
K12D0724_H0711:291b-3: pa 'di rnams sad pa'i rgyur yang rab tu sbyar
K12D0724_H0711:291b-4: dang / bar bya'o // de bzhin du'ang 'dir phyogs
K12D0724_H0711:291b-5: cung zad tsam zhig byas pa las sgrub thabs kyis
K12D0724_H0711:291b-6: nye bar sbyor ba'i khyad par gyi stobs su 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:291b-7: dang / bar bya'o // bar bya'o // tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs tsam gyis //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-8: sgrub pa'i yang dag dngos grub spyod //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-9: shin tu stong min gang ba min //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-10: bza' ba kun nas sbyin par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-11: tsha ba mngar skyur la sogs pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-12: ro las yul bral lnga la yang //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-13: sred pa ldan pas ro la ni //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-14: sred pa gang phyir skye bar 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-15: sred pas bzlas dang sbyin sreg sogs //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-16: 'dir ni cung zad brtsam mi bya //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-18: lag pa ldag la sogs brjod pa //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-19: dor bar bya 'am dor bya min //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-20: nang du g-yog po lha rnams ni //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-21: phur bu gnas par yongs brtag bya //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-22: lha rnams kyi ni khang pa 'am //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-23: khang stong dang ni phug gi nang //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-24: shing gcig gam ni dur khrod dang //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-25: ri bo dang ni tshang tshing du //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-26: bzlas dang sbyin sreg sgrub pa yang //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-27: rtse gcig yid kyis bya ba yin //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-28: ma dag ma dag kun dag la //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-29: dag pa rnam par sbyong ba yin //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-30: gnyis ka yis kyang gnyis ka la //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-31: dngos grub smra bas bsgrub par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-32: gang yang ro yi srad bu dang //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-33: lhag ma de nas 'gongs pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:291b-34: zla mtshan ldan pas kun tu reg /
K12D0724_H0711:292a-2: rul pa'i dri dang slar yang 'byung //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-3: legs byas 'dod pas sbyin par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-4: lha rnams ched du bsnyen pa las //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-5: de lta la sogs yon tan ldan; ;zas sam mal stan la sogs pa //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-6: sgrub pa rang gis blangs pa 'am //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-7: min pa nyid ni bsnyen par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-8: btung ba ldan pas gnas dang dga'//
K12D0724_H0711:292a-9: skye bo ngan pa'i sems can bcas; ;phyi ru kun tu btags pas blangs //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-10: mtshams med lnga po byed pa po //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-11: nad dang 'byung chen byed pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-13: zas dang le los bcom pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-15: ser sna lhur len tshon gyis 'bugs //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-16: rtag tu log par lta ba gzhan //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-17: de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-18: kun tu gsungs pa mdzes pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-19: dus min khrus ni mi nus na'ang //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-20: rang gis nus pa ma yin pa //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-21: rang gi rlung ni mchog tu bsgrags //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-22: dus gsum min par de yod pa //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-23: cig tu theg gsum bral ba dang //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-24: khrus nyes pa dang chu bo'i nang //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-25: nyes pa gsum zhes bya ba 'joms //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-26: khrus ni mchog tu rab tu bsgrags //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-27: de phyir dus kyang kun bsams nas //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-28: me des sam ni de nas kyang //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-29: chu yis khrus ni dngos grub kun //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-30: sgrub pa po la bstan pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-31: de nas kun tu nad pa las //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-32: gsang ba'i sngags kyis khrus rnams ni //
K12D0724_H0711:292a-33: rab tu bsgrags bar 'gyur ba yin //
K12D0724_H0711:292b-1: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:292b-2: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:292b-11: aa shu tsi shu tsi ra; bha b'a mi sv'a h'a /
K12D0724_H0711:292b-12: sngags 'dis chu la lan gcig yongs su bzlas nas bkru bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:292b-15: nad pa la sngags 'dis khrus byas pas gtsang mar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:292b-16: mtshan mo'i stod du thun gsum du dam pa'i chos
K12D0724_H0711:292b-17: kyi kha ton la sogs pa rnams kyis dub pas
K12D0724_H0711:292b-18: mtshan mo'i gung la ku sha la sogs pa'i stan
K12D0724_H0711:292b-21: phyag rgyas yongs su brtags te bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:292b-22: de'i tshe srung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:292b-23: seng ge'i mal du sgrub pa pos rtag tu seng
K12D0724_H0711:292b-24: ge'i stabs kyi lho 'am; shar gyi phyogs su mgo
K12D0724_H0711:292b-25: bo bstan nas rmi lam du me zhi ba can
K12D0724_H0711:292b-26: nam / rgyas ba can gyi sbyin sreg gal te gyur na shar dang /
K12D0724_H0711:292b-27: lho'i lho ru kun tu gnas nas rkang pa rab
K12D0724_H0711:292b-28: tu brkyang bar bya'o; ;nub kyi phyogs su mgo bo
K12D0724_H0711:292b-29: byas nas lho'i phyogs su kha bltas la nyal bar
K12D0724_H0711:292b-30: bya'o // rig pa rnams dang yang dag par ldan pas gang yang tsandan dang /
K12D0724_H0711:292b-31: bil ba la sogs pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:292b-33: au dum b'a ra la sogs pa rmi lam du
K12D0724_H0711:292b-34: mthong na bdag nyid yang dag par 'phags pa'i dngos
K12D0724_H0711:293a-2: bya ro ha na rmi lam du byung na de'i
K12D0724_H0711:293a-3: dngos grub myur du bdag la 'byung bar 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:293a-4: // gos dkar po dang mnyam par kun tu ston
K12D0724_H0711:293a-5: pa 'di'ang bdag nyid kyang tshe 'phel bar mthong na
K12D0724_H0711:293a-6: gdon mi za bar dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:293a-7: // // rgyal mtshan gyi phreng bas khyab pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:293a-8: rmi lam du khang bzang la 'dzegs pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:293a-9: mnan pa la sogs pa byung na dngos grub kyi
K12D0724_H0711:293a-10: mtshan nyid de gru la mngon par 'dzegs pa dang
K12D0724_H0711:293a-11: / de bzhin du de'i pi wang 'dzin pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:293a-13: khyi la sogs pa rmi lam du reg pa byung ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:293a-14: chu cig til mar gyis reg pa yang dag grub pa'i mtshan nyid do //
K12D0724_H0711:293a-15: rmi lam du bong bu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:293a-17: shing rta la sogs pa rnams mthong ba'am /
K12D0724_H0711:293a-18: reg pa la sogs pa ni dngos grub la bar du gcod par shes par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:293a-20: de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:293a-21: dge ba'i las dang dge las gzhan //
K12D0724_H0711:293a-22: de rnams thams cad sgrub pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:293a-23: de phyir rmi lam shes nas bya //
K12D0724_H0711:293a-24: rmi lam srung dang phyag rgya ni //
K12D0724_H0711:293a-25: phan tshun nyid du rig pa 'dzin //
K12D0724_H0711:293a-26: bgegs rnams rtag tu gnyid log byed //
K12D0724_H0711:293a-27: rnam par gzhom bya rnam 'joms pa //
K12D0724_H0711:293a-28: yang dag nyer gnas de yi phyir //
K12D0724_H0711:293a-29: bzlas dang sbyin sreg la sogs kun //
K12D0724_H0711:293a-30: sngar brjod bsrung ba sbyar bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-0: srung ba'i cho ga'i dbye ba @293b las; ;de 'dis yang dag 'grub par 'dod //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-1: mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha gnod sbyin //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-2: rang grub yi dvags srin po dang //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-3: kun tu rgyu byed rnams 'joms phyir //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-4: rang gi gnas dang sems kun g-yo //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-5: de phyir thog ma nas bya ba //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-6: bdag nyid srung dang mtshan ma ni //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-7: nye bar mtshon pa la sogs pa //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-8: sgrub pa kun gyi tshe na 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-9: mtshan ma med par gyur na ni //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-10: bgegs de las 'bras skyes ba la //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-11: khyi ni g-yon nas 'byin pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-12: ba lang sbyin dang mdzes pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-14: ri dvags ce spyang bya rog dang //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-15: khyim gyi phag pa de bzhin nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-16: rtsangs pa gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-17: ba dan la sogs thams cad nas //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-18: gtso bor brjod bya dge ba 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-19: dge ba la sogs rig pa yis //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-20: mi dge ba yi mi dge la //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-21: de bzhin mchog dang mchog min dbye //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-22: shes nas dang por spyad par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-23: bil ba aarga'i me tog ni //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-24: min nyid 'dod dang aa ram ba //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-25: khyad par las ni de byin cig /
K12D0724_H0711:293b-26: blo ldan sngags pas las kun la //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-27: me thab rnam pa gsum bya 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-28: lho ru mngon par kha phyogs par //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-29: gyur pa'i h'um phat yi ge ni //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-30: sv'a h'a'i gnas su gzhag par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-31: yid kyis kun tu bsams nas bya //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-32: mngon spyod can gyi cho ga bya //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-33: byang du mngon par phyogs gyur nas //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-34: sv'a h'a'i yi ge dang ldan bzlas //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-35: yid kyis bsams nas zhi ba bya //
K12D0724_H0711:293b-36: dge ba mngon par mdzes pa can //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-2: zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-3: bye brag tu ni brjod bya ste //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-4: 'og tu kha ltas byas nas kyang //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-5: rgyas pa nyid la rab sbyar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-6: mngon spyod ston la skyil krung ste //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-7: zhi dang rgyas pa can brjod pa'ang //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-8: rang gi stan la tsog bur brjod //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-9: mi dge'i las kyi kun spyod ni //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-10: skra dang sen mor brjod pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-11: bcing bar mi bya gang gi phyir //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-12: gal te sgrub po tshangs spyod dang //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-13: ldan gyur de tshe nyes pa med //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-14: bzlas dang sbyin sreg sogs bya la //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-16: yongs su dag par bya bzhin pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-17: skra rnams mkhas pas tshul de nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-18: spu gris skra ni breg par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-19: bsags par bya ba yang ma yin //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-20: dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-21: lha rnams mchod par yongs su bsgrags //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-22: 'dod pa'ang min yang stobs bsags pa //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-23: de nyid phyir yang nyes bcas 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-24: sen mo'ang yongs su 'chang ba dang //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-25: de bzhin so dang spu la sogs //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-26: dri ma nyid ni bcang mi bya; ;shig la sogs pa rab skyes pa //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-28: khron pa de ni blta mi bya //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-29: snang byed gzas zin gnas pa na //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa ni; ;dngos grub 'dod pas nyams mi bya //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-31: lha rnams mchod pa'i dus su yang //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-32: zas mngon ma gyur lha rnams la //
K12D0724_H0711:294a-33: shes rab can gyis mchod mi bya //
K12D0724_H0711:294b-0: gal te gzhan du bla @294b ma'i bka'//
K12D0724_H0711:294b-1: dam tshig las ni bzlas par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:294b-2: sngon dus chos rnams thams cad ni //
K12D0724_H0711:294b-3: nyan pa sogs kyis mchod par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:294b-4: rig pas gzugs ni spros nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:294b-5: bstod pa nyid dang bsngags par bya //
