K12D0724_H0711:327a-37: t'a re dhya na p'a ra mi t'a niry'a te
K12D0724_H0711:327a-38: tu re sv'ah'a // 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o //
K12D0724_H0711:327a-39: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:327a-40: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:327a-44: pradzny'a t'a re pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a t'a re /
K12D0724_H0711:327a-45: pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a niry'a te tu re sv'ah'a //
K12D0724_H0711:327a-46: 'phags ma sgrol ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o //
K12D0724_H0711:327a-47: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-0: na ma a'arya aa ba @327b lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-5: ni rya te tu re tu re /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-6: sarba dharma aa ba bh'a wa /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-7: sarba p'a ra mi te tu re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-8: 'phags ma sgrol ma pha rol tu phyin pa thams
K12D0724_H0711:327b-9: cad kyi chos nges par 'byung ma zhes bya ba'o
K12D0724_H0711:327b-10: // na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-11: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-16: sarba buddha ni rya te tu re tu re sarba
K12D0724_H0711:327b-17: bud dha p'a ra mi te ru te t'a re
K12D0724_H0711:327b-18: sv'ah'a // 'phags ma sgrol ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'o //
K12D0724_H0711:327b-19: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-20: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-25: sarba dharma ni ry'a te t'a re t'a re sarba
K12D0724_H0711:327b-26: dharma ni rya te ni ba ra ni ba ra
K12D0724_H0711:327b-28: 'phags ma sgrol ma chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'o //
K12D0724_H0711:327b-29: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-30: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-35: sam ghe t'a re tu re /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-36: sarba sam ghe dharma nirya t'e tu re sam gha p'a r'a mi te tu re tu re sv'ah'a //
K12D0724_H0711:327b-37: 'phags ma sgrol ma dge 'dun thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o //
K12D0724_H0711:327b-38: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-39: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki tee shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-44: sarba p'a ra mi t'a t'a re; sarba dharme t'a re /
K12D0724_H0711:327b-45: sarba ri dzu ka dharma niry'a te tu re tu
K12D0724_H0711:327b-46: re aa na bhi l'a bu t'a ree tu re
K12D0724_H0711:327b-47: tu re sv'ah'a // 'phags ma sgrol ma mngon par
K12D0724_H0711:327b-48: brjod par byar med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma
K12D0724_H0711:328a-2: rang bzhin med cing mngon par brjod par byar med pa /
K12D0724_H0711:328a-3: don thams cad sgrub par byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:328a-4: nad thams cad gso bar byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:328a-5: thams cad du bklags pas grub pa /
K12D0724_H0711:328a-7: nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad las phran tshegs thams
K12D0724_H0711:328a-8: cad ji ltar ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de
K12D0724_H0711:328a-9: lta de ltar sgrub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:328a-10: 'di rnams kyi cho ga phyogs tsam ston par 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:328a-11: te dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te
K12D0724_H0711:328a-13: gso sbyong med pas kyang rung ste dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:328a-14: me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis nyi ma re
K12D0724_H0711:328a-15: re la mchod pa byas nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:328a-16: par bya'o // mthar nyin zhag gcig smyung bar gnas pas ras ris sam /
K12D0724_H0711:328a-17: sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ku sha'i khres la nye
K12D0724_H0711:328a-18: bar 'dug ste ji skad gsungs pa'i rim pas bdag
K12D0724_H0711:328a-19: nyid kha shar du phyogs te sngar brjod pa'i aa
K12D0724_H0711:328a-20: ga ru nag po'i yam shing sor bzhi pa'i tshad
K12D0724_H0711:328a-21: la zho dang; sbrang rtsi dang /
K12D0724_H0711:328a-22: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:328a-24: gzhan gang rung du sgrol ma'i rig pas brjod cing
K12D0724_H0711:328a-25: grol bar sbyong ba la rig pa mtha' yas pa
K12D0724_H0711:328a-27: ras ris gzhan 'dod na gso sbyong can gyis dkar
K12D0724_H0711:328a-28: po'i bco lnga la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod
K12D0724_H0711:328a-29: rten du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi
K12D0724_H0711:328b-0: @328b lcibs dkyil 'khor byugs te me tog dang /
K12D0724_H0711:328b-2: mar gyi mar me la sogs pas mchod pa byas
K12D0724_H0711:328b-3: nas au dum b'a ra'i shing gis sbar te tshangs
K12D0724_H0711:328b-4: pa'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya
K12D0724_H0711:328b-5: ste ts'a ru'i bza' bas yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:328b-6: // 'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas pas bram ze rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:328b-7: tsa ru'i bza' bas sbyin sreg bya ste rgyal rigs dbang du 'gyur ro; ;nas dang /
K12D0724_H0711:328b-9: ts'a ru dang gcig tu byas nas sbyin sreg bya ste rje rigs dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:328b-10: dgral bltas nas bzlas pa bya ste rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:328b-11: lan bdun mngon par sngags pa'i chus byabs pas thams cad sel bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:328b-12: dug thams cad la'ang nye bar byabs pas so //
K12D0724_H0711:328b-13: zhu mkhan gyi ril bu lan bdun mngon par sngags pas mig nad sel bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:328b-14: na pa la skud pas bcing bar bya ste gdon thams cad sel bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:328b-15: gtsug tor bcings pas bdag nyid srung ba'o //
K12D0724_H0711:328b-17: bong ba la lan bdun bzlas pas phyogs bcing ba'o //
K12D0724_H0711:328b-18: bud med bu ma thon pa la til mar la
K12D0724_H0711:328b-19: yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste bde blag
K12D0724_H0711:328b-21: rmongs pas mngal gyi zla mtshan gyi dus las 'das
K12D0724_H0711:328b-22: na khrus byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i 'o ma la
K12D0724_H0711:328b-23: stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags par byas nas btung
K12D0724_H0711:328b-25: gzhan gyi tshad dad mar bsres nas sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:329a-2: de nas bu mang po 'dod na sbyin sreg stong
K12D0724_H0711:329a-3: phrag brgyad byas pa'i thal ba des chu'i bum pa
K12D0724_H0711:329a-4: bzhi dang bsres pa bzhag par bya'o; ;brgyad brgyar bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:329a-5: pa'i srad bus lag pa g-yas pa la bcings na
K12D0724_H0711:329a-6: ji srid du smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu
K12D0724_H0711:329a-7: 'gyur ro // gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog
K12D0724_H0711:329a-8: gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas te g-yul du
K12D0724_H0711:329a-9: gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:329a-10: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la mdud pa
K12D0724_H0711:329a-11: byas nas lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:329a-12: lag pa la bcing bar bya ste brtan pa dang
K12D0724_H0711:329a-13: / g-yo bar bcas pa'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:329a-14: de nas drag shul la nyams pa'i ming nas smos
K12D0724_H0711:329a-15: te lan bdun mngon par sngags nas khyor ba'i chu
K12D0724_H0711:329a-16: btung bar sbyin par bya ste shi ba'ang langs par
K12D0724_H0711:329a-17: byed do // de bzhin du phyogs bzhir mngon par
K12D0724_H0711:329a-18: sngags par byas nas btung bar sbyin par bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:329a-19: 'jog po'i mche bas zin pa'ang 'tsho bar byed do;
K12D0724_H0711:329a-21: 'bras la lan bdun mngon par sngags par byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:329a-22: byin pas grol bar byed de tshor ba med par
K12D0724_H0711:329a-25: g-yul la grong khyer gyi dbus sam /
K12D0724_H0711:329a-26: mtshan mo mda' rgyang gang gi tshad kyis gzhi la
K12D0724_H0711:329a-27: nye bar byugs nas dkar gtor byin te 'o ma
K12D0724_H0711:329a-28: can gyi yam shing gis me sbar nas 'o ma'i
K12D0724_H0711:329b-0: sreg blugs @329b stong phrag gis sbyin sreg bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:329b-1: yams nye bar zhi bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:329b-2: de nas nye bar ma zhi na de las gzhan
K12D0724_H0711:329b-3: du rengs par bsams pa'i dus su bad kan mthar
K12D0724_H0711:329b-4: byed kyi yam shing gis me sbar nas don grub
K12D0724_H0711:329b-6: til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:329b-7: bya ste 'phral du yams thams cad zhi bar byed
K12D0724_H0711:329b-9: zlos bzhin pas ni sems can thams cad mthong bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:329b-11: kushm'anda'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste grul bum rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:329b-12: til btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste yi dvags dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:329b-13: dur khrod du be la dang /
K12D0724_H0711:329b-14: khanda ka'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste sha za dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:329b-15: gnod sbyin dbang du byed pa la wa ta'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:329b-17: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste brjed byed dang /
K12D0724_H0711:329b-18: gnon po dbang du byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:329b-19: bal gyi sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:329b-20: rig pas bgegs rnam par gzhom pa'i don du seng
K12D0724_H0711:329b-21: ldeng gi rtse mo la rnon po'i til mar gyis
K12D0724_H0711:329b-22: btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:329b-23: gu gul gyi ril bu la mar gyis btags pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:329b-24: sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste lha chen po'i
K12D0724_H0711:329b-26: lha chen po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:330a-1: gyis nyos pa'i ldong ros blangs nas rgyal po'i yam
K12D0724_H0711:330a-2: shing gis me sbar nas ji srid me dpung du
K12D0724_H0711:330a-3: gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:330a-4: de nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba ser skya'i 'o ma
K12D0724_H0711:330a-5: la gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa'i mar du byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:330a-6: mar de la gdab par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:330a-7: de bzhin du zhos gang ba'i snod dang /
K12D0724_H0711:330a-9: sbrang rtsis gang ba'i snod la yang ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:330a-10: de nas srung ba byas te za ma tog tu
K12D0724_H0711:330a-11: bzhag nas zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan mo
K12D0724_H0711:330a-12: gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas
K12D0724_H0711:330a-14: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi
K12D0724_H0711:330a-15: drung du ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:330a-16: kha byang du mngon par phyogs pas snod bzhi ru
K12D0724_H0711:330a-17: bzhag nas ji srid 'gro ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:330a-19: 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:330a-22: nam mkha' la nye bar 'khrid par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:330a-23: de bzhin du mig sman bla bskyed pa'i ched du
K12D0724_H0711:330a-24: rang nyid khyad par du dkar po'i bco lnga la
K12D0724_H0711:330a-25: padma'i skud pa la bzhag nas 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0724_H0711:330a-26: gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du lag pa
K12D0724_H0711:330a-27: kha sbyar nas blangs nas ji srid dro ba dang
K12D0724_H0711:330a-29: 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:330a-30: 'di nyid la mngon pa rnams pa gsum mo //
K12D0724_H0711:330a-31: lcags lngas padma byed du bcug nas gur gum dang /
K12D0724_H0711:330b-0: dbur nam mkha'i chus btags @330b nas padmar bcug ste
K12D0724_H0711:330b-1: de nas dkar po'i brgyad pa la gso sbyong can
K12D0724_H0711:330b-2: dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos
K12D0724_H0711:330b-3: te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12D0724_H0711:330b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi
K12D0724_H0711:330b-5: drung du lag pa g-yas pas padma blangs nas ji
K12D0724_H0711:330b-6: srid du 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:330b-7: par bya'o // de nas blangs pa des rig pa
K12D0724_H0711:330b-8: 'dzin par 'gyur te lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar
K12D0724_H0711:330b-9: par bya'o // byed do // de bzhin du gdu bu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:330b-12: de bzhin du ri'i tsandan dmar po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:330b-14: dga' ba 'khyil ba'i rtsa ba dang; lcags lnga dang /
K12D0724_H0711:330b-21: du ru ka rnams cha mnyam pa gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhib mo byed du gzhug go /
K12D0724_H0711:330b-22: de nas ser skya rgyud mtshungs par ba'i 'o ma
K12D0724_H0711:330b-23: blangs nas gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa'i mar sar dang
K12D0724_H0711:330b-24: gcig tu byas pas phye ma la ril bu byed
K12D0724_H0711:330b-25: du gzhug go / aarga'i til mar gyi phye mas mar me dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:330b-26: de nas dkar po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du
K12D0724_H0711:330b-27: smyung bar gnas pas gso sbyong can gyi aa shvattha'i
K12D0724_H0711:330b-28: 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du bcug par byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:330b-29: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi spyan sngar ji srid
K12D0724_H0711:330b-30: du dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par
K12D0724_H0711:330b-31: bya'o // de khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:331a-1: pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:331a-2: de nas cho ga gzhan ni ring bsrel dang bcas
K12D0724_H0711:331a-3: pa'i mchod rten du sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar gso
K12D0724_H0711:331a-4: sbyong can gyis mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:331a-5: me'i yam shing gis me sbar nas zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:331a-7: mar gyis btags pa'i seng ldeng gi yam shing gis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:331a-8: dkar po'i bcu bzhi nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga'i bar du'o //
K12D0724_H0711:331a-10: de bzhin du gso sbyong can gyis rtag tu bzlas pa stong phrag gsum bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:331a-11: phyi nas las thams cad du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:331a-13: blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na bcom ldan
K12D0724_H0711:331a-14: 'das la mchod pa byas nas shing gi rgyal po'i
K12D0724_H0711:331a-15: yam shing la airgu da'i til mar gyis btags pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:331a-16: sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:331a-17: bcu bzhi nas brtsams te ji srid bco lnga'i bar du'o //
K12D0724_H0711:331a-18: las 'dis tshul khrims 'chal pa yin yang de bzhin kho nar gsod pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:331a-19: bskrad pa la ni mba'i yam shing la tsha ba'i
K12D0724_H0711:331a-20: til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:331a-21: bya ste mtshan mo bdun gyis skrod par byed do
K12D0724_H0711:331a-22: // rigs bzhi dbang du byed par 'dod pas ts'a ru dang bcas pa'i chu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:331a-23: gnod sbyin gyi kham phor zhes pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-0: mtshan mo pu tsi ra dza ta'i sbyin sreg @331b stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-1: bzlas pas 'ching ba las grol bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-3: til gyi sbyin sreg gis gzhan gang yang rdung bas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-4: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas rigs
K12D0724_H0711:331b-5: kyi bu mo dbang du byed pa la til gyi
K12D0724_H0711:331b-6: sbyin sreg bya'o // gos 'dod pas d'ur ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:331b-7: tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-10: shu dag la stong phrag brgyad lan bdun du mngon par sngags pa byas nas lag pa la'o //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-11: nor 'dod pas gu gul gyi ril bu 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:331b-12: sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad mtshan mo bdun du bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-13: khyim gyi bdag po 'dod pas dri'i sbyin sreg mtshan mo bdun du bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-14: mar gyis sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste grong rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-15: skrod pa la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:331b-16: nim pa'i 'dab ma'i sbyin sreg bya'o; ;skyes bu'i sha
K12D0724_H0711:331b-17: ni skrod par byed pa las so //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-18: phub ma ni sdang bar byed pa las so //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-19: skrod par byed pa la sbrul gyi shun lpags dang /
K12D0724_H0711:331b-21: skyes bu ma yin par byed pa la go ma aindra 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-23: zhi ba'i don du shing sa mi'i 'dab ma rnams 'o ma dang lhan cig pas so //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-24: ji ltar nyi ma so sor tho rangs langs nas
K12D0724_H0711:331b-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar 'byor ba'i
K12D0724_H0711:331b-26: mchod pa byas nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-27: ma grub pa sgrub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:331b-28: gzhan gyi bsgrubs pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa
K12D0724_H0711:331b-29: la ma nu la 'ching ba 'dzin par byed do
K12D0724_H0711:332a-1: tsher ma can gyi sbyin sreg bya ste dgra 'joms par byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:336b-19: ming smos pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //

K12D0724_H0711:336b-21: padma ma rnyed na autpa la sngon po stong phrag brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:336b-23: me tog gi sbyin sreg bya ste 'bum phrag gcig gis lha rnams grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:336b-24: khrus la sman thams cad dang /
K12D0724_H0711:336b-25: sa bon thams cad rtsa ba nag po med pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:336b-26: bum par bcug nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags
K12D0724_H0711:337a-5: rgya spos bzhi 'gyur gyi cha rnams ras ris kyi
K12D0724_H0711:337a-6: spyan sngar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
K12D0724_H0711:337a-7: mchod pa rgya chen po byas te ba'i mar me
K12D0724_H0711:337a-8: rab tu sbar nas rdzas rnams thams cad me tog
K12D0724_H0711:337a-9: gis sbyor bas dus ma yin pa gang gis rgyal
K12D0724_H0711:337a-13: tshe song ba rnams 'khrur gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:337a-15: skal pa bzang po bgegs kyis btab pa rnams bgegs las grol bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:337a-16: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du
K12D0724_H0711:337a-17: nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas brahma d'a ri'am
K12D0724_H0711:337a-20: tu ru ka 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg bya ste de bzhin du'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:337a-21: til nag po la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:337a-25: zhogs ma dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:337a-26: cho ga gzhan ni tsandan gyi yam shing sor bzhi pa'i tshad la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:337a-28: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas te grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:337a-29: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams ti bil pa'i shing
K12D0724_H0711:337a-30: gi 'og tu me nye bar sbar nas bil ba'i
K12D0724_H0711:337b-0: @337b mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:337b-1: cu bya ste rang gi gzugs kyi lha mo mthong
K12D0724_H0711:337b-2: zhing rgyal srid chen po gnang bar byed cing gzhan
K12D0724_H0711:337b-3: yang gang zhus pa de gnang bar byed do; ;'byung
K12D0724_H0711:337b-4: po'i gdon grol bar byed pa la padma'i phyag rgyas
K12D0724_H0711:337b-5: reg par bya ste 'bros par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:337b-6: bsgrub par bya bzhin pa ma yin pa'i 'o ma'i shing gis me sbar nas zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:337b-7: sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i padma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:337b-8: de bzhin du autpa la dmar po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:337b-9: sngon po 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg bya zhing yang na sna ma'i me tog gi sbyin sreg go /
K12D0724_H0711:337b-10: ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:337b-11: nas zan za zhing 'phel bzhin pa'i mchod pa bya ste slong mo'i zas bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:337b-14: bdug pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas nyin
K12D0724_H0711:337b-15: mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa'i mthar dri zhim po'i
K12D0724_H0711:337b-16: me tog gis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:337b-17: sgrub bzhin pa ma yin pa 'dis sa rnams tshul
K12D0724_H0711:337b-18: khrims mchog tu 'tshal pas kyang grub par byed do
K12D0724_H0711:337b-19: // yang na yungs kar til nag po dang bsres pa zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:337b-21: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:337b-23: nor 'dod pas aa p'a marga'i yam shing gis yungs kar rgyal po 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:337b-25: yang na blon po dbang du byed pa la til
K12D0724_H0711:337b-26: mar gyi sbyin sreg ste las thams cad la'ang sbyar
K12D0724_H0711:338a-0: bar bya'o // bu mo dbang du byed @338a *//
K12D0724_H0711:338a-1: pal sngar gyi sbyin sreg zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:338a-4: rgyal po'i btsun mo la las 'di'o //
K12D0724_H0711:338a-5: byang chub shing gi me sbar nas yongs su spyod pa'i sbyin sreg go /
K12D0724_H0711:338a-6: dbang du byed pa la yungs kar rgyal po'i sbyin sreg go /
K12D0724_H0711:338a-7: dbang du byed pa la kambo dzi ka'i me tog gi yam shing gis stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:338a-10: mar gyis btags pa'i byang chub shing gi yam shing
K12D0724_H0711:338a-11: gis me sbar nas thab med pa'i me la lha
K12D0724_H0711:338a-12: dang / lha mo la dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:338a-14: bdug pas mngon par mchod cing mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:338a-15: nas zan za zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te gang blangs pa de ster bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:338a-16: ba sha ka'i me tog phrag brgya sbyin sreg bya ste ming smos pa de dbang du byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:338a-17: na le sham gyi sbyin sreg gis log 'dren rnam par 'joms par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:338a-18: byang chub shing gi 'og tu dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:338a-19: me tog gis mngon par mchod nas zla ba gzas
K12D0724_H0711:338a-20: bzung ba na ldong ros blangs nas aa shvattha'i 'dab
K12D0724_H0711:338a-21: ma bdun gyis steng du gzhag nas ji srid 'bar
K12D0724_H0711:338a-22: bar gyur gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:338a-23: blangs pa des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te lha thams cad thogs pa med pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:338a-24: lha'i gzhal yas khang mchog tu mdzes par myur zhing
K12D0724_H0711:338a-25: mgyogs par 'gro ste nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog dang
K12D0724_H0711:338a-26: / gzi brjid dang ldan zhing rig pa 'dzin pa
K12D0724_H0711:338b-0: thams cad dang @338b ldan par 'gro ste lha'i 'gro
K12D0724_H0711:338b-1: ba brgya phrag gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:338b-2: / // rna ba'i mig sman la las 'di kho na 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:338b-3: gi wang sgrub par 'dod pas 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:338b-4: nas zan za bas sngon du stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:338b-5: zla ba gzas bzung ba'i dus su pi pi ling gi 'dab ma bdun gyi steng du 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:338b-6: ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten du gi wang rnam
K12D0724_H0711:338b-7: pa brgyar bya ste btang nas rig pa yongs su
K12D0724_H0711:338b-9: nye bar spyod pa la sogs pa can te des
K12D0724_H0711:338b-10: thig le byas nas rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par
K12D0724_H0711:338b-11: brgyan pa'i lus 'dod pa'i gzugs can gyi rig pa
K12D0724_H0711:338b-12: 'dzin par 'gyur te lo stong du 'tsho bar byed
K12D0724_H0711:338b-13: do // dpa' bo bzang po las byung ba'i mig
K12D0724_H0711:338b-14: sman gyi 'dab ma blangs nas me gdung bzang por
K12D0724_H0711:338b-15: byas nas lan brgyar rab tu bcug nas zla ba
K12D0724_H0711:338b-16: gzas zin pa na chur zhugs te ji srid du
K12D0724_H0711:338b-17: grul bum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa
K12D0724_H0711:338b-18: do // bya'o // skad cig la bcug pa tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:338b-19: 'di byugs pas gzi brjid dang ldan zhing cod pan dang /
K12D0724_H0711:338b-21: padma'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa'i lus rig pa
K12D0724_H0711:338b-22: 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mthar thug par yang rab
K12D0724_H0711:338b-24: 'khor dang bcas pa lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:338b-25: rlung ltar 'gro zhing yid ltar mgyogs par 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:338b-27: autpa la stong phrag brgya'i sbyin sreg gis gser stong rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:338b-28: pa l'a sha'i las ni 'di kho na'o //
K12D0724_H0711:339a-0: @339a *// yang 'dir las chen po'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni rgyal ba'i zhabs drung ngam /
K12D0724_H0711:339a-1: ras ris kyi spyan sngar ram /
K12D0724_H0711:339a-2: rtog pa gzhan las gsungs pa'i cho gas kyang rung
K12D0724_H0711:339a-3: ste rig pa 'di rnams kyi ming gsum gsum brjod
K12D0724_H0711:339a-4: pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga de 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:339a-5: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du phyogs gtsang mar 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:339a-6: nas zan za bas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te me tog dang /
K12D0724_H0711:339a-16: mar gyi bza' bas kyang rung ste yang na mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:339a-17: thog mar sngon du bsnyen bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:339a-18: yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong dang yang dag par
K12D0724_H0711:339a-19: ldan pas nyi ma so sor mngon par brjod bzhin
K12D0724_H0711:339a-21: gsung rab ji lta ba bzhin du slong mo'i zas bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:339a-22: byang chub kyi sems yongs su gzung zhing sdug bsngal gyi gdungs pas bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:339a-23: sgrub pa pos dus gsum du khrus byas pa'i 'og
K12D0724_H0711:339a-24: tu shis pa'i ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste sbyangs
K12D0724_H0711:339a-25: pa las byung ba'i gos bgo zhing 'bum phrag gcig
K12D0724_H0711:339a-27: mthar nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas seng ldeng
K12D0724_H0711:339a-28: gi shing gis me sbar nas 'o ma dang bcas
K12D0724_H0711:339b-0: pa'i shing dam / aa ga @339b ru nag po'i yam shing sor bzhi pa'i tshad dam /
K12D0724_H0711:339b-1: mdzub mo'i tshad la tu ru ka'i til mar gyis
K12D0724_H0711:339b-2: btags pa dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg
K12D0724_H0711:339b-3: bya'o // de nas grub par 'gyur te bco lnga
K12D0724_H0711:339b-4: la phyogs bzhir sa las byung ba'i bum pa bzhi
K12D0724_H0711:339b-6: aa mra'i yal 'dab kyis kha g-yogs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:339b-8: nag po med pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:339b-9: g-yas kyi gzhogs su sa las byung ba'am /
K12D0724_H0711:339b-10: gser las byung ba rin po che dang /
K12D0724_H0711:339b-11: sa bon thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba /
K12D0724_H0711:339b-14: rin po che'i snying po padma dra ba'i me tog gis kha g-yogs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:339b-15: du gu la'i ras ma nyams pas mgrin pa bcings pa /
K12D0724_H0711:339b-16: rnam par rgyal bzhes bya ba'i bum pa dbus su bzhag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:339b-17: de bzhin du shar gyi phyogs su 'char ba zhes bya ba'i bum pa 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:339b-18: nub kyi phyogs su ha rings zhes bya ba'i bum pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:339b-19: de lta bu la sogs pa bum pa rnams kyi
K12D0724_H0711:339b-20: ming smos te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
K12D0724_H0711:339b-22: dri bzang po'i me tog dang /
K12D0724_H0711:339b-24: phreng ba nyi shu dbul bar bya zhing dris bkang
K12D0724_H0711:339b-25: ba'i kham phor nyi shu phyogs bzhir dbul bar bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:339b-26: // 'o mas bkang ba'i kham phor nyi shu phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:339b-27: mar gyi mar me brgya dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:339b-28: bum pa'i sgron ma bzhi rab tu sbar bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:340a-0: 'o thug gis bkang ba'i kham phor bcu gnyis klu @340a *//
K12D0724_H0711:340a-2: til gyi thug pa'i kham phor bcu gnyis srin po rnams la gtor ma mchod par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:340a-3: zan dron gyi kham phor brgyad 'byung po rnams la gtor mar sbyin no //
K12D0724_H0711:340a-4: hvags kyi bca' ba la sogs pa'i gtor ma 'phags
K12D0724_H0711:340a-5: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:340a-6: // gzhan rnams la mar sar dang /
K12D0724_H0711:340a-9: ji ltar mtshungs pa'i kham phor rnams phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:340a-10: aa ga ru nag po'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:340a-14: shri b'a sa can gyi bdug pa'i kham phor phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:340a-15: de nas srod la las brtsams par byas te nyin
K12D0724_H0711:340a-16: mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas aarga'i yam shing ngam
K12D0724_H0711:340a-17: / seng ldeng gi shing gis me rab tu sbar
K12D0724_H0711:340a-18: nas las 'di la sngags 'dis spyan drangs pa byas
K12D0724_H0711:340a-20: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:340a-21: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:340a-26: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha /
K12D0724_H0711:340a-27: a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra dhi ri dhi ri ni /
K12D0724_H0711:340a-28: ya th'a sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sv'ah'a //
K12D0724_H0711:340a-29: gshegs su gsol ba'i dus su dri zhim po'i me tog gis bskul bas so //
K12D0724_H0711:340a-30: dngul las byung ba'i snod dam /
K12D0724_H0711:340b-0: sa las byung bar mchod @340b yon phul nas de
K12D0724_H0711:340b-1: nas aa ga ru nag po'i yam shing ji skad
K12D0724_H0711:340b-2: gsungs pa'i tshad gzhan gsungs pa la til mar gyis
K12D0724_H0711:340b-3: btags pa rnams zla ba gzas bzung ba'am /
K12D0724_H0711:340b-4: nyi ma gzas bzung ba na stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:340b-5: de nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su 'phags pa
K12D0724_H0711:340b-6: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog tu thugs brtse ba
K12D0724_H0711:340b-7: / phyag na ril ba spyi blugs dang /
K12D0724_H0711:340b-9: ral pa'i cod pan 'phyang ba 'byon par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:340b-10: de nas ji skad gsungs pa'i snod du dri zhim
K12D0724_H0711:340b-11: po'i me tog dkar po rnams snyim pas blangs nas
K12D0724_H0711:340b-12: chu'i mchod yon dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:340b-13: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ci
K12D0724_H0711:340b-14: yin pa'i mchog te sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs par
K12D0724_H0711:340b-15: byed do // gang mchog blangs pa de ster ro //
K12D0724_H0711:340b-19: rig pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12D0724_H0711:340b-20: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po nyid dam /
K12D0724_H0711:340b-23: sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:340b-30: mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam; rang gi lus la rjes su 'dod pa'i cho ga 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:340b-36: mig cha dang bral ba nyid dam /
K12D0724_H0711:341a-1: dbang po sbas pa nyid dam /
K12D0724_H0711:341a-4: lus la gang cung zad bsgrub bya min pa'i nad de dang /
K12D0724_H0711:341a-5: de rnams la de las thar ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:341a-8: gang blangs pa'i mchog de sbyin par mdzad do //
K12D0724_H0711:341a-9: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas su 'ang 'gro'o //
K12D0724_H0711:341a-11: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pos
K12D0724_H0711:341a-12: ku sha'i khres yod pas au dum b'a ra'i cho
K12D0724_H0711:341a-14: au dum b'a ra'i shing gi shing lham gnyis sam /
K12D0724_H0711:341a-15: rdza mkhan gyi sa la de nas thams cad mnyam pa nyid do //
K12D0724_H0711:341a-16: sgrol ma'i mchog tu gsang ba'i nye ba'i snying po'i cho gar 'gyur te /
K12D0724_H0711:341a-17: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:341a-18: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya; bo dhi satv'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:341a-20: aom ku ru ku ru kulle sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:341a-21: 'di ni rig pa 'di thams cad kyi mchog tu
K12D0724_H0711:341a-22: gsang ba'i nye ba'i snying po ste bzlas pa tsam
K12D0724_H0711:341a-23: gyis 'jigs pa thams cad gnon par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:341a-24: nad thams cad zad cing 'joms so //
K12D0724_H0711:341a-25: 'jigs pa thams cad 'joms par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:341a-26: las phran tshegs rnams kyang bklags pas 'grub bo //
K12D0724_H0711:341a-27: 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu zlos par byed pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:341a-28: de nas mig sman ldong ros aa shv'attha'i 'dab ma
K12D0724_H0711:341a-29: bdun gyis nang du ji srid dro bar gyur ba
K12D0724_H0711:341b-0: de srid du bzlas @341b par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:341b-1: do bar byed bzhin pas ni dbang du byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:341b-2: du ba 'thul bas ni mi snang ba'o //
K12D0724_H0711:341b-4: til gyi sreg blugs 'bum gyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:341b-5: gang 'dod pa de ster bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:341b-6: 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas par bya ste ji srid
K12D0724_H0711:341b-7: du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar
K12D0724_H0711:341b-8: byed do // de mthong na gang brtsams pa de 'grub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:341b-9: tsandan dkar po'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag
K12D0724_H0711:341b-10: brgya bya ste nyim so sor la dong tse rnyed
K12D0724_H0711:341b-11: do // tsandan dmar po'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg
K12D0724_H0711:341b-12: stong phrag brgya bya ste nyi ma re re la
K12D0724_H0711:341b-13: kar sha pa na drug rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:341b-14: 'bum phrag bdun bdun bzlas par bya ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:341b-15: 'bum phrag lnga bzlas par bya ste nad 'joms par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:341b-16: mtshan mo brgyad du lan gsum yongs su bzlas pas nad 'joms par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:341b-17: 'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas par bya ste bcud len dang /
K12D0724_H0711:341b-19: de zos nas gnyer ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:341b-20: skra dkar spangs par 'gyur ro; ;'bum phrag gsum gyis gri dha sh'i sel bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:341b-21: lcags bsregs nas lan gsum bzlas pa'i til mar gyis
K12D0724_H0711:341b-22: rkang ba g-yas pa la bskus nas lcags des rkang
K12D0724_H0711:341b-23: pa la gdung par bya zhing gri dha sh'i chod
K12D0724_H0711:341b-25: 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:342a-0: yungs kar rgyal po'i sreg blugs byas pas dbang du 'gyur @342a *//
K12D0724_H0711:342a-1: zhing mtshan mo bdun gyis nor gyi bdag por 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:342a-2: te 'dod pas nye bar bzhag pa ma gtogs so
K12D0724_H0711:342a-3: // m'arga la 'bum bzlas te bskul na bza' btung gang blangs pa de rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:342a-4: aarga'i yam shing gis sbyin sreg byas na gser sad brgyad rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:342a-5: shing pi n+ya ki gi sbyin sreg bya ste skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:342a-6: t'ambu la'i phye mas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya ste cod pan 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:342a-7: bye ba bzlas par bya ste 'khor brgyas bskor ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:342a-8: 'bras yos kyi bsregs blugs stong phrag brgyad kyi sbyin
K12D0724_H0711:342a-9: sreg bya ste nyi ma bdun gyis bgegs rnams med
K12D0724_H0711:342a-10: par 'gyur ro // 'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas par bya ste /
K12D0724_H0711:342a-11: ba lci skam po hvags kyi btso bor 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:342a-13: dug med par brjod pas bskus na dri bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:342a-14: t'ambu la thams cad yang dag par sbyar te 'bum gyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:342a-15: t'ambu la mtshang ba nyid med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:342a-16: aa p'a margas mig nad sel bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:342a-17: rims kyis btab pa la ku shas byabs pas so //
K12D0724_H0711:342a-18: srad bu la brgyad brgya bzlas nas bcing bar bya ste skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:342a-20: zho lhan cig pa 'bum gyis sbyin sreg byas na
K12D0724_H0711:342b-0: ji srid 'dod pa'i zas ma tshang ba @342b med
K12D0724_H0711:342b-1: par 'gyur ro // mar gyi sreg blugs stong gi sbyin sreg byas na yul gru gsum rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:342b-2: bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams kyis sgrub pa lan gsum gyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes sa //
K12D0724_H0711:342b-3: gu gul gyi ril bu ka par sha'i rus pa'i tshad kyi sbyin sdreg stong phrag brgya bya /
K12D0724_H0711:342b-4: nyi ma re re la pan bcu drug rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:342b-5: lhag ma med pa zad par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:342b-6: dong ka'i me tog gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya
K12D0724_H0711:342b-7: bya ste ma btags pa'i gos sna tshogs pa bye
K12D0724_H0711:342b-8: ba phrag bcu gnyis rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:342b-9: snying rjes sbyin du bcug pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:342b-10: de bzhin du dad pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:342b-11: lha bsnyen pa las gzhan ma yin pas 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:342b-12: zhes de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:342b-13: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di yang chos thams cad kyi
K12D0724_H0711:342b-14: nang du gtogs par rtog pa thams cad kyi nang
K12D0724_H0711:342b-15: du gtogs pa'i rig pa 'di ni cho ga rgyas
K12D0724_H0711:342b-16: par bstan par lo brgya phrag gis kyang di dang
K12D0724_H0711:342b-17: / 'dis mdor bsdus nas bstan par mi nus so //
K12D0724_H0711:342b-18: cho ga gzhan rnams su yang rig pa 'di sgrub
K12D0724_H0711:342b-19: pa'i cho ga de thams cad bsgrub par bya zhing
K12D0724_H0711:342b-20: / de bzhin du gang nges par brjod pa'i las rnams sgrub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:342b-21: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir rig pa'i sngags de rnams
K12D0724_H0711:342b-22: dang gang sngags rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba de
K12D0724_H0711:342b-23: rnams kho na yangs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge
K12D0724_H0711:342b-24: 'dzin rab tu gsal ba la sogs pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:342b-25: rtog pa gzhan gyi chogs kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:343a-0: de rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i sgrub @343a *//
K12D0724_H0711:343a-1: thabs kyi spyod pa sbyin pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:343a-2: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:343a-5: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i rig pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:343a-7: rtog pa thams cad du rgyas par bstan pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga bcu rnams dang /
K12D0724_H0711:343a-8: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga brgyad rnams kyang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:343a-10: 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i rtog pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:343a-11: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu bzhi po'i rtog pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:343a-14: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud ste
K12D0724_H0711:343a-15: rtog pa chen po thams cad kyi spyod pa'i cho
K12D0724_H0711:343a-16: ga rnams su mnyam pa nyid du 'gro bar byed
K12D0724_H0711:343a-17: do; ;de bzhin kho na bdag gis brjod pa de
K12D0724_H0711:343a-18: dang / sangs rgyas mtha' yas pas gsungs pa'i rtog
K12D0724_H0711:343a-19: pa'i rgyal po bde blag tu bsgrub par bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:343a-20: mtha' yas pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu 'gro'o
K12D0724_H0711:343a-21: dang / // byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom
K12D0724_H0711:343a-22: ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral ba gyen
K12D0724_H0711:343a-23: brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa thams cad thun mong
K12D0724_H0711:343a-24: pa'i cho ga'i rig pa'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so
K12D0724_H0711:343a-25: dang / // //// phyag rgya'i le'u bri bar bgya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:343a-26: de nas sems dpa' chen po phyag rgya yang dag
K12D0724_H0711:343a-27: par mgu bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
K12D0724_H0711:343b-0: par zhugs @343b nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho
K12D0724_H0711:343b-2: rgyud thams cad gyi nang du gtogs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:343b-3: phyag rgya ri mo'i cho ga /
K12D0724_H0711:343b-4: rab tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin du gyur pas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid gsungs par gyur to //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-5: bcing pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-6: shes nas rab tu bzhag pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-8: rigs kyi phyag rgya cha gsum rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-10: gtsug tor phyag rgya rdzogs pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-13: gtsug tor de nyid cung zad bteg /
K12D0724_H0711:343b-15: kun tu dkar ba gdugs dkar can //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-17: gzi brjid phung po rdo rje nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-18: gzhan gyis mi thub lan gsum dkris; ;rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-19: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad lte bar bcas //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-20: chos kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid do //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-21: padma rin chen nor bu ni //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-22: rin chen snying po'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-23: de nyid dkyil 'khor so sor gnas //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-24: las kun byed pa'i gdu bu can //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-25: dbus su son pa dbus ma yin //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-26: spyan de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-27: de nyid rtsa ba can gyis dman; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-28: rtse mo'i steng 'og nus pa'i mtshan //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nus pa 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:343b-30: 'bar ba'i tshogs pa gzhan mi thub //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-2: thams cad lhung bzed sogs phyag rgya //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-3: sngags sam yid kyi bye brag las //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-4: de bzhin gshegs rigs phyag rgya 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-6: 'dab ma can rdzogs gang ba yi //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-7: zla ba'i rnam pa cha dang bcas //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-8: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya padma can //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-9: padma g-yo ba'i steng du ni //

K12D0724_H0711:344a-11: rta mgrin dang ni sngon phyogs kyi //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-13: padma dkar po gos dkar can //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-14: ze 'bru de nyid grags ldan ma'i //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-15: autpal de nyid sgrol ma yi //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-17: cung zad rin chen khro gnyer can //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-18: sdong bu dang bcas dpal mo ste //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-19: pho nya mo kun zhes bya'i rigs //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-20: kha bye rgyas pa rigs rgyal mo'o //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-21: lhag ma rnams kyi thun mong nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-22: phyug pa'am ril ba spyi blugs kyi //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-23: rnam pa de dag lhag ma ru //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-24: rig pa can rnams kyis shes bya //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-26: rtse mo lnga pa rdo rje yi //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-27: gdong gnyis lha mo so sor gnas //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-28: 'bar ba'i phreng ldan rig pa mchog /
K12D0724_H0711:344a-29: rig pa'i rgyal po'i rdo rje'o //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-30: dam tshig rdo rje thad kar gnas //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-31: bum dbus steng song m'a ma k'i /
K12D0724_H0711:344a-32: gtsug tor gcig pa rgyal ba ste //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-33: gtsug tor gnyis pa rnam pa rgyal //
K12D0724_H0711:344a-34: gtsug tor gsum pa rdo rje'i mtshan //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-0: @344b dbus su mdung gi rnam pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-1: rdo rje yi ni mtshan ma 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-2: dbus su 'khyil ba byas nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-3: mdung la 'khyil ba mngon phyogs pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-4: rdo rje'i dbus su dkyil 'khor la //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-6: yod pa phreng ba can ma'o //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-7: rdo rje gnyis ka'i rtse mo la //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-8: phreng ba dag byed phreng ba 'chang //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-9: cung zad cod pan gzhogs su ni //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-10: lcags kyu rdo rje lcags kyu ma'o //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-11: dbyug pa dbyug pa'o de bzhin du //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-12: dgra sta dbus ma'i rtse ma'i rtse mor gnas //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-13: rdo rje khu tshur bum can yang //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-14: de nas nges pa'i rnam pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-15: rdo rje rtse gcig 'bar bcas pa //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-16: rdo rje kha ma dung gi sna //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-17: pho nya mo yi ring po ste //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-18: khro bo rnams kyi thung du 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-19: rnam par 'phro ba rig pa'i rgyal //

K12D0724_H0711:344b-22: 'og tu mdung la steng rdo rje //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-23: tshogs kyi'o steng du mdung dang ni //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-25: dbus su bi 'di'i phyogs bzhi ru //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-26: mgo gsum rdo rje bi d'i ni //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-27: rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du'o //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-28: de nyid 'dir yang de bzhin du //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-29: thams cad du ni 'bar bcas pa //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-30: bdun lnga gsum gyi 'bar bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-31: rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad la //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-32: rdo rje lnga yi mtshan nyid rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-33: phyag rgya bcas pa'o gtum po rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-34: bi d'i ga dang bcas pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:344b-35: gcig shos 'jig rten pa rnams ni //

K12D0724_H0711:345a-3: ji ltar 'gro bar bya ba yi //
K12D0724_H0711:345a-4: dge ba'i spyod pas 'jig rten pa //

K12D0724_H0711:345a-8: aom sa ra sa ra badzra pra k'a ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:345a-11: raksha badzra panydza ra h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:345a-14: badzra badzri bhu bandha bandha h'um phat sv'ah'a //
K12D0724_H0711:345a-16: de ltar 'di rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyag rgya'o /
K12D0724_H0711:345a-17: de nas sems dpa' chen po des slar yang phyag
K12D0724_H0711:345a-18: rgya yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya
K12D0724_H0711:345a-19: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgrub
K12D0724_H0711:345a-20: thabs thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga mtshungs pa nyid
K12D0724_H0711:345a-22: rig pa thams cad la kun nas mnyam par 'jug
K12D0724_H0711:345a-23: pa de rnams gdon mi za ba kho nar dngos
K12D0724_H0711:345a-24: grub rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes so //

K12D0724_H0711:345a-28: de bzhin gshegs rigs dam tshig gi /
K12D0724_H0711:345a-29: phyag rgya lhan cig par bsgrags so //
K12D0724_H0711:345a-30: dang por sngags bcas rdzogs par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:345a-31: bzlas pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //

K12D0724_H0711:345b-0: de bzhin @345b gshegs pa'i rigs su dam tshig gi sngags so //
K12D0724_H0711:345b-1: g-yon pa'i rgyab phyin ci log tu 'gyur te bkan
K12D0724_H0711:345b-2: pa lag pa'i mthe'u chung bzung la gang gis mthe

K12D0724_H0711:345b-4: sor mo dag ni mchog gi dam tshig gi sngags
K12D0724_H0711:345b-5: te rdo rje'i rigs su rab tu grags par 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:345b-7: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:aom badzra aud bha
K12D0724_H0711:345b-8: b'a ya sv'ah'a; ;rdo rje rigs su dam tshig gi
K12D0724_H0711:345b-10: gung mo'i sor mo gung mo can //
K12D0724_H0711:345b-11: byas nas thal mo sbyar byas pa //
K12D0724_H0711:345b-12: sor mo gnyis rtag bug pa med //

K12D0724_H0711:345b-18: zhes pa dam tshig phyag rgya ni //

K12D0724_H0711:345b-21: stobs chen pha rol gnon pa 'o; ;dang por bcing bya rtag tu slar //
K12D0724_H0711:345b-22: sgrub pos lha yi spyan snga ru //
K12D0724_H0711:345b-23: de yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //

K12D0724_H0711:345b-25: 'jig rten mgon po mtha' yas dang //
K12D0724_H0711:345b-26: de sras bdag nyid che rnams kyis //

K12D0724_H0711:345b-29: rtag tu snga bar langs nas 'ni //
K12D0724_H0711:345b-30: nyin re nyin re bcing bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:345b-31: gtsang zhing dad dang blo gros ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-1: dam tshig phyag rgya gsum po 'di //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-2: gang gis shes ba blo ldan pas //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-3: gzung ba'i 'phags pa'i man ngag gis //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-4: de yi dngos grub the tshom med //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-5: 'di rnams rnam par shes pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-6: cho ga nyams kyang sgrub pa pos //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-7: de yi dngos grub byed pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-8: stobs po che la sogs rnams kyis //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-9: phyag rgya kun tu srung don du //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-10: de nas dbugs 'byin chen po de //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-11: bdag gis kun nas snang ba yi //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-12: phyag rgya yang dag skul byed pa'i //

K12D0724_H0711:346a-14: phyag rgya rab tu gsungs pa ste //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-15: sgrol ma kun gyi thun mong du //

K12D0724_H0711:346a-26: sgrol ma spyan drang ched du ni //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-27: 'di rnams rig pa lhan cig pas //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-28: zhes 'di sgrol ma thams cad kyi //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-29: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-30: sgrub pa po ni don thams cad //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-31: rang gi rig pa sbyar ba yin //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-32: cho ga nyams kyang dad ba yis //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-34: de nyid mthe bong bkan byas nas //
K12D0724_H0711:346a-35: mchod yon dag ni dbul bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-0: de nas @346b mchod yon can du 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-3: lag pa bkan te bteg la brkyang //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-4: mthe bong gdan du rab brtag bya //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-5: de nyid 'dod pa'i sgrub pa'i don //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-6: lha rnams yongs su mnyes par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-8: mthe bong dag gi rtse mo cha //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-9: bskum nas tha dad gyur gang nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-10: khrus byas bdag nyid don bzang sgrub; ;khrus kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-11: sor mo'i rtsa ba'i nye logs su //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-12: g-yas pa'i mthe bong rnam par dgod //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-13: sman dang srog chags yan lag ni //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-14: yongs su spangs te dri dag dbul dri'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-15: de bzhin g-yon pa'i mthe bong yang //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-16: mnyam par bzhag pas rnam par dgod //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-17: lha yi dri mchog dang ldan pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-18: me tog sna tshogs dbul bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-20: sdigs mdzub g-yas pa'i rtse mo ni //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-21: bskum ste gung mor gnas par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-22: gang gis mthe bong can gyis ni //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-23: de yis bdug spos dbul bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-25: g-yon pa'i mthe bong sdigs mdzub ni //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-26: gung mor gang gis gnas par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-27: gtsang zhing dag par yang dag ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-28: de nyid gtor ma'i mchod par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-30: sdigs mdzub rtse mor mthe bong gnyis //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-31: rnam par bkod pa byas nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-32: ba yi mar ni phul byung byas //
K12D0724_H0711:346b-33: sgron me dbul bar bya ba 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-0: @347a *// gung mo'i rtse mor mdzub mo ni //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-1: phyi yi rtse mo'i tshigs su sbyar //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-2: mthe bong dang ni ming med dag /
K12D0724_H0711:347a-3: bgrang phreng srad bu yongs su 'dzin //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-5: rtag tu me ru mngon phyogs pas //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-6: lag pa g-yas pa'i ming med ni //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-7: gung mo'i tshigs su byas par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-8: lag gnyis sbyar ba'i gung mo la //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-9: mthe bong cung zad rnam 'dud pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-10: me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-11: ming med mthe bong sbyar byas nas //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-12: sngags dang bcas pa rab sbyar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-13: de nyid kyis brjod gshegs su gsol //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-14: me lha spyan drangs pa bskul ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes
K12D0724_H0711:347a-15: pa 'di sgrol ma thams cad kyi rig pa'i tshogs
K12D0724_H0711:347a-16: kyis yongs su bskor ba'i phyag rgya ste sgrub pa
K12D0724_H0711:347a-17: po dngos grub mnyam pa med pa 'dod pa rnams
K12D0724_H0711:347a-18: kyis thun mong du rtag tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-19: rkang pa 'khyog por byas nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-20: phyag rgya rnam par rgyas pa ni //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-21: lag gnyis brkyang byas 'khor lo dang //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-22: sngon du mthe bong bskul nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-23: khu tshur bcings te mthe bong dag /
K12D0724_H0711:347a-24: mnyam par bshibs te brkyang bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-25: gung mo sgreng ba'i phyag rgya 'di //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-26: blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' yi //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-27: dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar grags pa yin; ;sgrub pos myur du sbyar bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-28: dngos grub thams cad byed par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:347a-30: legs par kha sbyar ba thal mo khong stong du
K12D0724_H0711:347b-0: 'gyur te kha sbyar gyi phyag @347b rgya'o; ;gang du
K12D0724_H0711:347b-1: mthe bong nang du bcug pa ni bzang po'i gdan
K12D0724_H0711:347b-2: no // bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:347b-3: thal mo khong stong des rab tu brjod pa'i kha
K12D0724_H0711:347b-4: sbyor gyi phyag rgya las ming med kyi sor mo
K12D0724_H0711:347b-5: yang dag par sbyar ba ni kha sbyor gyi phyag
K12D0724_H0711:347b-6: rgya'i gtso bo padma'i rnam pa 'od zer gyi rnam
K12D0724_H0711:347b-7: pa ni padma'i phyag rgya'o zhes sgrub pa po blo
K12D0724_H0711:347b-8: dang ldan pas shes par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:347b-9: gdan gyi don tu rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:347b-10: phyag rgya 'di ni grags pa chen po'o //
K12D0724_H0711:347b-12: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ni rab tu brjod pa de autpa la de 'dir brjod par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:347b-13: nas tsam rnam par grol ba ni phyag rgya'i padma'i tog ni yan lag nyid do //
K12D0724_H0711:347b-14: autpa la'i phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang /
K12D0724_H0711:347b-15: sgrol ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de phyig rgyar yongs su bsgrags so //
K12D0724_H0711:347b-16: tshigs gsum pa bcag pa ni khro gnyer can gyis so //
K12D0724_H0711:347b-17: de kho na tshigs bar par gyur pa yang dag
K12D0724_H0711:347b-18: pa kho nar 'dod pa ni ting nge 'dzin yangs
K12D0724_H0711:347b-21: mthe bong yang dag par sbyar ba'i phyag rgya ni ral gcig ma'i cod pan las so //
K12D0724_H0711:347b-22: dang po ting nge 'dzin yang dag par gsungs pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:347b-23: rig pa'i sngags rnams phyag rgya gnyis pa ral gcig
K12D0724_H0711:348a-0: ma'i 'o // phan tshun sbyar byas lhag ma phyi rol tu skra'i rnam @348a *//
K12D0724_H0711:348a-1: par rab tu brkyang nas dbus ma gnyis ni mdung
K12D0724_H0711:348a-2: gi rnam par legs par gnas pa'i phyag rgya ni
K12D0724_H0711:348a-3: mdung du yang dag par bshad do //
K12D0724_H0711:348a-4: lha yi 'bar bar byed pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:348a-5: yang dag par mtshungs pa 'di bstan pa tsam gyis
K12D0724_H0711:348a-6: gdug pa rnams thams cad rnam par 'joms pa mdung
K12D0724_H0711:348a-7: gi phyag rgya'o // zhes pa phyag chen 'di rnams ni //
K12D0724_H0711:348a-8: dam tshig don du rab sbyar ba //
K12D0724_H0711:348a-9: gang gis yang dag shes byas pa //
K12D0724_H0711:348a-10: de yis dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:348a-11: phyag rgya lhag ma thams cad nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:348a-12: tshad med grangs med nyid du bya //
K12D0724_H0711:348a-13: phyags rgya yang dag yongs su bsgrags //
K12D0724_H0711:348a-14: mdor na 'di ru brjod pa ni /
K12D0724_H0711:348a-15: sems can sems ni dur ba rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:348a-16: las chen byed par mi nus pa //
K12D0724_H0711:348a-17: mdor bsdus 'dir ni brjod par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:348a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod bcom ldan 'das ma
K12D0724_H0711:348a-20: 'phags ma sgrol ma ral bgyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i
K12D0724_H0711:348a-21: rtog pa phyag rgya'i le'u rab 'byams rdzogs so ////
K12D0724_H0711:348a-22: de nas yang sems dpa' chen pos slar yang dngos
K12D0724_H0711:348a-23: po'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin sgom zhing las
K12D0724_H0711:348a-24: thams cad kyi dngos grub byed pa rtog pa'i rgyal
K12D0724_H0711:348a-25: po 'dir gos dkar mo zhes bya ba rang gi
K12D0724_H0711:348a-26: rigs kyi rig pa chen mo'i sgrub thabs srung ba'i
K12D0724_H0711:348a-27: don dang / bgegs bzlog pa'i don tu gsungs pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:348a-28: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:348b-0: @348b na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:348b-12: aom ka te; bi ka te /
K12D0724_H0711:348b-19: 'di ni gos dkar mo zhes bya ba de'i rig pa chen mo ste /
K12D0724_H0711:348b-21: sngags rnams kyi dngos grub byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:348b-22: padma'i rigs su rigs kyi rig pa 'dis bdag nyid srung ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:348b-25: ras ris gnas pa dang; lha rnams bsrung bar bya ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:348b-26: ras ris grub pa 'di yang khyed kyi sgrub thabs gsum byas nas sam /
K12D0724_H0711:348b-27: bdun byas nas bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:348b-28: de nas rang gi lha'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya ste myur du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:348b-29: bzlas pa'i mthar yang bgegs rnams srid pa gzhan du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:348b-30: rtag tu bzlas pas kyang nad med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:348b-31: nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang bral ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:348b-33: bde ba'ang so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:348b-34: srad bus bdag nyid srung zhing phyir zlog pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:348b-35: de nas 'di'i phyag rgya nyid ni sgrol ma thams
K12D0724_H0711:348b-36: cad kyi spyi'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste de nyid
K12D0724_H0711:348b-37: ni sdigs mdzub bcings nas 'khyil ba'i rnam par bya
K12D0724_H0711:349a-1: zung yang kun tu btsir ba ni gos dkar mo'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:349a-2: 'di yang phyag rgya'i sgrub thabs kyi rig pa mnyam
K12D0724_H0711:349a-3: par 'gro ma gdon mi za ba ste dang por
K12D0724_H0711:349a-4: zhabs la phyag byas te de nas las thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:349a-5: bya'o // yang rtog pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po chen po 'dir 'phags ma sgrol ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:349a-6: sgrol ma thams cad kyi sgrub pa mngon par mdzes pa thams cad dang /
K12D0724_H0711:349a-8: nyes pa byas pa thams cad zlog par byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:349a-9: 'phags ma sgrol ma thams cad kyi rtog pa'i cho
K12D0724_H0711:349a-10: ga rab tu sbyor ba sgrub nus par 'gyur te
K12D0724_H0711:349a-12: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:349a-13: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0724_H0711:349a-24: aa mi t'a bha su t'a sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:349a-25: sarbe sh'am a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya sv'ah'a //
K12D0724_H0711:349a-26: 'di 'ang 'phags pa bzang po zhes bya ba 'phags
K12D0724_H0711:349a-27: ma sgrol ma'i rig pa chen mo nya bar 'tshe
K12D0724_H0711:349a-28: ba thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:349a-29: gang 'di sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i cho ga rab 'byams spyod pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:349a-31: phyag rgya'i cho ga la sogs pa de thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:349a-32: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i zla bas bsgrub par bya'o zhes
K12D0724_H0711:349a-34: rtog pa gzhan gyi cho gas kyang sgrub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:349b-0: rtog @349b pa med pas kyang mngon spyod kyi las
K12D0724_H0711:349b-1: 'di byed de phyag 'tshal ba'i yi ge spangs nas
K12D0724_H0711:349b-2: rig pa 'ba' zhig gi sv'ah'a gnas su h'um phat
K12D0724_H0711:349b-3: sbyin par bya'o // rtog pa gzhan gyis chogs kyang ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:349b-4: gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:349b-5: yang na nye bar 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:349b-6: mdor na gang 'dod pa de sgrub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:349b-7: de nas sems dpa' chen po de thams cad dang
K12D0724_H0711:349b-8: ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas bsam pa rnam par
K12D0724_H0711:349b-9: dag pas sems dpa' chen po rnams la smras pa
K12D0724_H0711:349b-10: / gang rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:349b-12: yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba de rnams don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:349b-13: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /
K12D0724_H0711:349b-14: sems can thams cad la kun nas dga' ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:349b-16: gang du rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ba mchod rten du 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:349b-17: sa phyogs de gang nyid kyis lag mthil du phyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:349b-18: mchod pa 'di lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na rigs kyi bu 'am /
K12D0724_H0711:349b-19: rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos kyi rnam
K12D0724_H0711:349b-20: grangs 'di thob pa des thams cad du rnal 'byor
K12D0724_H0711:349b-21: du bya'o // sems can thams cad kyi stobs dang /
K12D0724_H0711:349b-22: stobs med pa shes nas rab tu gsal bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:350a-0: @350a *// 'di'ang gtsang ma'i phyogs su thams cad kyis rab tu spyod par 'gyur gyi /
K12D0724_H0711:350a-2: gang zhig byed pa de mngon par 'dod pa med pa sems can gyi bsam pa spang ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:350a-4: chos smra ba po la ma gus pa la mi
K12D0724_H0711:350a-5: 'jug pa'i rab tu sbyor bas rab tu sbyar bar
K12D0724_H0711:350a-6: bya'o // rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir sgrub pa po
K12D0724_H0711:350a-7: thams cad kyis srung ba'i don du rtag ma dang
K12D0724_H0711:350a-8: bya'o // / lhag ma med pa'ang rung ste gtsang
K12D0724_H0711:350a-9: sbra byas pas srung ba'i don du rig pa'i rgyal
K12D0724_H0711:350a-11: na mo ratna tra y'a ya; na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra ya /
K12D0724_H0711:350a-14: aom aa mri ta aud bha ba h'um phat sv'ah'a //
K12D0724_H0711:350a-15: 'di ni rta mgrin zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal
K12D0724_H0711:350a-16: po ste thal ba la lan bdun mngon par sngags
K12D0724_H0711:350a-17: pas bdag nyid srung ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:350a-18: g-yog srung ba la mdud pa'i spyod pa bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:350a-19: rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'ang rgyal lam /
K12D0724_H0711:350a-20: tha skar yang rung ste dge ba'i sbyor pa la mchod pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:350a-21: gtor ma'i cho gas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas chos dang /
K12D0724_H0711:350a-22: chos yang dag par sdud pa po la'ang bsod snyoms dang /
K12D0724_H0711:350a-23: theg pa chen po la bza' ba gya nom pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:350a-24: khyad par du yon dang bcas pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:350a-26: de bzhin du bya ste rtog pa'i rgyal po ji
K12D0724_H0711:350a-27: lta ba bzhin du rtog ba'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:350b-0: gsang sngags bklag @350b par bya ste de bzhin du
K12D0724_H0711:350b-2: ji ltar myur du dngos grub nyid kyang stsol bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:350b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:350b-4: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o //
K12D0724_H0711:350b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che shin
K12D0724_H0711:350b-6: tu rgyas pa chen po nyid kyi rtog pa'i rgyal
K12D0724_H0711:350b-7: por ral pa gyen bdzes zhes bya ba bcom ldan
K12D0724_H0711:350b-8: 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0724_H0711:350b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das ri'i rgyal po gru 'dzin
K12D0724_H0711:350b-10: na bzhugs te der bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
K12D0724_H0711:350b-11: sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
K12D0724_H0711:350b-12: bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0724_H0711:350b-14: khyod kyis ral pa gyen bdzes kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po de bshad do //
K12D0724_H0711:350b-15: da ni phyi ma'i rgyud gsang ba de gsang chen phyi ma dang bcas pa thabs sla ba /
K12D0724_H0711:350b-17: cho ga dang bcas pa sngon du 'gro bas brjod pa /
K12D0724_H0711:350b-18: snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid can skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:350b-19: skye bo mang po bde ba'i ched dang /
K12D0724_H0711:350b-20: sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa rnams la snying brtse ba'i ched dang /
K12D0724_H0711:350b-21: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa /
K12D0724_H0711:350b-22: sgrol ma thams cad kyi thun mod pa'i rig pa /
K12D0724_H0711:351a-1: rtog pa'i rgyal po nyid kyi sbyor ba rnams shod cig /
K12D0724_H0711:351a-2: bcom ldan 'das la sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol te /
K12D0724_H0711:351a-4: de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:351a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang bar mdzad na bshad par bgyi'o //
K12D0724_H0711:351a-6: dang po kho nar sgrub pa pos re zhig skyabs gsum yongs su bzung ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:351a-7: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:351a-8: ral pa gyen brdzes su ji skad gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong zhing dam tshig dang /
K12D0724_H0711:351a-9: slob dpon gyis rjes su gnang ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:351a-11: mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba /
K12D0724_H0711:351a-12: bla ma la yon phul nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang
K12D0724_H0711:351a-13: du rig pa blangs te ras ris kyi spyan sngar

K12D0724_H0711:359a-0: @359a *// la zla ba gcig tu nyi ma so sor sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o //

K12D0724_H0711:360a-10: sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug skye bo du

K12D0724_H0711:361a-27: pa'i bya ba gang gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
K12D0724_H0711:361a-28: phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i ched dang /
K12D0724_H0711:361a-29: sa dang por so sor thob pa'i ched dang /
K12D0724_H0711:361a-30: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i ched du
K12D0724_H0711:361b-0: ji ltar @361b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha dang
K12D0724_H0711:361b-1: bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bla na med pa /
K12D0724_H0711:361b-2: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K12D0724_H0711:361b-3: bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po rgyun tu nye bar bskyed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:361b-4: de bzhin kho nar bsod nams kyi mthus sems can
K12D0724_H0711:361b-5: rnams kyi gong du yongs su bsngags pa'i mtshan bzang
K12D0724_H0711:361b-6: pos brgyan pa / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:361b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rigs gang gis sngon
K12D0724_H0711:361b-8: byas pa'i las rnams kyis de bzhin du bya ba'ang
K12D0724_H0711:361b-9: rtag tu rang nyid 'khor los bsgyur ba de'ang dbang
K12D0724_H0711:361b-10: du bya ste sngon brjod pa'i las rnams kho nas
K12D0724_H0711:361b-11: so // de las kyang sa thams cad pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:361b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par ma dad
K12D0724_H0711:361b-13: pa rnams rab tu dad pa nyid kyis dkyil 'khor
K12D0724_H0711:361b-16: ji lta bu'i bsod nams des sems can rnams kyi gong du rgyal po byed du 'jug go /
K12D0724_H0711:361b-17: nye bar longs spyod yongs su longs spyad pas bya ba'ang rab tu byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:361b-18: de'ang gal te sngar brjod pa'i las kho nas de 'bangs su 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:361b-20: blon po la sogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang du byed pa'i sgrub par 'gyur te /
K12D0724_H0711:361b-23: dbyar gyi dus rnams su nges par sgrub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:362a-0: rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed pa la ni de'i rkang pa'i rkang rjes kyi rdul @362a *//
K12D0724_H0711:362a-1: dang; ske tshe mnyam par byas pa zla ba gcig
K12D0724_H0711:362a-2: tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus tshod la dus gcig
K12D0724_H0711:362a-3: tu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya ste dbang du
K12D0724_H0711:362a-4: 'gyur ro; ;cho ga gzhan ni sna ma'i me tog
K12D0724_H0711:362a-5: dang / til bsres pas sngar bzhin dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:362a-6: cho ga gzhan ni dur bha'i myu gu dang lhan
K12D0724_H0711:362a-7: cig pa'i ske tshes zla ba gcig tu sbyin sreg
K12D0724_H0711:362a-8: stong phrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du
K12D0724_H0711:362a-9: 'gyur ro // cho ga gzhan nimba'i sa bon rnams ma sh'i dang /
K12D0724_H0711:362a-11: phye ma rnams lan tshva dang bsres pa'i zla ba
K12D0724_H0711:362a-12: gcig tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la sbyin
K12D0724_H0711:362a-13: sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:362a-14: // cho ga gzhan ni til dang /
K12D0724_H0711:362a-15: aardzu na'i me tog bsres pa la mar gyis btags
K12D0724_H0711:362a-16: pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad kyis dbang du 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:362a-17: ro // cho ga gzhan nimba'i sa bon rnams dang /
K12D0724_H0711:362a-18: tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong
K12D0724_H0711:362a-19: phrag brgyad bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:362a-20: ro // rgyal po'i mdun na 'don dbang byed par 'dod pas ske tshe la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:362a-22: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad zla
K12D0724_H0711:362a-23: ba gcig la ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams nas
K12D0724_H0711:362a-24: brtsams nas dus gcig tu sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:362b-0: @362b cho ga gzhan ni sran ma ca med ka
K12D0724_H0711:362b-1: la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:362b-2: bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:362b-3: cho ga gzhan ni airgu da'i til mar gyis sbyin
K12D0724_H0711:362b-4: sreg bya ste sngar bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:362b-5: // de rnams thams cad la dong ka'i yam shing gi me sbar la sbyin sreg gam /
K12D0724_H0711:362b-6: pa l'a sha'i me la'ang rung ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:362b-7: bram ze dbang du byed pa la 'o ma can
K12D0724_H0711:362b-8: gyi shing gi me la sbyin sreg zla ba gcig
K12D0724_H0711:362b-9: tu ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams nas brtsams nas
K12D0724_H0711:362b-10: dus gcig la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na
K12D0724_H0711:362b-12: rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la tsha ba'i til
K12D0724_H0711:362b-13: mar gyis btags pa'i yungs kar seng ldeng gi shing
K12D0724_H0711:362b-14: gi me la sbyin sreg byas na sngar bzhin dbang
K12D0724_H0711:362b-15: du 'gyur ro // rje rigs dbang du byed pa
K12D0724_H0711:362b-16: la 'bras s'a lu'i zan zho dang lhan cig pa
K12D0724_H0711:362b-17: aa mra'i shing gi me la sbyin sreg bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:362b-19: dman pa thams cad dbang du byed pa la tsher
K12D0724_H0711:362b-20: ma can gyi yam shing gi me sbar nas ske
K12D0724_H0711:362b-22: nimba lhan cig pa'i sbyin sreg zla ba gcig tu
K12D0724_H0711:362b-23: ji ltar 'dod pa'i thun mtshams la brtsams nas dus
K12D0724_H0711:362b-24: gcig la stong phrag brgyad byas na de dbang du
K12D0724_H0711:362b-26: 'dir 'byung ba ni thun mong du mchog dang /
K12D0724_H0711:363a-0: tha ma sgrub pa'i las ni yungs kar dkar po stong phrag brgyad @363a *//
K12D0724_H0711:363a-1: gang bstan bya'i sbyin sreg byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:363a-2: bud med dbang du byed pa la til gyi sbyin
K12D0724_H0711:363a-3: sreg stong phrag brgyad bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:363a-4: // nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la yungs kar dkar po la mar dang /
K12D0724_H0711:363a-6: sbrang rtsis btags pa'i sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:363a-7: gang bstan bya nyi ma gsum la dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:363a-8: gzhon nu ma dbang du byed par 'dod pas /
K12D0724_H0711:363a-9: ram ga na'i me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis 'phags
K12D0724_H0711:363a-10: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas
K12D0724_H0711:363a-11: na dbang du 'gyur ro; ;spra tshil las byung ba'i
K12D0724_H0711:363a-12: gzugs brnyan byas nas bdag nyid kyi lag par bzhag
K12D0724_H0711:363a-13: ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na gang bstan pa de
K12D0724_H0711:363a-15: ras ris kyi spyan sngar me tog dkar po brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:363a-16: brgya dbul bar bya ste gang 'dod pa de dbang
K12D0724_H0711:363a-21: rgya spos rnams gcig tu byas nas btags par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:363a-22: stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags par byas nas 'di btungs pas sam /
K12D0724_H0711:363a-23: gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:363a-24: bram ze mo dbang du byed pa la ras ris
K12D0724_H0711:363a-25: kyi spyan sngar bil ba'i myu gu stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:363a-26: sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:363a-27: dur khrod du lan bdun bzlas pas bud med gang
K12D0724_H0711:363b-0: la skyes bu gang gis mdun du 'dug nas @363b
K12D0724_H0711:363b-1: stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas pas dbang du 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:363b-2: ro // sor mo gcig pa'i shing blangs nas stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags te gang dang /
K12D0724_H0711:363b-3: gang kun tu 'gugs par byed pa de dbang du
K12D0724_H0711:363b-4: 'gyur ro; ;me tog brgya pa stong phrag brgyad 'phags
K12D0724_H0711:363b-5: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dbul
K12D0724_H0711:363b-6: bar bya'o // 'di la me tog gcig blangs nas
K12D0724_H0711:363b-7: bud med la bltas nas bskor bar bya ste 'ong
K12D0724_H0711:363b-8: bar byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:363b-10: nas zan za zhib phyogs gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:363b-11: de nas grog mkhar gyis las byung ba'i nor rgyas
K12D0724_H0711:363b-12: kyi bu byas nas de la nye bar 'dug ste
K12D0724_H0711:363b-13: ji srid g-yo bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:363b-14: par bya'o // de lta bus grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:363b-15: nor rgyas kyi bu bdag nyid ma sha bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba sbyin par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:363b-18: da ltar byung ba'i don ston par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:363b-20: nas zan za zhing sku gzugs kyi mdun du stong
K12D0724_H0711:363b-21: phrag brgyad bzlas pas longs spyod so sor rnyed do
K12D0724_H0711:363b-22: // zla ba gcig tu bsod snyoms bza' zhing dkar
K12D0724_H0711:363b-23: po'i bcu gcig la mtshan mo gcig tu smyung bar
K12D0724_H0711:363b-24: gnas pas sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mchod pa chen
K12D0724_H0711:363b-25: po byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
K12D0724_H0711:363b-26: // dang / sku gzugs kyi zhabs dag la 'jus
K12D0724_H0711:363b-27: nas ji srid du sku gzugs g-yo bar gyur pa
K12D0724_H0711:363b-28: de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:363b-29: g-yos pas gang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:364a-0: @364a *// dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:364a-1: yid kyis gang skyed par byed du 'jug go /
K12D0724_H0711:364a-2: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:364a-3: gang g'ar'a zhugs te 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:364a-4: phyin nas de srid du sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar
K12D0724_H0711:364a-5: bye ma las byung ba'i mchod rten byas nas sbrang
K12D0724_H0711:364a-6: rtsi dang / 'o ma gcig tu byas te sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:364a-7: klu thams cad 'ong bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:364a-8: gang smras pa de thams cad byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:364a-9: ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te ras ris rab tu bzhugs
K12D0724_H0711:364a-10: nas til mar gyis btags pa'i tsandan gyi zhogs ma'i
K12D0724_H0711:364a-11: sbyin sreg bya ste gnod sbyin 'ong bar 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:364a-12: // gang smras pa de thams cad byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:364a-13: nags su ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas sbrang rtsi
K12D0724_H0711:364a-14: dang; ;pi pi ling gcig tu byas pa'i sbyin sreg
K12D0724_H0711:364a-15: stong phrag brgyad bya ste rig pa 'dzin pa thams
K12D0724_H0711:364a-17: bka' bsgo ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:364a-18: shing gcig tu rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying
K12D0724_H0711:364a-19: po can gyi mchod rten rab tu bzhugs nas 'bum
K12D0724_H0711:364a-21: 'bum yongs su rdzogs pa na gso sbyong can gyis
K12D0724_H0711:364a-22: gzugs kyis rnam pas byang chub shing las byung ba
K12D0724_H0711:364a-23: rtse gsum mtshan nyid dang ldan pa byed du bcug
K12D0724_H0711:364a-24: nas stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste zla
K12D0724_H0711:364b-0: ba nya la dri bzang @364b pis rab tu byugs
K12D0724_H0711:364b-1: nas ras ris la ji ltar 'byor ba'i mched pa
K12D0724_H0711:364b-2: byas nas lag pa g-yas pas blangs te mtshan thog
K12D0724_H0711:364b-3: thag tu bsgrub par bya ste ji srid 'bar gyi
K12D0724_H0711:364b-4: bar du'o // 'bar bas 'byung po'i bdag po gnyis pa gdul dka' gdul ba po //
K12D0724_H0711:364b-5: sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa'i lha chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:364b-6: rgya mtshor zhugs te 'bum bzlas so //
K12D0724_H0711:364b-7: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa gang 'dod pa'i klu de mthong bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:364b-8: nor bu rin po che'ang 'di la rab tu stsol lo //
K12D0724_H0711:364b-9: de blangs pas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te klu'i
K12D0724_H0711:364b-10: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:364b-12: nas zan za zhing 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:364b-13: de nas gso sbyong can gyis las byed pas zangs
K12D0724_H0711:364b-14: kyi snod byed du bcug nas cho 'phrul gyi phyogs
K12D0724_H0711:364b-16: sman thams cad kyis yongs su bkang bar byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:364b-17: ras ris kyi spyan sngar so sor bzhag ste ji
K12D0724_H0711:364b-18: srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:364b-19: de dang lag pa bcug nas gang 'dod pa de dang; de 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:364b-20: snod bzang po'i sgrub thabs so //
K12D0724_H0711:364b-21: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:364b-22: phyi nas zla ba nya la nor bu'am /
K12D0724_H0711:364b-23: sa las byung ba'i mchod rten byas te de nyid
K12D0724_H0711:364b-24: du ras ris byed du bcug nas cho 'phrul gyi
K12D0724_H0711:364b-25: phyogs kyi zla ba nya la 'bru dang /
K12D0724_H0711:364b-26: sman thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:365a-0: ras ris kyi spyan sngar so sor bzhag ste @365a
K12D0724_H0711:365a-1: *// mchod pa chen po byas nas bzhag pa'i nor bu'am /
K12D0724_H0711:365a-2: sa las byung ba lag pa g-yas pas blangs te
K12D0724_H0711:365a-3: skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug la ji srid
K12D0724_H0711:365a-4: 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:365a-5: yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'chang ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:365a-6: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris
K12D0724_H0711:365a-7: rab tu bzhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o; ;cho 'phrul
K12D0724_H0711:365a-8: gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nya la mchod pa sna
K12D0724_H0711:365a-9: tshogs pa byas nas mar me'i phreng ba'am rgya cher
K12D0724_H0711:365a-10: byas te lag pa g-yas pas rgyal mtshan gos dkar
K12D0724_H0711:365a-11: po 'phyang ba bzung nas ji srid 'bar ba de
K12D0724_H0711:365a-13: rgyal mtshan gyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:365a-14: thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gro'o //
K12D0724_H0711:365a-15: cho 'phrul gyi phyogs kyi zla ba nya la ras
K12D0724_H0711:365a-16: ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas bcom ldan
K12D0724_H0711:365a-17: 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:365a-18: glegs bam la dri bzang po'i dri yis so sor
K12D0724_H0711:365a-19: byugs nas dri zhim po'i me tog gi phreng ba
K12D0724_H0711:365a-20: dkris te lag pa g-yon pas bzung nas skyil mo
K12D0724_H0711:365a-21: krung gis nye bar 'dug ste ji srid 'bar ba
K12D0724_H0711:365a-22: de srid du bzlos par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:365a-23: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:365a-24: gang du 'dod pa de ru 'gro bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:365a-25: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa spyod ma'i gzhon nu
K12D0724_H0711:365a-26: ma rab tu mdzes pa legs par khrus byas pa
K12D0724_H0711:365a-27: rgyan gyis brgyan par byas nas ras ris kyi spyan
K12D0724_H0711:365b-0: sngar ji ltar 'byor pa'i @365b mchod pa bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:365b-1: lag pa g-yon pas rab tu bzung ste g-yas pas
K12D0724_H0711:365b-2: ji srid de dang thabs cig tu 'bar ba 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:365b-3: ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:365b-4: ji lta ba bzhin du thabs gcig tu rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:365b-5: mtshan ma gcig pa'i steng du lag pa bzhag nas
K12D0724_H0711:365b-6: ji srid 'khor rnams mi mthong ba de srid du
K12D0724_H0711:365b-7: bzlas par bya'o // ma mthong ba na sems can
K12D0724_H0711:365b-8: thams cad 'ongs nas grub pa gsum po thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:365b-11: nyi ma gzas gzung ba na ba bla byang chub
K12D0724_H0711:365b-12: shing gi 'dab ma'i nang du btums par byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:365b-13: dbang phyug chen po'i lha khang du ring bsrel dang
K12D0724_H0711:365b-14: bcas pa'i mchod rten du ji srid du ba 'thul
K12D0724_H0711:365b-15: ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:365b-16: des thig le byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:365b-18: nas zan bza' zhing rgya mtsho'i 'gram du'am /
K12D0724_H0711:365b-19: shing drung du thun gsum du stong phrag bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:365b-20: mtshan mo bdun du rgya mtshor gnas pa'i til rnams mthong bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:365b-21: ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:365b-22: mon sran sde'u za zhing ri bo la 'dzegs nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:365b-23: mtshan mo nyi shur ri bo la gnas pa'i gser dang /
K12D0724_H0711:365b-24: nor bu rin po che ston cing smra bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:365b-25: ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:365b-27: shing gi 'gram du zla ba gcig tu nyin mtshan du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:366a-0: thams cad chu klung gi 'gram du mthong bar @366a *//
K12D0724_H0711:366a-2: ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:366a-4: bud med dbang du byed pa la sol bas sa
K12D0724_H0711:366a-5: la gzugs brnyan bris te de'i steng du nye bar
K12D0724_H0711:366a-6: 'dug nas stong phrag brgyad nyin zhag gsum thun gsum
K12D0724_H0711:366a-10: rgyal po'i gos 'dod pas me tog dkar po yongs
K12D0724_H0711:366a-11: su mnyes pa rnams la lan gcig yongs su bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:366a-13: mtshan mo bdun la gos rnams rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:366a-14: ba'i mar la stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa tsam gyis skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro //

K12D0724_H0711:366a-19: ras ris rab tu bzhugs nas mchod pa rgya chen

K12D0724_H0711:366a-29: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la ras ris la mchod
K12D0724_H0711:366b-0: pa rgya chen po byas nas @366b dge 'dun gyi
K12D0724_H0711:366b-2: slongs mo zos nas dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:366b-3: ldong ros blangs te des ji skad gsungs pa bzhin
K12D0724_H0711:366b-4: du sa la padma 'dab brgya pa bris nas padma'i
K12D0724_H0711:366b-5: 'dab ma la nye bar 'dug ste nyi ma so
K12D0724_H0711:366b-6: sor ji srid du sa zos nas padma gyen du
K12D0724_H0711:366b-7: 'gro ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:366b-8: padma'i 'dab ma la nye bar 'dug pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa nyi shu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

K12D0724_H0711:366b-13: bde ba can du'ang 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:366b-15: stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa'i chus shing skam po la gtor na me tog dang /

K12D0724_H0711:366b-22: tog rnams nag po'i brgyad pa la stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:366b-23: dbul bar bya'o // lan tshva'i sreg blugs kyang stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:366b-24: nges par rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:367a-0: de nyid kyis brgyad pa nas brtsams @367a *//

K12D0724_H0711:367a-9: bya'o // du 'gyur ro // gtsang ma'i don du ba'i mar blangs te zla ba gzas bzung ba'am /

K12D0724_H0711:376a-19: // sdig pa las grol bar 'gyur ro //

K12D0724_H0711:376a-22: gyis las kyi sgrib pa zad par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:376a-26: pi pi ling gi phye ma cha mnyam par byas

K12D0724_H0711:376b-2: yongs su bzlas nas lhag par byas te nyi ma

K12D0724_H0711:376b-4: // zla ba gnyis kyis sbyor bas thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:376b-5: ras ris kyi spyan sngar ram /

K12D0724_H0711:376b-7: de bzhin du nyi ma so so la mi smra bar bzlas par bya'o //
