K12D0724_H0711:376b-11: chom rkun la ltas nas bzlas pas chom rkun gyis mi tshugs so //
K12D0724_H0711:376b-12: til mar la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags par
K12D0724_H0711:376b-13: byas nas mgo la skus shig skye bo thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:376b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor
K12D0724_H0711:376b-16: nye bar byugs pa byas nas me tog gcal du
K12D0724_H0711:376b-17: bkram ste khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par

K12D0724_H0711:376b-19: nyi ma bdun gyis yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:376b-20: sngon gyi tshig bla dvags nyams par byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:376b-26: // yid gzhungs par 'gyur zhing lnga brgya 'dzin par byed pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:377a-0: @377a *// chu la lan bdun bzlas nas mgo bor blugs pas dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o //

K12D0724_H0711:377a-2: gu gul gyi bdug pas ston par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:377a-3: dug gso ba la chu gris so //

K12D0724_H0711:377a-6: gu gul gyi bdug pas gdon gyis zin pa rnams la'o //

K12D0724_H0711:377a-12: nya ba la dad pas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs
K12D0724_H0711:377a-13: ta bum pa gang ba brgyad dang /
K12D0724_H0711:377a-18: kun tu ru ska'i bdug pa sreg cing bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:377a-19: lus kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol lo //
K12D0724_H0711:377a-20: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du 'o ma dang /

K12D0724_H0711:377b-7: cho ga 'di nyid kho nas rgyal po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:377b-10: gzig la sogs pa 'jigs par byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:377b-28: ro langs la seng ldeng gi phur bus byis pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:377b-29: sbyor bas rab tu 'bad pa 'khrul 'khor legs par
K12D0724_H0711:378a-1: bu lag na ral gri thogs pa bzhi bzhag ste
K12D0724_H0711:378a-2: snying gar nye bar 'dug ste lcags las byas pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:378a-3: blugs gzar gyis lcags kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:378a-4: // 'di'i kha nas lce nges par 'byung ste ral

K12D0724_H0711:378a-7: de blangs pas 'khor dang bcas pa skye bar 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //

K12D0724_H0711:378b-21: // rmi lam du dge ba dang /

K12D0724_H0711:378b-23: stong phrag bdun bzlas pas dngul sbyin par byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:379a-4: sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gsum gyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro //

K12D0724_H0711:379a-6: sbyin sreg 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur ro //

K12D0724_H0711:379a-22: mi 'tsho na gar mi byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:379a-24: bdug pa phul te der gnas pas bzlas pa bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:379b-0: dgra rnams la lan bdun yongs @379b su bzlas nas sa'i gnas su gdab bo //

K12D0724_H0711:379b-2: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la dbyug pa la yongs

K12D0724_H0711:379b-6: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dkar po bsreg pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:379b-7: brjed byed kyi gdon nyams par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:379b-8: gdon thams cad la srad bu nag po bcing bar bya'o //

K12D0724_H0711:379b-14: nyi zla gzas bzung ba na smyung bar gnas pa

K12D0724_H0711:379b-17: par bya ste byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ro //

K12D0724_H0711:379b-19: brgyar mngon par sngags par byas nas lag pa la

K12D0724_H0711:380a-0: de nas zas kham dang po la @380a *//
K12D0724_H0711:380a-1: lan gsum yongs su bzlas nas dus ma yin par
K12D0724_H0711:380a-2: brgyad brgyar bzlas pa byas nas de gzhag par bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:380a-3: // las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:380a-4: ngag kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur te nyi ma

K12D0724_H0711:380a-6: do // de bzhin du nyin mo bdun du chu la lan bdun bzlas pas so //

K12D0724_H0711:380a-9: grub rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du
K12D0724_H0711:380a-10: bzlas par bya'o // gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar aa
K12D0724_H0711:380a-11: ba marga'i yam shing stong phrag brgyad kyis sbyin sreg
K12D0724_H0711:380a-12: bzlas par bya'o // bya'o // rgyal po rgyal po'i blon po dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro //

K12D0724_H0711:380a-16: shig / de nas nag po'i brgyad pa'am /

K12D0724_H0711:380a-19: gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar gu gul gyi ril bu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:380a-21: bud med dbang du 'gyur ro; ;gu gul gyi ril bu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byos shig /
K12D0724_H0711:380a-22: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:380a-23: yang na rgyal po'i pho brang du ngag 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:380b-0: shu dag @380b khar bcug ste ji srid dngos grub
K12D0724_H0711:380b-1: rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:380b-2: par bya'o // dro bzhin pa la dbang du byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:380b-12: zla ba nya la mchod pa rgya chen po byas
K12D0724_H0711:380b-13: nas shing gi dbyug pa lag pa g-yas pas blangs
K12D0724_H0711:380b-14: te ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du gyur

K12D0724_H0711:381a-20: pa thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:381a-21: // gdong la kun tu byabs na smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:381a-22: dug rab tu nyams pa ldang du 'jug par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:381a-23: 'byung po'i gdon grol bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:381a-24: bgegs mthu med par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:381b-0: khyim du ras ris bzhugs su bcug na khyim gyi @381b bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:381b-1: so ba'i phung por bzhugs su bcug na so ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:381b-2: de bzhin du 'dab mar bzhugs su 'jug par byed na de'i dngos grub du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:381b-3: de bzhin du yon tan brjod pa gzhal du med pa skye'o //
K12D0724_H0711:381b-4: de nas zhi ba can byed par 'dod na zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:381b-5: sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i dri zhim po'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:381b-7: rgyas pa can la til dang /
K12D0724_H0711:381b-10: mon sran gre'u la sogs pa rnams zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:381b-12: mar gyis btags pa 'o ma can gyi shing gi
K12D0724_H0711:381b-13: yam shing gis me rab tu sbar nas stong phrag
K12D0724_H0711:381b-17: ras ris med pas kyang rung ste gso sbyong can
K12D0724_H0711:381b-18: gyis skyabs gsum yongs su bzung nas byang chub kyi
K12D0724_H0711:381b-19: sems bskyed do // stong phrag bcu bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:381b-20: de nas zla ba nya la zla ba gzas bzung
K12D0724_H0711:381b-21: ba na 'dod pa can thams cad la gtor ma
K12D0724_H0711:381b-22: byin nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas te mtshan
K12D0724_H0711:381b-23: thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:381b-24: de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:381b-25: khyad par thams cad rang gis len par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:381b-26: kun nas byabs pa tsam gyis 'tsho bar byed du 'jug go /
K12D0724_H0711:382a-0: chu la lan bdun bzlas pas sngags par gyis shig @382a *//
K12D0724_H0711:382a-1: kun tu myur bar 'thungs na rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:382a-3: srog chags la yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg stong gis
K12D0724_H0711:382a-4: lha ma yin gyi phug gi sgor de ltar rab
K12D0724_H0711:382a-5: tu bzhag nas nges par gnas pas 'bum bzla bar
K12D0724_H0711:382a-6: bya'o // lha ma yin gyi bu mo nges par song nas rab tu 'jug par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:382a-7: der rab tu gnas pas gang tshol bde rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:382a-8: gang du 'dod pa der kun tu gnas so //
K12D0724_H0711:382a-9: rgya mtsho'i 'gram du ras ris so sor bzhugs nas
K12D0724_H0711:382a-10: ras ris la 'bum bzlas pas klu'i rgyal po rgya
K12D0724_H0711:382a-11: mtsho'ang rang gis gnas su rjes su 'jug par byed
K12D0724_H0711:382a-12: do // de la yid bzhin gyi nor bu btsal
K12D0724_H0711:382a-13: bar bya ste de blangs nas 'dod pa thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:382a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing du spyod par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:382a-16: bskal par gnas shing thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:382a-17: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la stong phrag
K12D0724_H0711:382a-18: brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas mdud pa byed
K12D0724_H0711:382a-20: log par 'dren pa thams cad bcings bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:382a-22: chu gling du bsod snyoms za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:382a-24: ts'a ru za zhing chu klung 'dus par 'bum zlos shig /
K12D0724_H0711:382b-0: mi snang ba thams cad kyi mnga' bdag tu @382b 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:382b-1: yang dag par sdom pas lhung bzed lag pa g-yas
K12D0724_H0711:382b-2: pas blangs te skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug
K12D0724_H0711:382b-3: la ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji srid 'bar bar
K12D0724_H0711:382b-4: gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:382b-6: bskal par gnas shing rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:382b-8: mkhar gsil la sogs pa rnams la cho ga 'di nyid kyis so //
K12D0724_H0711:382b-9: nyi zla gzas bzung ba na dge slong gis bsgrub
K12D0724_H0711:382b-10: par bya ste thams cad 'di nyid kho nas bya
K12D0724_H0711:382b-11: ste bskal bar gnas shing tshangs par spyod cing thogs
K12D0724_H0711:382b-13: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod do //
K12D0724_H0711:382b-15: nas zan za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o; ;yul gru brgyad so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:382b-16: pu s'i l'a ka'i 'dab ma rnams kyis sdig pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:382b-18: dug thams cad 'joms par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:382b-19: 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas sbrul gyi mche ba'i dug kun tu 'joms par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:382b-20: sna ma'i me tog gi gnas su 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:382b-24: soo gandha ti ka la sogs pa rnams zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:382b-26: mar gyis btags te thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig rgyal po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:383a-1: ze mdun na 'don yang rung ste mtshan mo bdun gyis dbang du byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:383a-2: rig pas nyams pa la gur gum gyis gro ga'i
K12D0724_H0711:383a-3: 'dab ma la bris nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
K12D0724_H0711:383a-4: sngar ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du brgya
K12D0724_H0711:383a-5: bzlas par bya'o // tho rangs gang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:383a-6: yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas pa grong ngam /
K12D0724_H0711:383a-8: der sems can rnams shing bzhin du gnyid log par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:383a-9: ji srid nyi ma 'char gyi bar du'o //
K12D0724_H0711:383a-11: skyes pa'ang rung ste dbang du byed par 'dod na
K12D0724_H0711:383a-12: phyogs gang na de'i khyim yod pa'i phyogs der kha
K12D0724_H0711:383a-13: bltas te mtshan mo stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:383a-14: na rmi lam du mthong ba sbyin zhing nyi ma
K12D0724_H0711:383a-16: chu la lan bdun bzlas pas mche ba can thams cad kyi mchu bcing bar byed do /
K12D0724_H0711:383a-17: gter bcing pa la 'ang seng ldeng gi phur pa
K12D0724_H0711:383a-18: la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas gter gyi
K12D0724_H0711:383a-19: gnas su grva bzhi gdab bo //
K12D0724_H0711:383a-20: gter bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:383a-21: khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa
K12D0724_H0711:383a-22: byas nas chu la gtor na gtum po rnams kyis
K12D0724_H0711:383a-24: sa pha li ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:383b-0: rta'i sbangs la @383b lan bdun bzlas pas gdug pa sbyin par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:383b-3: 'bras bus kyang rung ste lan bdun bzlas pas sbrang bu 'joms so //
K12D0724_H0711:383b-4: dbang du byed pa la rgyal po'i sgor so shing za ba la so shing sbyin pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:383b-9: mche ba can thams cad rengs pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:383b-15: 'byung po dbang du byed pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:383b-16: mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon las dgrol ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:383b-20: ro langs slong bar byed pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:383b-21: phug tu 'jug par byed pa dang; mtshams bcing ba rnams la 'ang bzlas pa tsam gyis so //
K12D0724_H0711:383b-22: mi snang bar 'dod pas shing sha t'a pa ri'i
K12D0724_H0711:383b-23: rtsa ba la stong mngon par sngags pa byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:383b-24: lag pas chings shig; mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:383b-25: ras ris kyi spyan sngar bzlas pa byas nas phyi
K12D0724_H0711:383b-26: nas me tog brgyad pa dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos
K12D0724_H0711:383b-29: mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:383b-30: ji srid rtsa ba'i rin gyi tshad du byas pas brgya 'gyur gyi rin rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:383b-31: de nas zla ba gzas bzung ba na byang chub shing gi 'og tu dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:384a-2: bdug pas mchod pa byas nas ldong ros srang gcig
K12D0724_H0711:384a-3: blangs te aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bdun gyi steng du
K12D0724_H0711:384a-4: bzhag nas lus rnam par bcom nas bzhag par bya
K12D0724_H0711:384a-5: ste skad cig de nyid la de skye ste rig
K12D0724_H0711:384a-9: gnod sbyin thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro; ;lha'i rna ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:384a-11: nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mang du 'dod par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:384a-12: rig pa 'dzin pa brgya phrag gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:384a-13: gi wang sgrub par 'dod pas 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:384a-14: nas zan za zhing 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:384a-15: zla ba gzas bzung ba na lo ma bdun pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:384a-16: 'dab ma'i steng du byin nas ring bsrel dang bcas
K12D0724_H0711:384a-17: pa'i mchod rten du gi wang rnam par dor nas
K12D0724_H0711:384a-18: ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:384a-19: ji srid 'bar bar gyur par ro //
K12D0724_H0711:384a-20: thig le byas nas rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:384a-22: mig sman sgrub par 'dod pas so so b'i ra
K12D0724_H0711:384a-23: ma na srang gcig blangs nas mes gdungs bzang por
K12D0724_H0711:384a-24: byas nas mig sman gyi las rnams rtogs par bya
K12D0724_H0711:384b-0: ste zla ba gzas bzung ba na @384b chur rab
K12D0724_H0711:384b-1: tu zhugs nas ji srid grul bum du gyur pa
K12D0724_H0711:384b-2: de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:384b-3: skad cig la bcag pa tsam gyis gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa /
K12D0724_H0711:384b-4: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12D0724_H0711:384b-6: cod pan 'chang ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis
K12D0724_H0711:384b-7: mi gnod par 'gyur zhing 'khor dang bcas pa 'phur
K12D0724_H0711:384b-8: bar byed do // lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:384b-11: gser stong so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:384b-12: p'a la sha'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:384b-14: mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas bas 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:384b-15: nas zan za zhing bsgrub par bya ste rgyal po dbang du byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:384b-16: 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing gis me
K12D0724_H0711:384b-17: rab tu sbar nas nyi ma bdun du yungs kar
K12D0724_H0711:384b-20: mar gyis btags pa nyi ma bdun nam /
K12D0724_H0711:384b-21: bdun gnyis thun gsum du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:384b-22: lhag par rtogs pa dbang du 'ong ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:384b-23: rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed pa la aargha'i
K12D0724_H0711:384b-24: shing gis me rab tu sbar nas nyi ma bdun
K12D0724_H0711:384b-25: du yungs kar rgyal po'i sbyin sreg byas nas dbang
K12D0724_H0711:384b-26: du 'gyur ro // rigs bzhi dbang du byed pa
K12D0724_H0711:384b-27: la ras ris kyi spyan sngar nyi ma bdun du
K12D0724_H0711:384b-28: thun gsum du til nag po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:385a-1: sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:385a-2: sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:385a-3: cho ga 'di nyid kyis til gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:385a-4: sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:385a-5: aarga'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:385a-7: shing pi n'a ka'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:385a-8: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:385a-9: tambu la'i phye ma 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:385a-11: phyag g-yas pas mig nad sel bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:385a-12: rims kyis btab pa la ku shas phyags pas so //
K12D0724_H0711:385a-13: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la brgyad brgya bzlas te chings shig /
K12D0724_H0711:385a-15: aarga'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas til stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:385a-16: bza' ba mi zad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:385a-17: 'bru thams cad gnas gcig tu byas nas stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:385a-18: 'bru thams cad mi zad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:385a-19: shing wa ta 'ching ba can gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:385a-20: rdzas zad mi shes par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:385a-21: sbrang rtsi can gyi shing stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:385a-25: cu gang gcig tu byas nas ras ris kyi spyan
K12D0724_H0711:385b-0: sngar stong phrag brgyad mngon @385b par sngags par bya
K12D0724_H0711:385b-1: ste byang chub shing gi 'dab mar bzhag nas zlos
K12D0724_H0711:385b-2: shig / de nas des gi wang grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:385b-4: skyes pa gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:385b-5: ro; ;'bras yos kyi sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin
K12D0724_H0711:385b-6: sreg gyis shig / ji srid nyi ma bdun gyi bar du'o //
K12D0724_H0711:385b-8: ras ris kyi spyan sngar dong ka'i me tog 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:385b-9: rnam par btags pa'i gos bye ba bcu gnyis rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:385b-11: zho lhan cig sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:385b-12: ji srid 'cho'i bar du bza' ba ma tshang ba med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:385b-13: mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:385b-15: bye ba bzlas pas 'khor brgya dang bcas pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro; ;bud med dam /
K12D0724_H0711:385b-16: skyes pa dbang du byed par 'dod pas gu gul
K12D0724_H0711:385b-17: gyi ril bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs
K12D0724_H0711:385b-18: su bzlas nas sbyin sreg bya ste ming smos pa
K12D0724_H0711:385b-19: de dbang du 'gyur ro; ;shu dag la lan nyi
K12D0724_H0711:385b-20: shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas khar bcug na
K12D0724_H0711:385b-24: btung ba zhim po gang blangs pa rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:386a-0: 'bras thug po che rnams ma sha dang lhan cig stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis @386a *//
K12D0724_H0711:386a-2: gang 'dod pa de dbang du byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:386a-3: sindhu b'a ra'i me rab tu sbar nas btsos pa thams cad kyi phud kyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:386a-5: bza' ba zad mi shes par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:386a-6: gang 'dod pa'i cod pan bcings pa rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:386a-7: nimba'i me tog 'bum gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:386a-8: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:386a-9: ma nyams pa'i 'bras s'a lu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:386a-10: thug po che rnams sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:386a-12: mya ngan med pa'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas lha'i sreg blugs 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:386a-13: bu mo gang don du gnyer ba de so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:386a-14: ras ris kyi spyan sngar aa ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs te 'bum bzlas so //
K12D0724_H0711:386a-15: de nas yul de'i rgyal po bka' bsgo bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:386a-17: ts'a ru za bas gso sbyong can gyis 'bum phrag
K12D0724_H0711:386a-18: lnga bzlas par bya ste sa'i rgyal srid so sor
K12D0724_H0711:386a-20: nas zan za bar gyur pas 'bum phrag brgyad bzlas te padma dkar po 'bum dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:386a-21: kun nas rgyal srid so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:386a-22: dur bha dang byu ru stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg byas na tshe ring por 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:386a-23: yungs kar dkar po stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:386b-0: 'o ma'i snod kyis @386b aa mra'i 'dab ma stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:386b-1: nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:386b-2: pri yang ku'i snying po tshad gang yin pa 'bum
K12D0724_H0711:386b-3: sbyin sreg byed pa tshad de'i dong tse rnyed do
K12D0724_H0711:386b-4: // 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:386b-6: bza' ba don du gnyer na bza' ba'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:386b-7: ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te slongs mo za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:386b-8: mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas aa
K12D0724_H0711:386b-9: shva ttha'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas til
K12D0724_H0711:386b-10: la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang /
K12D0724_H0711:386b-11: mar gyis btags pa'i mtshan thog thag tu sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:386b-14: mar gyi sbyin sreg gis thams cad sgrub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:386b-15: sbrang rtsis sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:386b-16: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:386b-17: mar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:386b-18: gzi brjid dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:386b-23: ri'i rtse mor rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying
K12D0724_H0711:386b-24: po can gyi mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:386b-25: mchod rten bzhugs nas padma stong phrag brgya phul cig
K12D0724_H0711:386b-28: las rnams grub par ma gyur na yul gru brgya rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:386b-29: rgyal po dbang du byed pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:387a-1: nas 'jug par byed pa la zla ba gzas bzung
K12D0724_H0711:387a-2: ba na ba ser skya'i mar zangs kyi snod du
K12D0724_H0711:387a-3: 'jog tu bcug nas zangs kyi thur ma la ji
K12D0724_H0711:387a-4: srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur gyi bar
K12D0724_H0711:387a-5: de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:387a-6: wu ba 'byung bzhin pa la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:387a-7: du ba 'thul bzhin pa la mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:387a-9: sngon spyad pa byas pas dkar po'i tshes gcig nas
K12D0724_H0711:387a-10: brtsams te ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du me
K12D0724_H0711:387a-12: bla re yongs su bre ba byas nas dri zhim
K12D0724_H0711:387a-13: po'i dris mtho gang gi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor byas
K12D0724_H0711:387a-14: nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:387a-15: me tog gi mchod pa byas nas gtor ma dbul
K12D0724_H0711:387a-16: zhing mar gyi mar me stong phrag brgyad dbul bar
K12D0724_H0711:387a-17: bya'o // de nas zla ba nya la skyil mo
K12D0724_H0711:387a-18: krung gis nye bar 'dug ste ji srid gang du
K12D0724_H0711:387a-19: bee gha sta ni ta zhes pa'i sgra thos pa
K12D0724_H0711:387a-20: de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:387a-21: de nas myur du mtshan ma skye bar 'gyur te me tog gi chun po g-yo ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:387a-22: mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:387a-24: ras ris 'gul ba ste 'di rnams mthong nas gang
K12D0724_H0711:387a-25: sgrub par byed pa de 'grub te sdig pa zad
K12D0724_H0711:387b-1: lto 'phye chen po rnams dbang du byed par 'dod
K12D0724_H0711:387b-2: pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo bdun du
K12D0724_H0711:387b-3: thun gsum du seng ldeng gi sol bas me rab
K12D0724_H0711:387b-4: tu sbar nas lan tshva dang /
K12D0724_H0711:387b-5: til dang; yungs kar rnams zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:387b-7: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:387b-11: yungs kar gang yang rung ba la stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:387b-12: mngon par sngags pa byas nas phyogs bzhir thor cig
K12D0724_H0711:387b-13: / dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:387b-14: ras ris kyi spyan sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:387b-15: gtor ma phul nas mchod pa rgya chen po bya
K12D0724_H0711:387b-16: ste padma 'dab ma'i gi wang bzhag nas skyil krung
K12D0724_H0711:387b-17: gis nye bar 'dug ste ji srid dngos grub rnam
K12D0724_H0711:387b-18: pa gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par
K12D0724_H0711:387b-20: sems can thams cad du byad pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:387b-21: lo stong du 'tsho bar byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:387b-23: cing dpag tshad stong phrag du 'gro zhing de nyid

K12D0724_H0711:387b-26: yid kyis bza' ba skyed par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:387b-27: de nas 'bar bar byed pa ni nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog ltar snang ba /
K12D0724_H0711:387b-28: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa /
K12D0724_H0711:387b-29: skra li zhing tshe bskal par gnas pa /
K12D0724_H0711:388a-0: rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor @388a *//
K12D0724_H0711:388a-1: nas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:388a-2: sngon spyad pa byas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar
K12D0724_H0711:388a-3: cho 'phrul gyi zla ba'i phyogs la dus gsum du
K12D0724_H0711:388a-4: khrus bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes te thun gsum
K12D0724_H0711:388a-5: du stong phrag brgyad bzlas so //
K12D0724_H0711:388a-6: ji srid zla ba nya'i bar du'o //
K12D0724_H0711:388a-7: mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas snam

K12D0724_H0711:388a-11: 'khor nye bar byugs pa byas nas de'i steng du
K12D0724_H0711:388a-12: snam sbyar bzhag ste lag pa g-yon pas mnan nas

K12D0724_H0711:388a-15: du 'phur bar byed cing gnas pa tshad 'di nyid
K12D0724_H0711:388a-17: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas blang bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:388a-18: blangs pa tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:388a-23: lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mdun du bdar nas
K12D0724_H0711:388a-24: phyag byas par 'gyur zhing ci bgyir yang 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:388a-25: // rtag tu snam sbyar la yongs su bzlas par
K12D0724_H0711:388a-26: byed pa ni de'i tshe sems bskyed pas gdug pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:388a-27: sems de las ltung bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:388b-0: yid kyis slar yongs su bzlas pas ldang @388b bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:388b-1: mar sar las byung ba'i nor bu byas nas aa
K12D0724_H0711:388b-2: shvattha'i 'dab ma bzhi la bzhag ste ji srid dro
K12D0724_H0711:388b-3: bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:388b-4: sos ma reg par zo zhig /
K12D0724_H0711:388b-5: zos pa tsam gyis gang sems par byed pa de
K12D0724_H0711:388b-6: thams cad skye bar 'gyur te 'dod pa mang po
K12D0724_H0711:388b-7: dang / skyes bu bcu'i stebs dang /
K12D0724_H0711:388b-8: lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:388b-9: sngon spyad pa byas pas zla ba nya la ras
K12D0724_H0711:388b-10: ris kyi spyan sngar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar
K12D0724_H0711:388b-11: gnas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du
K12D0724_H0711:388b-12: dri dang / me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis
K12D0724_H0711:388b-13: mchod pa byas nas ku sha las byung ba'i ral
K12D0724_H0711:388b-14: gri la aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bdun la bzhag nas
K12D0724_H0711:388b-15: khu tshur gyi mdzub mos blangs nas ji srid du
K12D0724_H0711:388b-16: 'phro bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:388b-17: dri dang / // de blangs pas nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:388b-18: sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:388b-22: rang bzhin can gyi mig sman blangs nas lan nyi
K12D0724_H0711:388b-23: shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas mig la bsku bar bya

K12D0724_H0711:389a-0: gla rtsi la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pas kun @389a *//
K12D0724_H0711:389a-3: lan tshva la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mngon
K12D0724_H0711:389a-4: par sngags pas gang gi khyim du mngon par phyogs
K12D0724_H0711:389a-5: pas 'thor bar byed na nyi ma bdun gyis de
K12D0724_H0711:389a-7: khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags pa byas na gang gis khrus dang /
K12D0724_H0711:389a-8: 'thung bar byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:389a-9: bdag gis mthong ba la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:389a-10: pas ji srid mthong ba de dbang du byed do
K12D0724_H0711:389a-11: // gu gul gyi sbyin sreg 'bum gyis rgyal rigs so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:389a-14: phun da r'i ka la sogs pa rnams 'bul bar
K12D0724_H0711:389a-15: byed bzhin pas ni gang 'dod pa de dbang du
K12D0724_H0711:389a-16: byed do // zla ba gzas bzung ba na mtshan
K12D0724_H0711:389a-17: mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mtshan gcig par
K12D0724_H0711:389a-18: mchod pa byas nas lus kyis g-yas su tsandan dmar
K12D0724_H0711:389a-19: pos dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas lag pa g-yas
K12D0724_H0711:389a-20: pas dkyil 'khor mnan nas 'bod bzhin pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:389a-21: ji srid dkyil 'khor sa nag por skyes pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:389a-23: khu tshur bcings pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro; ;gtsug
K12D0724_H0711:389a-24: phud sgrub pa la dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams
K12D0724_H0711:389a-25: nas ji srid mtshams su gyur pa de srid du
K12D0724_H0711:389a-26: bzlas par bya'o // de nas gtsug phud la brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:389b-0: brgyar @389b mngon par sngags pa byas nas bsod snyoms
K12D0724_H0711:389b-1: la rgyu ba ni ji ltar bsod snyoms ster ba
K12D0724_H0711:389b-2: bas mthong ba dre'i tshe grub bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:389b-3: nyi ma dang po la slong mo gcig go //

K12D0724_H0711:389b-5: bsod nams dang mi ldan pas kyang 'grub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:389b-6: zla ba gzas bzung ba na 'o ma la yongs su bzlas nas 'thungs shig /
K12D0724_H0711:389b-7: bcud kyis len chen por 'gyur ro //

K12D0724_H0711:389b-11: sgo glegs lugs la mngon par 'dud pas sgo dbye bar byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:389b-15: gsang sngags thams cad phye bar byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:389b-22: sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:390a-3: sdig pa rab tu zhi bar byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:390b-1: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:390b-2: 'ching ba rnams grol bar byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:390b-16: gdon las thar bar byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:390b-20: dmag sde rengs par byed pa dang /

K12D0724_H0711:390b-24: gru rengs par byed pa dang /

K12D0724_H0711:391a-11: lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //

K12D0724_H0711:391b-0: rgyan gyis brgyan par byas @391b nas thal bas dkyil

K12D0724_H0711:391b-11: lha'i gnas su 'gro bar byed pa /

K12D0724_H0711:392a-12: sems can thams cad 'ching ba yang ngo //

K12D0724_H0711:392b-31: ba lang stong so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:392b-32: me tog 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:393a-1: do; ;aaka'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg 'bum gyis shig /

K12D0724_H0711:393a-14: p'a m'anna'i sreg blugs stong phrag brgya'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /

K12D0724_H0711:393a-16: ku mu da 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /

K12D0724_H0711:393b-7: gal te gter mi gang tsam du'ang gnas par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:393b-8: chus mi gnod pa steng du gnas so //

K12D0724_H0711:393b-10: nye bar zhi bar byed do; ;bud med gang mi

K12D0724_H0711:393b-15: ba'i rdo rje sor bcu drug ba rtse mo gsum
K12D0724_H0711:393b-16: pa byas nas tsandan dmar pos rjes su byugs te

K12D0724_H0711:393b-20: pas ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten la ras ris
K12D0724_H0711:393b-21: bzhugs nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te mar

K12D0724_H0711:394a-0: yongs su 'khor ba bdun du 'phur bar bya ste rig @394a *//

K12D0724_H0711:394a-5: pas na le sham stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya
K12D0724_H0711:394a-6: zhing na le sham gcig khar bcug nas rnam par
K12D0724_H0711:394a-7: lta bar byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //

K12D0724_H0711:394a-11: kyi spyan sngar mar me dang /

K12D0724_H0711:396a-16: dmangs rigs dbang du byed pa la 'bru nag po'i
