K12D0724_H0711:397a-27: byed do; ;thal ba la stong phrag bzlas pas gang
K12D0724_H0711:397a-28: gi phyogs su gtor ba de'i phyogs su tsher ma
K12D0724_H0711:397a-30: brgyad brgyar bzlas pas zug rdu thams cad med par
K12D0724_H0711:397b-0: byed @397b do; ;sngon spyad pa byas pas ras ris
K12D0724_H0711:397b-1: kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:397b-2: so // de nas sen mos bcad pa'i ta la'i
K12D0724_H0711:397b-3: 'dab ma la ral gri byas nas de'i 'dab ma
K12D0724_H0711:397b-5: nag po'i brgyad pa'i nyi ma nag po'i bcu bzhi
K12D0724_H0711:397b-6: pa la gso sbyong la nges par gnas pas gcig
K12D0724_H0711:397b-7: pu ri bo'i rtse mo la 'dzegs to phyogs su
K12D0724_H0711:397b-9: khru bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas
K12D0724_H0711:397b-10: bye ma la mchod rten byas te de la ji
K12D0724_H0711:397b-11: ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas kha shar du
K12D0724_H0711:397b-12: phyogs te lag pa g-yas pas ral gri blangs nas
K12D0724_H0711:397b-13: dpung pa gyen du bsgrengs te mchod rten gyi mdun
K12D0724_H0711:397b-14: du gsang sngags bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:397b-15: ji srid ral gri la yod pa'i nang gi sngags
K12D0724_H0711:397b-16: kyi yi ge de rnams 'bar bar gyur pa dang
K12D0724_H0711:397b-17: / de blangs nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing
K12D0724_H0711:397b-18: rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa
K12D0724_H0711:397b-19: thams cad kyis gnod pa med do //
K12D0724_H0711:397b-20: sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
K12D0724_H0711:397b-21: 'dod pa'i gzugs can bskal par gnas shing dpag tshad
K12D0724_H0711:397b-22: stong mthong bar byed cing thos par byed snom par
K12D0724_H0711:397b-23: byed do // ri la'ang thad kar 'gro /
K12D0724_H0711:397b-25: ra ba la'ang thad kar 'gro ;rgya mtsho la'ang mngon par 'phags par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:397b-26: nges par bsags pa rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:398a-0: ldong ros sgrub par 'dod na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi @398a *//
K12D0724_H0711:398a-1: spyan sngar de nyid du ras ris bzhugs su gsol
K12D0724_H0711:398a-2: te dkar po brgyad pa la mchod pa byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:398a-3: de'i dbus su yan lag ma nyams pa'i skyes bu
K12D0724_H0711:398a-4: bzhag nas rkang pa g-yon pas brang khar yang dag
K12D0724_H0711:398a-5: par mnan nas srung ba byas te sngags bzlas par
K12D0724_H0711:398a-6: bya'o // ji srid langs kyi bar du'o //
K12D0724_H0711:398a-8: 'o thug bza' bar bya zhing lan bdun mngon par
K12D0724_H0711:398a-9: sngags pa'i khu tshur bcings pa mgo bo la gzhu
K12D0724_H0711:398a-10: bar bya'o // de nas 'dzag par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:398a-11: de 'thungs nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:398a-12: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du nya dang bcas
K12D0724_H0711:398a-13: pa'i chu bor zhugs te dri zhim po'i me tog
K12D0724_H0711:398a-14: stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:398a-15: gos zung so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:398a-16: grong du zhugs nas brgyad brgya bzlas par bya ste mdzes pa'i bza' ba thob par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:398a-17: lan tshva dang bsres pa'i chu la brgyad brgyar mngon
K12D0724_H0711:398a-18: par sngags pas gzer thams cad nye bar zhi bar
K12D0724_H0711:398a-19: byed do // bud med bu ma thon pa la
K12D0724_H0711:398a-20: chu la lan brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags nas sbyin
K12D0724_H0711:398a-21: byed do // no // bde bar btsa' bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:398a-22: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid bco
K12D0724_H0711:398a-23: lnga'i bar du nyi ma re re la stong phrag
K12D0724_H0711:398a-24: 'phel bar byas nas bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:398a-25: mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas te ril
K12D0724_H0711:398a-26: bu'i sbyor bas ril bu rnams bsgrubs nas khar bcug
K12D0724_H0711:398b-0: mya @398b ngan med pa'i me tog dang /
K12D0724_H0711:398b-1: krishna s'a ra'i mkhris pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:398b-3: so dri ya'i sol ba rnams lhan cig cha mnyam
K12D0724_H0711:398b-4: par byas nas rgyal gyi lcags kyis dkris te slar
K12D0724_H0711:398b-5: yang lcags gsum gyis dkris par byas nas ras ris
K12D0724_H0711:398b-6: kyi spyan sngar bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:398b-7: khar bcug nas kun tu gnas pas dang por 'ching ba las grol bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:398b-8: spra tshil las byung ba'i skyes pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:398b-9: bud med kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas rnam par dben
K12D0724_H0711:398b-10: pa'i phyogs su me rab tu sngar nas brgyad brgyar
K12D0724_H0711:398b-11: mngon par sngags nas gzhu bar bya ste myos byed
K12D0724_H0711:398b-12: kyi tsher mas nges par gdab par bya zhing dbang
K12D0724_H0711:398b-13: du 'gyur te gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed
K12D0724_H0711:398b-14: do // dkar po'i nya la nyin mtshan du smyung
K12D0724_H0711:398b-15: bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar dri zhim
K12D0724_H0711:398b-16: po'i me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:398b-17: k'ar sh'a pa na lnga rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:398b-18: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung
K12D0724_H0711:398b-19: bar gnas te gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du pri yang
K12D0724_H0711:398b-20: ku'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas be kangka
K12D0724_H0711:398b-21: ta'i yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig
K12D0724_H0711:398b-22: / nor thams cad thob par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:398b-23: dkar po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar
K12D0724_H0711:398b-24: gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bya rog 'phur
K12D0724_H0711:398b-25: gyi bar du stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:399a-0: mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas nag po'i bcu @399a *//
K12D0724_H0711:399a-1: bzhi pa la gu gul gyi bdug pa bsregs te p'a la'i me sbar nas zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:399a-3: mar gyis btags pa'i ka ra ba'i ra'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:399a-4: de nas me thab tu padma'i tshad kyi ka ra
K12D0724_H0711:399a-5: b'i ra langs te ka ra b'i ra'i dbus su
K12D0724_H0711:399a-6: de'i mdog can gyi ldong ros mthong ste sngags zlos
K12D0724_H0711:399a-8: yid kyis blangs pa tsam gyis nyi ma 'char ba'i
K12D0724_H0711:399a-9: mdog [?] na lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa
K12D0724_H0711:399a-10: rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te rlung gi shugs dang
K12D0724_H0711:399a-11: bcas pa 'dod pa rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:399a-12: ro // lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do /
K12D0724_H0711:399a-13: yid kyis blangs pa tsam gyis nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog [?] na lo pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:399a-14: gal te slar yang sgrub pa byed na tshe nyis 'gyur du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:399a-15: khang stong du zhugs te phyogs gtsang mar ras ris
K12D0724_H0711:399a-16: bzhugs su gsol nas mi smra bar 'o ma dang
K12D0724_H0711:399a-17: / nas zan za zhing phyogs gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:399a-18: de nas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po
K12D0724_H0711:399a-19: byas nas gtor ma ches rgya chen po phul te
K12D0724_H0711:399a-20: skyil mo krung bcings nas ji srid 'od zer 'byung
K12D0724_H0711:399a-21: bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:399a-22: de mthong nas mtshams med pa lnga'ang zad par nye bar 'gro'o //
K12D0724_H0711:399a-23: de nas grub par 'gyur te kun nas rgyal srid chen po chen po rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:399a-24: phyir rgol ba med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:399b-0: gi wang la @399b stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags
K12D0724_H0711:399b-1: pa byas nas bdug pas bdugs te bar ma chad
K12D0724_H0711:399b-2: par 'jog tu bcug nas rgyal po'i pho brang du
K12D0724_H0711:399b-3: zhugs na smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:399b-4: thams cad kyang 'di'i dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:399b-5: ma gyur na'ang de dbang du byed pa la khyim
K12D0724_H0711:399b-6: du dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs te rkang 'thung aa
K12D0724_H0711:399b-7: ba aa b'i ya lag pa g-yon pas sreg blugs
K12D0724_H0711:399b-10: thun mong ba'i bud med dbang du byed pa la
K12D0724_H0711:399b-11: lan tshvas gzugs brnyan byas nas lag pa g-yon pas
K12D0724_H0711:399b-13: dbang du 'gyur ro; ;'bangs mo dbang du byed pa la punn'a ga'i ge sar dang /
K12D0724_H0711:399b-16: sha rnams gcig tu byas nas stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:399b-18: 'bras s'a lu btags pa las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan
K12D0724_H0711:399b-19: byas nas gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg gyis shig
K12D0724_H0711:399b-21: rna ba'i mig sman blangs nas mchod rten gcig dang /
K12D0724_H0711:399b-22: aa shvattha'i 'dab ma'i nang du gtums te stong phrag
K12D0724_H0711:399b-23: brgyad du mngon par sngags pas mig la bsku bar
K12D0724_H0711:399b-24: bya'o // gang lung phog pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:399b-27: ba lang gi gnas su rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
K12D0724_H0711:399b-28: ba'i snying po can gyi mchod rten bzhugs nas 'bum
K12D0724_H0711:400a-1: dong tse 'bum so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:400a-2: klu'i gnas su ras ris bzhugs nas srung ba'i cho
K12D0724_H0711:400a-3: ga byas pas dzam bu'i shing gi mi sbar nas
K12D0724_H0711:400a-4: mngar gsum gyi gtor ma byin te klu shing gi
K12D0724_H0711:400a-5: me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:400a-6: de nas bram ze'i gzugs can gyi klu 'ong bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:400a-7: de'ang ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:400a-8: nyi ma re re la dong tse bdun bdun rab tu stsol cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:400a-9: de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:400a-10: nyi ma re re la dong tse bdun bdun stsol bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:400a-11: lhag ma med par zad par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:400a-12: phyed dkon mchog gsum gyi nye bar sbyor ba'i ched du'o //
K12D0724_H0711:400a-13: ras ris kyi spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:400a-14: dong tse stong phrag bcu gnyis rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:400a-15: dkar po'i brgyad pa nas brtsams te ring bsrel dang
K12D0724_H0711:400a-16: bcas pa'i mchod rten du zla ba drug bzlas par
K12D0724_H0711:400a-17: bya'o // rgyal srid sbyin par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:400a-18: nag po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar
K12D0724_H0711:400a-19: gnas pas gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar bad kan mthar
K12D0724_H0711:400a-20: byed kyi snying po blangs nas srad bu dmar pos
K12D0724_H0711:400a-21: dkris te de nas b'a la sha'i shing gi me
K12D0724_H0711:400a-22: sbar nas phur bu can la stong phrag brgyad mngon
K12D0724_H0711:400a-23: par sngags pa byas nas dum bu gsum du gshags
K12D0724_H0711:400a-24: te dum bu re re la lan nyi shu rtsa
K12D0724_H0711:400b-0: gcig yongs su bzlas nas mer @400b gzhug par bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:400b-1: // tho rangs dong tse sum brgya so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:400b-2: dkar po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig tu smyung
K12D0724_H0711:400b-3: bar gnas pas aa ti mukta ka'i me tog stong
K12D0724_H0711:400b-5: nyi ma bdun bdun du dong tse stong so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:400b-6: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gcig smyung
K12D0724_H0711:400b-7: bar gnas pas mtshan mo shing ba tya ta ka'i
K12D0724_H0711:400b-8: rtsa ba rnams bsres pa'i me la stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:400b-10: dngul stong so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:400b-11: dkar po'i bdun pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar
K12D0724_H0711:400b-12: gnas pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs
K12D0724_H0711:400b-13: te padma stong phrag bcu dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:400b-14: rgyal srid so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:400b-15: skyes pa dbang du byed pa la nag po'i brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:400b-16: pa la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas nag
K12D0724_H0711:400b-17: po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig tu smyung bar
K12D0724_H0711:400b-18: gnas pas byang chub shing gi shing la me rab
K12D0724_H0711:400b-19: tu sbar nas ku mu da la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:400b-21: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:400b-23: bud med dbang du byed pa la nag po'i bcu
K12D0724_H0711:400b-24: gnyis pa la so'u ganti ka'i me tog stong phrag
K12D0724_H0711:400b-25: brgyad 'phags pa 'jam dpal la snun cig /
K12D0724_H0711:400b-29: rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi brun la lan nyi shu
K12D0724_H0711:400b-30: rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas rked pa'i phyogs so
K12D0724_H0711:401a-0: @401a *// bzhag par bya ste khu ba 'ching bar byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:401a-1: chos gos kyi rna ba la lan bdun bzlas nas mdud pa byas na dug 'ching ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:401a-2: dug gso ba la lo mas so //
K12D0724_H0711:401a-3: phyag rgya dbye ba la chus so //
K12D0724_H0711:401a-4: 'bebs pa la gu gul gyi bdug pas sam /
K12D0724_H0711:401a-6: sor mo la yongs su bzlas nas sdigs par byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:401a-7: ras ris kyi spyan sngar brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:401a-8: rmi lam du ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin ston par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:401a-9: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris
K12D0724_H0711:401a-10: bzhugs nas de'i spyan sbar mchod pa rgya chen po
K12D0724_H0711:401a-11: byas te aa p'a marga dkar po zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:401a-13: mar gyis btags pa rnams bil ba'i shing gis me rab tu sbar nas 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:401a-14: rgyal srid so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:401a-15: ma grub na grong bsdus pa stong so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:401a-16: ras ris kyi spyan sngar gi wang ngam /
K12D0724_H0711:401a-17: ldong ros la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa
K12D0724_H0711:401a-18: byas nas bskus te dgra bo rnams kyi nang du
K12D0724_H0711:401a-20: dgra bo rnams kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:401a-21: 'bebs pa la me tog dkar po dang bcas pa'i chu dron la lan gsum bzlas pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:401a-22: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog la lan gsum bzlas pas 'bebs pa la bsnun par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:401b-0: 'das @401b pa dang; ma 'ongs pa ston par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:401b-1: 'ching ba ni se gol gyi phyag rgyas shis par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:401b-2: mig sman sgrub par 'dod pas dpa' bo'i rin gyis
K12D0724_H0711:401b-3: nyos pa'i so'u bi ra'i mig sman spang gcig blangs
K12D0724_H0711:401b-4: nas bram ze'i bu mo kha byang du ba ltas
K12D0724_H0711:401b-5: pas ba byung lngas 'thag tu gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:401b-6: ming med kyi sor mos ril bu bzhi byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:401b-7: phyogs brgyad kyis rab tu sbar te cho ga 'di
K12D0724_H0711:401b-9: sra rtsi pog sreg cing stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:401b-10: grong gi mchog bcu rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:401b-11: cho ga 'di nyid kyis mchod rten byas nas tsandana
K12D0724_H0711:401b-12: gyis btags pa'i padma stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:401b-13: // yul gyi bdag po nyid stong so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:401b-14: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod
K12D0724_H0711:401b-15: rten byas nas bdug pa bsregs te tsam pa ka'i
K12D0724_H0711:401b-16: me tog stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya ste gser
K12D0724_H0711:401b-18: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod
K12D0724_H0711:401b-19: rten byas te me tog gi ge sar stong phrag
K12D0724_H0711:401b-20: brgyad dbul bar bya ste gos stong so sor rnyed
K12D0724_H0711:401b-21: do // de bzhin du me tog thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i cho ga'o //
K12D0724_H0711:401b-22: dur khrod nas ro bsregs pa'i thal ba blangs te
K12D0724_H0711:401b-23: zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas
K12D0724_H0711:401b-24: pas ming med kyi sor mo'i khrag gi zlum po
K12D0724_H0711:401b-25: byas nas gzugs brnyan bris te rkang pa g-yon pas
K12D0724_H0711:401b-27: rigs brgyud dang bcas pa dbang du byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:402a-0: @402a *// bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi mchod rten byas nas 'bras yos la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:402a-2: mar gyis btags pa'i me la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:402a-3: gi wang la stong du mngon par sngags pas thig le byas na gang mthong ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:402a-4: gang rnams mthong ba de rnams dbang du byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:402a-5: tho rangs tu rushka'i chu la lan bdun mngon par
K12D0724_H0711:402a-6: sngags pa byas te gdong bkrus pas gang mthong ba
K12D0724_H0711:402a-8: thams cad de kho na bzhin du til mar za
K12D0724_H0711:402a-9: bas khyor ba'i chu la lan bdun mngon par sngags
K12D0724_H0711:402a-11: don du ma gnyer bar bza' ba rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:402a-12: rgyal po'i pho brang du rab tu zhugs te chos
K12D0724_H0711:402a-13: gos de blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs
K12D0724_H0711:402a-14: su bzlas te lag pa g-yon pas mdud pa byas
K12D0724_H0711:402a-15: nas thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:402a-16: chom rkun gyi nang du dran par byed cing bzlas pas 'ching ba grol bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:402a-18: 'bugs pa lag pa'i sngags rnams la pa l'a'i 'bru dang /
K12D0724_H0711:402a-19: ka ra b'i ra dkar po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:402a-20: yungs kar rnams kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas ras ris
K12D0724_H0711:402a-21: kyi spyan sngar lag pa g-yon pas mnan te stong
K12D0724_H0711:402a-23: sngags rnams spong bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:402b-0: rims gzhoms par 'dod pas gi ri karni ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis @402b shig /
K12D0724_H0711:402b-2: seng ldeng gi yam shing gis brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:402b-3: gdon thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:402b-4: thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas gzhan gyis gsang sngags sgrub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:402b-5: chu la lan gcig bzlas pas grol lo //
K12D0724_H0711:402b-7: gro ga la bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo
K12D0724_H0711:402b-8: la btags na pha rol gyi dmag sde rengs par
K12D0724_H0711:402b-10: phye za zhing nag po'i brgyad pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:402b-11: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gsum smyung
K12D0724_H0711:402b-12: bar gnas pas mtshan ma gcig par song nas lus
K12D0724_H0711:402b-13: kyi g-yas su ras ris bzhugs te bcing bar bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:402b-14: // khu tshur bcings nas ji srid khu ba byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:402b-15: 'ching bar byed do zhes gsum pa la khu tshur sgrub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:402b-16: khu tshur byas na mi snang ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:402b-18: dbang phyug chen po'ang ci bgyir 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:402b-19: phyogs gtsang mar ras ris bzhugs te nyin mtshan du
K12D0724_H0711:402b-20: smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gzugs
K12D0724_H0711:402b-21: brnyan byas te cho ga bzhin du mngon par mchod
K12D0724_H0711:402b-22: nas bil ba'i yam shing zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:402b-24: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:402b-25: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi dpral ba nas 'od zer byung ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:402b-26: de nas grub par 'gyur ba ste rdzas sam /
K12D0724_H0711:403a-2: nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi
K12D0724_H0711:403a-3: spyan sngar ka ra ph'i ra'i me tog stong phrag
K12D0724_H0711:403a-5: de nas ka ra b'i ra'i me /
K12D0724_H0711:403a-6: tog gcig blangs nas klu'i gnas su song ste me
K12D0724_H0711:403a-7: tog klu mtsho bran du bug la sngags bzlas par
K12D0724_H0711:403a-8: bya'o // klu mo dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:403a-9: gang rom du gnyer ba de thob par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:403a-10: nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas nag po'i bcu
K12D0724_H0711:403a-11: bzhi pa la lam sum mdor mchod pa byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:403a-12: nye bar 'dug ste sran ma'i tshad kyis ldong ros
K12D0724_H0711:403a-13: kyi ril bu byas nas khar bcug te ji srid
K12D0724_H0711:403a-14: kha gas pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:403a-15: ldong ros grub par 'gyur te dpral bar thig le byas pas mi snang ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:403a-16: 'dod pa'i gzugs can lo lnga brgyar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:403a-17: nag po'i brgyad pa la khri'i tshogs can blangs nas
K12D0724_H0711:403a-18: gzhan mo'i brgyad pa la khro tshogs can la rtse
K12D0724_H0711:403a-20: gzhan pa'i nag po'i brgyad pa la nyin mtshan du
K12D0724_H0711:403a-21: smyung bar gnas pas dur khrod du song nas rtse
K12D0724_H0711:403a-22: gsum la mchod pa chen po byas nas skyil mo
K12D0724_H0711:403a-23: krung gis nye bar 'dug ste lag pa g-yas pas
K12D0724_H0711:403a-24: rtse gsum blangs nas ji srid rtse gsum las 'od
K12D0724_H0711:403a-25: zer byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:403a-26: de nas grub par 'gyur te mtshan mo ma brtsigs
K12D0724_H0711:403b-0: pa ru lha'i khyim 'byung ste rgyan thams cad @403b
K12D0724_H0711:403b-1: kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i bud med 'byung ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:403b-2: 'khor gyi skyes bu mang po'ang dgod pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:403b-3: sgeg pa la sogs pa rnams kyis kun khyab par
K12D0724_H0711:403b-4: nye bar gnas te gang bsams pa de thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:403b-5: rnyed do // tho rangs ston pas thams cad 'jog go /
K12D0724_H0711:403b-6: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te nyin mtshan du
K12D0724_H0711:403b-7: smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar tshangs
K12D0724_H0711:403b-8: ma'i khu ba zho gang la brgyad brgyar zlos la
K12D0724_H0711:403b-9: 'thungs shig / nyi ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:403b-10: ras ris kyi spyan sngar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:403b-11: srung ba byas te bza' ba'i ti k'a la ji
K12D0724_H0711:403b-12: srid zan du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par
K12D0724_H0711:403b-13: bya'o // de nas grub par 'gyur te phyi nas zan 'pho bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:403b-15: sngon spyad pa byas pas lcags gsum las byung ba'i
K12D0724_H0711:403b-16: 'khor lo sor bcu drug pa'i rnam pa byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:403b-17: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung
K12D0724_H0711:403b-18: bar gnas pas rtsa ba'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar
K12D0724_H0711:403b-19: mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas 'khor lo aa
K12D0724_H0711:403b-20: shvattha'i 'dab ma bdun la bzhag ste skyil mo krung
K12D0724_H0711:403b-21: gis nye bar 'dug nas ji srid 'bar ba de
K12D0724_H0711:403b-23: de nas blangs pa tsam gyis skra li zhing 'khyil
K12D0724_H0711:403b-24: ba nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can rig pa 'dzin
K12D0724_H0711:403b-25: pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te gang rnams kyi
K12D0724_H0711:403b-26: mthong ba de rnams dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:404a-0: ro // 'bar ba can legs par mthong ba @404a *//
K12D0724_H0711:404a-1: blangs nas lag pas mnan te lan bdun bzlas pa
K12D0724_H0711:404a-2: byas nas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:404a-3: ro // ku sha las byung ba'i 'khor lo byas
K12D0724_H0711:404a-4: nas lan bdun bzlas pa chur bcug ste klu rnams
K12D0724_H0711:404a-5: langs nas ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:404a-6: dong tse 'bum byin cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:404a-7: slong mo za zhing ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te stong
K12D0724_H0711:404a-8: phrag brgya bzlas par bya ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:404a-10: de mthong nas 'grub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:404a-11: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs nas aarga'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:404a-12: nyi ma mchog spyan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:404a-13: hu klung de nyid du rked pa nub tsam du
K12D0724_H0711:404a-14: zhugs nas pil ba'i me tog rab tu lhug cig
K12D0724_H0711:404a-15: / mes pos mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:404a-16: manda ra ba'i me tog gis sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:404a-17: dbang pos mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:404a-18: de nyid chu la mand'a ra ba'i me tog gis nor sbyin mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:404a-22: sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:404a-23: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te mya
K12D0724_H0711:404a-24: ngan med pa'i shing gi me tog stong phrag brgya
K12D0724_H0711:404a-25: blugs par bya'o // mtshan mo bdun gyis gnod sbyin mo rnams 'gugs par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:404b-0: @404b shing la mi smra bar zla ba drug tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:404b-1: mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:404b-2: aarga las byung ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan sor drug
K12D0724_H0711:404b-3: pa byas nas kha dog ma 'dres pas rgyan thams
K12D0724_H0711:404b-4: cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:404b-6: yang na rig pa 'dzin pa nyid do //
K12D0724_H0711:404b-7: ras ris kyi spyan sngar mi smra bar zla ba
K12D0724_H0711:404b-8: drug du lag pa g-yon pa la mngon par sngags
K12D0724_H0711:404b-9: nas khri yongs su bzlas te nye bar gyur pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:404b-13: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag bcu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:404b-14: aa p'a marga'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:404b-16: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:404b-17: gser stong phrag bcu so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:404b-18: gi wang blangs te ril bu byas nas lcags gsum gyis dkri'o //
K12D0724_H0711:404b-19: de nas gtsang zhing dkar ba'i gos bgos te dur khrod du song nas dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:404b-20: bdug pa dang; me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis
K12D0724_H0711:404b-21: mchod pa byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor
K12D0724_H0711:404b-22: ma byin te ril bu thod pa kha sbyar du
K12D0724_H0711:404b-23: bzhag nas ji srid 'jigs pa'i sgra thos pa de
K12D0724_H0711:404b-25: 'jigs par mi 'gyur grogs rnams la bgos nas yang khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:404b-26: lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:405a-1: blangs nas phyugs dang lhan cig gzhon nu ma'i lag pas btab bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:405a-2: ril bu byas nas lcags gsum gyis dkris te lag
K12D0724_H0711:405a-3: pa kha sbyar du bzhag nas dbang phyug chen po'i
K12D0724_H0711:405a-4: sku'i g-yas phyogs su kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag
K12D0724_H0711:405a-5: ste lag pa g-yas pas mnan nas ji srid shi
K12D0724_H0711:405a-6: ta'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o
K12D0724_H0711:405a-7: // rig pa bzlas te grogs rnams la'ang byin nas khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:405a-8: bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kun tu dga' ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:405a-9: lo stong phrag tu 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:405a-12: ldong ros kyang rung ste cha mnyam par byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:405a-13: gso sbyong can gyi bu mo'i lag pas btab par
K12D0724_H0711:405a-14: bya'o // lcags gsum gyis dkris pa byas nas sngon
K12D0724_H0711:405a-15: spyad pa byas pa rgyal po'i sbyor bas dbang phyug
K12D0724_H0711:405a-16: chen po'i sku'i g-yas su 'byung po thams cad pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:405a-17: gtor ma phul nas dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:405a-19: bdug pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas te kham phor
K12D0724_H0711:405a-20: kha sbyar du bzhag nas lag pa g-yas pas mnan
K12D0724_H0711:405a-21: te ji srid kha ta kha ta zhes sgrogs pa
K12D0724_H0711:405a-22: de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:405a-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gcig phul nas grogs
K12D0724_H0711:405a-24: rnams la'ang bgos te khar bcug pas mi snang bar
K12D0724_H0711:405a-25: 'gyur ro // lo stong du 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:405b-0: sngon spyad pa byas pas @405b 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:405b-1: nas zan za zhing ri'i rtse mor ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:405b-2: de nas gso sbyong can gyis grog mkhar gyis rtag
K12D0724_H0711:405b-3: tu blangs nas 'o mas sbyar te 'jam par byas
K12D0724_H0711:405b-4: nas / bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshod kyi ngang pa bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:405b-5: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:405b-6: de nas rnam par dben pa'i phyogs su ras ris bzhugs nas dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:405b-8: bdug pas mngon par mchod de 'byung po thams cad
K12D0724_H0711:405b-9: pa'i gtor ma byin nas gos gtsang ma bgos pas
K12D0724_H0711:405b-10: ras ris kyi spyan sngar ji srid ngang pa g-yo
K12D0724_H0711:405b-11: bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:405b-12: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngar yongs su bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:405b-13: pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i me tog mchod yon
K12D0724_H0711:405b-14: dbul par bya'o // slar yang brgyad brgyar bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:405b-15: thams cad 'ong bar byed de 'jigs par mi bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:405b-16: sngags bzlas pa'i rma byas reg par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:405b-17: ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do; ;lus kyi nang du son par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:405b-18: de nas sgrub pa po'i lus su mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:405b-19: skad cig de nyid la skra li zhing 'khyil ba /
K12D0724_H0711:405b-20: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa /
K12D0724_H0711:405b-21: nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog ltar snang ba /
K12D0724_H0711:405b-22: thogs pa med par 'gro bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:405b-24: lta bar byed pa de dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:406a-0: @406a *// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:406a-1: te bskal par gnas shing gang gi tshe 'chi ba
K12D0724_H0711:406a-2: de'i tshe lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:406a-3: sngon spyad pa byas pas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:406a-4: mchod rten du ras ris bzhugs nas 'bum phrag lnga
K12D0724_H0711:406a-5: bzlas par bya'o // gso sbyong can gyis mi smra
K12D0724_H0711:406a-6: bar thog phog pa'i shing blangs nas 'o mar nyin
K12D0724_H0711:406a-7: zhag bdun du gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:406a-8: de nas phyung ste sa dkar po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:406a-9: tsandana gyi chus mnyes pas ji srid rdo rje phog pa'i shing 'khrur gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:406a-10: de nas sgrub pa po gso sbyong can gyis bzo bos seng+ge byed du gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:406a-11: de nas rgyu skar snar ma la dkon mchog gsum
K12D0724_H0711:406a-12: la mchod pa rgya chen byas nas dge 'dun gyis
K12D0724_H0711:406a-13: bstan pa'i slong mo bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:406a-14: ras ris kyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po
K12D0724_H0711:406a-15: byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dbul
K12D0724_H0711:406a-16: bar bya'o // de nas sgrub pa po gtsang mas
K12D0724_H0711:406a-17: gos gtsang ma bgos te ku sha'i khres la nye
K12D0724_H0711:406a-18: bar 'dug pas lag pa g-yas pas seng+ge mnan te
K12D0724_H0711:406a-19: ji srid seng+ge g-yo bar byed pa de srid du
K12D0724_H0711:406a-20: bar bya'o // bzlas par bya'o // g-yos pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:406a-21: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan ma skye ste 'jigs par mi byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:406a-22: de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lan bdun mngon par
K12D0724_H0711:406a-23: sngags pa'i yungs kar rnams kyis seng+ge la gzhu bar
K12D0724_H0711:406b-0: bya'o // seng+ge sgra @406b chen po sgrogs par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:406b-1: sgrub pa po'ang ma bsams par dgon pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:406b-2: de nas sgrub pa pos lan bdun brjod nas seng+ge
K12D0724_H0711:406b-3: la 'jogs te rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang
K12D0724_H0711:406b-4: 'dus na seng+ge la zhon te 'khor dang bcas pa
K12D0724_H0711:406b-6: yid kyis rlung ltar 'gro ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:406b-7: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor du ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:406b-8: bskal par gnas shing gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe gang du 'dod par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:406b-10: nor sgrub par byed par 'dod na dkar po'i zla
K12D0724_H0711:406b-11: ba nya nas brtsams te mi smra par 'o ma
K12D0724_H0711:406b-12: dang / nas zan za zhing ji snyed phyi ma
K12D0724_H0711:406b-13: zla ba gsum gyi bar du ras ris kyi spyan
K12D0724_H0711:406b-15: de nas ras ris g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:406b-16: yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan g-yo bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:406b-17: nor gyi dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:406b-18: n'i la ta ka la brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags te mdud pa bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:406b-19: gyad g-yul du rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:406b-20: thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te
K12D0724_H0711:406b-21: spyi bor bzhag par byas na g-yul du rgyal bar
K12D0724_H0711:406b-22: 'gyur te gyad kyi dngos grub bo //
K12D0724_H0711:406b-23: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas 'o ma dang
K12D0724_H0711:406b-24: lhan cig zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste brgyad brgyar
K12D0724_H0711:406b-25: mngon par bzlas pa byas nas 'thungs shig /
K12D0724_H0711:407a-1: du nyi ma bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:407a-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas
K12D0724_H0711:407a-3: 'od zer byung ste sgrub pa pos bskor ba byas
K12D0724_H0711:407a-4: nas steng du 'gro ste rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:407a-5: ro // 'dod pa'i gzugs can lo brgya stong phrag gsum du 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:407a-6: nag po'i brgyad pa la mtshan mo gcig smyung bar
K12D0724_H0711:407a-7: gnas pas gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du gi wang bzhag
K12D0724_H0711:407a-8: nas ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par
K12D0724_H0711:407a-9: bya'o // de'i tshe blang bar bya ste blangs pa
K12D0724_H0711:407a-10: tsam la sred med kyi bu'i stobs su 'gyur te
K12D0724_H0711:407a-11: gzhan gyi mtshon cha rnams mthu med par 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:407a-12: bya'o // // gang phreng ba dang ldan pa de gnas pas lo sum brgya 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:407a-13: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung
K12D0724_H0711:407a-14: bar gnas pas ras ris kyi spyan sngar bil ba'i
K12D0724_H0711:407a-15: shing gis me rab tu sbar nas be kangka ta'i
K12D0724_H0711:407a-16: yam shing la tsha ba'i til mar gyis btags pa
K12D0724_H0711:407a-17: stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:407a-19: dkar po'i bcu gsum pa la nyin mtshan du smyung
K12D0724_H0711:407a-20: bar gnas pas sa las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i lha
K12D0724_H0711:407a-21: byas nas de'i khar 'bras thug po che'i stong phrag
K12D0724_H0711:407a-23: nyi ma bdun la gnag bu mo 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:407a-24: nag po'i bcu bzhi la nyin mtshan du smyung bar
K12D0724_H0711:407b-0: gnas pas dur khrod du song @407b ste sa la
K12D0724_H0711:407b-1: ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor
K12D0724_H0711:407b-2: nye bar byug pa byas nas ma nyams pa'i thod
K12D0724_H0711:407b-3: pa blangs te tsandana dmar po'i chus bkrus nas me
K12D0724_H0711:407b-6: me tog gis mngon par mchod cing de nas thod
K12D0724_H0711:407b-7: pa la nye bar 'dug ste gsang sngags bzlas pas
K12D0724_H0711:407b-8: dgug par bya'o // ji srid thod pa g-yo bar gyur pa de srid du'o //
K12D0724_H0711:407b-10: de'i tshe sen mos gang bkug pa de 'ong ste gang brjod pa de byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:407b-11: zhi bar byed par 'dod na ras ris kyi spyan sngar padma stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:407b-13: ras ris kyi spyan sngar m'a la ti'i me tog zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:407b-15: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:407b-17: sngon spyad pa byas pa nag po'i bco lnga pa
K12D0724_H0711:407b-18: la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras
K12D0724_H0711:407b-19: ris bzhugs nas mchod pa chen po byas te gtor
K12D0724_H0711:407b-20: ma rgya chen po dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:407b-21: phyi rol tu 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma
K12D0724_H0711:407b-22: byin te de nas n'a ga ge sar gyi phye
K12D0724_H0711:407b-24: dkyil 'khor bcing ba'ang byas nas ku sha'i khres la
K12D0724_H0711:407b-25: nye bar 'dug ste ji srid du skar mda' ltung
K12D0724_H0711:407b-26: ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:407b-27: slar yang ji srid ras ris 'gul ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:407b-28: dngos grub kyi mtshan ma gzhan rnams kyang 'byung ste
K12D0724_H0711:408a-0: de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' @408a
K12D0724_H0711:408a-1: *// thams cad la phyag byas nas 'phur ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:408a-2: 'dod pa'i gzugs can dpag tshad stong nas mthong bar byed cing thos par byed do /
K12D0724_H0711:408a-3: rig pa 'dzin thams cad kyis gnod pa med do //
K12D0724_H0711:408a-4: sngon spyad pa byas pas nag po'i bcu bzhi la
K12D0724_H0711:408a-5: nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa rgya
K12D0724_H0711:408a-6: chen po byas nas ma nyams pa'i lus blangs te
K12D0724_H0711:408a-8: bdug pas mngon par mchod nas lag pa g-yas pas
K12D0724_H0711:408a-9: byin te ji srid du 'bar ba de srid du
K12D0724_H0711:408a-10: bzlas par bya'o // 'bar ba tsam gyis rig pa
K12D0724_H0711:408a-11: 'dzin pa stong gis yongs su bskor te nam mkha'i
K12D0724_H0711:408a-13: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa /
K12D0724_H0711:408a-15: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med pa'o //
K12D0724_H0711:408a-17: dug 'joms pa la yal 'dab kyis so //
K12D0724_H0711:408a-18: bdag nyid srung ba la bzlas pas so //
K12D0724_H0711:408a-19: dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa nas brtsams te ji srid
K12D0724_H0711:408a-20: bco lnga'i bar du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar gso
K12D0724_H0711:408a-21: sbyong can gyis dag pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas
K12D0724_H0711:408a-22: bzlas par bya'o // gang 'dod pa de thob par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:408a-23: mar la brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags par byas nas 'thungs shig /
K12D0724_H0711:408a-24: nyi ma bdun gyis yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:408b-0: ras ris kyis spyan sngar ma lli ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad sbyin @408b sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:408b-1: mtshan mo bdun la rdzas skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:408b-2: dkar po'i bcu bzhi la mtshan mo gsum du smyung
K12D0724_H0711:408b-3: bar gnas pas au dum b'a ra'i shing gis me
K12D0724_H0711:408b-4: rab tu sbar nas au dum b'a ra'i yam shing
K12D0724_H0711:408b-5: la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang /
K12D0724_H0711:408b-6: mar gyis btags pa'i stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:408b-7: dong tse lnga brgya rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:408b-8: nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la gso sbyong can gyis
K12D0724_H0711:408b-9: mar me stong phrag brgyad sbar nas mar me 'khyil
K12D0724_H0711:408b-10: ba stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:408b-11: phyi nas bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:408b-12: de nas mig thob par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:408b-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam
K12D0724_H0711:408b-14: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du bzhugs nas
K12D0724_H0711:408b-15: stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas te sangs
K12D0724_H0711:408b-16: rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
K12D0724_H0711:408b-17: phyag bya ba byas nas nyi ma gcig la thun
K12D0724_H0711:408b-18: gsum du yongs su bzlas pa lan bcu gnyis su
K12D0724_H0711:408b-19: rgyas dang / bzlas par bya'o // rna ba so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:408b-20: nad la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ting
K12D0724_H0711:408b-21: nge 'dzin nges par skyes pa'i cho gas ras sam
K12D0724_H0711:408b-22: / 'bras bu can la kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:408b-23: de'i spyan sngar mchod pa chen po byas nas stong phrag brgyar bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:408b-24: ku sha'i stan la 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:408b-25: nas zan za zhing dus gsum du khrus byed cing
K12D0724_H0711:408b-26: gtsang ma bgos pas yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i gso
K12D0724_H0711:409a-0: sbyong @409a *// bya'o // de nas nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:409a-1: sngon spyad pa byas pa'i 'o ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:409a-4: nas zan za bas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing
K12D0724_H0711:409a-5: gso sbyong can gyis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod
K12D0724_H0711:409a-6: rten du ras ris bzhugs nas mar me brgyad so
K12D0724_H0711:409a-7: sor sbar te padma stong gis mchod par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:409a-8: nag po'i phyogs la bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:409a-9: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:409a-10: zla ba nya la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar
K12D0724_H0711:409a-11: gnas pas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te mtshan
K12D0724_H0711:409a-12: thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:409a-13: gal te rgyal por 'gyur na sgrub pa po'i khang
K12D0724_H0711:409a-14: pa 'bar bar byed cing me tog gi chun bu
K12D0724_H0711:409a-15: g-yo bar byed na dkyil 'khor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur
K12D0724_H0711:409a-16: ro // ras ris kyi spyan sngar tsandana dkar pos dkyil 'khro byas nas dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:409a-17: me tog dang; bdug pa la sogs pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:409a-18: gtor ma'ang phul nas me tog gi ge sar brgya
K12D0724_H0711:409a-19: phrag gsum blangs te brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags par
K12D0724_H0711:409a-20: byas nas mar gyi mar me gsum sbar te au
K12D0724_H0711:409a-21: dum b'a ra'i yam shing gis mer rab tu sbar
K12D0724_H0711:409a-22: nas me tog re re la brgyad brgyar mngon par
K12D0724_H0711:409a-23: sngags par byas nas mar gyis byugs te sbyin sreg
K12D0724_H0711:409b-0: bya'o // gang 'dod pa @409b de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:409b-1: mtshan mo bdun du dus gsum du yongs su bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:409b-2: par byed na de'i mtshams med pa lnga bsrabs par
K12D0724_H0711:409b-3: 'gyur ro // nyi ma so sor brgyad brgyar zlos
K12D0724_H0711:409b-4: par byed na sdig pa rnams bsrabs par 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:409b-5: 'gyur ro // // rtag tu bzlas pas gang 'dod pa'i grong de so sor rnyed pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:409b-6: mig gis gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:409b-7: rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:409b-10: m'a sha'i sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:409b-12: ba ta'i myu gu zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:409b-14: mar gyi btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:409b-15: dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:409b-16: ras ris kyi spyan sngar klu shing gi me tog
K12D0724_H0711:409b-17: stong phrag brgyad kyis mi bdag dbang du 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:409b-18: // de nas yang sh'akya thub pas slar yang thams
K12D0724_H0711:409b-19: cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la kun
K12D0724_H0711:409b-20: tu gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
K12D0724_H0711:409b-21: dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
K12D0724_H0711:409b-23: khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u mtha' dag rnam
K12D0724_H0711:409b-24: par bkod pa'i khyad par gyi tshogs sbyin sreg gi
K12D0724_H0711:409b-25: las rab tu sbyar bas rig pa sgrub pa po'i
K12D0724_H0711:409b-26: me la rab tu spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho
K12D0724_H0711:409b-27: ga dang / gang du rab tu gnas pas rig
K12D0724_H0711:409b-28: pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can
K12D0724_H0711:409b-29: gyis rab tu sbyar bar bya ba yod de /
K12D0724_H0711:410a-1: rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa /
K12D0724_H0711:410a-3: aom tishtha ha ri sirga la lo hi taksha de hi /
K12D0724_H0711:410a-6: 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi me'i snying po ste las thams cad byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:410a-7: 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa bdag nyid dgongs so //
K12D0724_H0711:410a-8: sgrub pa pos 'dis me la sbyin sreg bya ste
K12D0724_H0711:410a-9: lan gcig bzlas pa'i sreg blugs gsum me la sbyin
K12D0724_H0711:410a-10: sreg bya'o // me spyan drangs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:410a-11: de bzhin du zhi bcan dang /
K12D0724_H0711:410a-13: drag po'i las rnams rab tu sbyar ba la yam shing gi shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
K12D0724_H0711:410a-14: zhi ba'i don du mya ngan med pa'i shing rlan
K12D0724_H0711:410a-15: dang bcas pas khyad par du byas pa mtho gang
K12D0724_H0711:410a-17: sor gsum pa'ang sgrub pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:410a-18: 'jam zhing mnyen pa rab tu sngags pa ni cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:410a-19: bug pa med cing khong stong yang ma yin pa /
K12D0724_H0711:410a-20: ne tso'i gshog pa 'dra ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:410a-21: de bzhin du ljang gu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:410a-23: kha dog nag po'ang sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:410a-24: srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spangs nas bug pa
K12D0724_H0711:410a-25: med pa'ang kun tu 'jog pas kha dog gzhan mchog
K12D0724_H0711:410a-26: dang / tha ma nyid kyang spangs nas skam po
K12D0724_H0711:410a-27: de rnams kyang spangs pa bsregs par kun tu spyod
K12D0724_H0711:410a-28: dang / do // ma rul cing mi 'khyog pa nyid dang /
K12D0724_H0711:410a-30: de nas me thab kun nas gru bzhi pa byas
K12D0724_H0711:410b-0: @410b nas 'og nyid du bskor bar bya ste gzhu
K12D0724_H0711:410b-1: gang dang / khru gang gi tshad las khru gsum mam /
K12D0724_H0711:410b-3: khru bzhi ste de bzhin kho nar srog chags rnams
K12D0724_H0711:410b-4: spangs pa rtag tu bye ma sngags te de la
K12D0724_H0711:410b-6: de nas kha khyer kun nas dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa gru bzhi pa'ang 'bad pas so //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-7: ras ris kyi spyan sngar zhi ba can dang /
K12D0724_H0711:410b-8: rgyas pa can yang rung ste 'di rnams yang dag par rab tu bsgrags /
K12D0724_H0711:410b-9: mngon spyod du ni bshad pa la //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-10: dbus su rdo rje bya ba ni //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-11: rtse mo gnyis ka rtse gsum pa //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-12: gzhan yang me thab khru gnyis pa //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-13: thad kar yang ni bdun pa'o; ;de bzhin gtsang ma'i phyogs rgyab tu //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-14: chu klung dogs kyi phyogs gcig gam //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-15: brtan pa'i phyogs sam dur khrod dam //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-16: khang stong spyin sreg legs brtsam bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-17: de bzhin kho nar ri rtse yang //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-18: lha yi khang pa stong pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-19: rtag tu dgon pa chen po dang //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-20: de bzhin du yang gsum rnams ni //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-21: sgrub po'i phyogs su gsungs pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-22: gang zag mchog gi gnas de rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-23: gsungs pa'i sbyin sreg las kun las //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-24: ku sha'i khres la nyer 'dug pas //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-25: gnas nas khru yi tshad las ni //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-26: sbyin sreg las rnams khyad par du //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-27: der ni gsang sngags shes pas bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-28: dngos grub myur ba kho nar gnas //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-29: nyid du gnas par the tshom med //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-30: shar du bltas dang byang du bltas //
K12D0724_H0711:410b-31: zhi dang rgyas pa can la bya //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-1: ru ste; ;de nas sngags pas rnam par spang //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-3: rgyas pa la yang byang bltas pa //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-4: 'di rnams sngags pas dus lhan cig rig pa bzlas pas yang dag rtsam //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-6: n+ya gro dha yis rgyas las bya //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-7: mngon spyod can la shing rnams ni //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-8: dkar dang tsha ba skyur dang rno //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-9: de rnams thams cad spang bya ste //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-10: thub pa rnams kyis bkag pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-11: rtag tu zhi dang rgyas las la //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-12: brlan bcas shing ni rab tu bsngags //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-13: de bzhin skam po drag las so //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-14: thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu spangs //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-15: de rnams med pa'i yam shing gis //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-16: shing de rnams su brtag par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-17: ljang dang snum pa 'dra ba dang //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-18: rma bya'i mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-19: de bzhin ku sha'i rnam pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-20: zhi dang rgyas pa rtag tu bya //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-22: de bzhin dkar po'i rtsa rnams kyis //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-23: sdig pa'i las rnams rtag tu bya //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-24: rgyal ba mchog gis bkag pa yin //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-25: 'dir ni dri med chu la yang //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-26: dag pa srin bu spangs pa las //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-27: rtag tu de nas mngon par bkru //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-28: kun nas bskor ba bya ba yang //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-29: rang snang phyi rol brtson pa 'am //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-30: cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-31: gtsang mas rtsva yis sgron ma'i tshad la bya ba'o //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-32: de nas khu tshur tshad byas na //
K12D0724_H0711:411a-33: 'bad pas me ni sbar bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-0: kha yi rlung gis @411b phu mi bya //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-1: de bzhin gos kyi mtha' yis dang //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-2: gos kyi chun po'am sham thabs dang //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-3: sgrib g-yogs dag ni spangs pa yis //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-4: nam mkha'i nor dang tha dad rlung //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-5: nye bar bcom dang mngon dga' ba'am //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-6: gtsang ma nyams pa bral bas dang //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-7: de bzhin gos dang nor bus kyang //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-8: rlung yab bya'o rlung bzang pos //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-9: me ni yang dag brtsam par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-10: de las gyur pa'i rlung 'di yis //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-11: sngags shes me ni sbar bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-12: shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyin sreg don //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-13: bud med mchog gzhan brtag pa dag /
K12D0724_H0711:411b-14: byas nas yang ni mtha' ru ni //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-15: ba yi mar gyi sreg blugs gsum //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-16: der ni sbyin bya de las ni //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-17: gang yang tshad du bya ba'o //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-18: sangs rgyas skyobs pa thams cad dang //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-19: rang rang sngags kyi mgon po la //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-20: de nas ji bzhin 'dod phyag bya //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-21: de tshe me la sbyin sreg bya //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-22: gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas pa yis //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-23: rtag tu me ni spyan drang ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-24: bdag nyid rtsom pa'i dri zhim po'i //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-25: me tog kho nas rtag tu 'bod //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-26: sngags pa gnas la mkhas pa yis //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-27: gdan ni gnas la phul ba pa //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-28: gsang sngags des so gzhan du min //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-29: zho ldan mar dang bsres pa la //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-30: sbrang rtsi btags pa'i yam shing gsum //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-31: rgyas don me la sbyin sreg bya //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-32: sngags kyi las kyis thams cad du //
K12D0724_H0711:411b-34: zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-2: sbyin bya gzugs mthun sngags rnams kyis //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-3: mngon spyod can du gnas pa la //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-4: gzhan gyi gzugs su blta bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-5: dri ma med pa'i lha rnams ni //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-6: rim pa bzhin du me thab tu //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-7: ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dri //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-8: bdun du yongs su bzlas pa yis //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-9: mngon par bos pa de yi tshe //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-10: 'byung gnas nges par gzhag pa rnams //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-11: ji ltar gnyis kar gnas de bzhin //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-12: yam shing rdzas dang bsres pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-13: mar dang sbrang rtsi yang dag ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-14: de bzhin kho nas zho bsres pas; ;bya'o stong ngam 'bum tshad dam //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-15: yang na brgya rtsa brgyad rtag bya //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-16: sngags ni blangs nas de bzhin du //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-17: rig pa lan gcig bzlas pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-18: mig dang gtsug phud 'bar ba yi //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-19: phreng ba'i me la me lce gcig /
K12D0724_H0711:412a-20: de bzhin nyid du zhi ba'i las //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-21: sbyin sreg nges par bya ba yang //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-22: rgyas pa can la de dang dbang //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-23: drag po'i las ni smad pa ste; ;rgyal bas spangs so sbyin sreg las //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-24: rab sbyor me ni bsngags par 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-25: sgra gcan brgyad cu'i stobs dang ldan //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-26: rgyal ba mchog gis rab tu bsngags //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-27: der ni gsang sngags rtag sgrub byed //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-28: dkar ba'i me la sbyin sreg bya //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-29: gal te kha dog dmar de bzhin //
K12D0724_H0711:412a-30: rtag tu rgyas pa'i dngos grung 'dod //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-0: nag po dud ka ser @412b skya la'ang //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-1: g-yon pa can zhes bya ba nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-2: kha dog rnams gsum rab 'jug pa //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-3: dngos grub rnam pa gsum yin no //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-4: sngags pa las gzhan kha dog gang //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-5: rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-6: de la sngags kyis dngos grub med //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-7: slar yang lag pa'i mthil 'dir ni //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-8: rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-9: kha dog gsal ba de 'dra yod //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-10: me ni 'bar ba mthong nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-11: slar yang las rnams brtsam par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-12: spyan drangs byas la gzugs kha dog /
K12D0724_H0711:412b-13: gal te sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-14: slar yang sbyin sreg rab 'jug pa //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-15: ras kyi cho ga mthong ba yis //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-16: spyan drang gshegs su gsol ba nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-17: me la sngags ni brjod par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-18: sngar ni rab tu btags pas kyang //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-20: mchog de nyid kyis de gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:412b-21: sbyin sreg 'di la spyan drang dang //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-22: gshegs su gsol ba'i las can gyis //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-23: las rnams de nyid kyis bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-24: der ni me yi spyod pa'i las; ;de bzhin gzugs dang ras ris kyi //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-25: spyan sngar brtsams nas 'grub par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-26: de la sngags ni sngar brjod pa //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bas bsngags //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-28: las rnams kun nas der bya 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-29: gzhan pa'i las rnams mi bya ste //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-30: khyad par sdig pa can gyi las //
K12D0724_H0711:412b-31: rgyal ba mchog gis smad pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-2: 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du langs //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-3: de nas byang sems sa yi bdag /
K12D0724_H0711:413a-4: de bzhin mngon shes lnga thob pa //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-5: de nas lha nyid 'grub par byed /
K12D0724_H0711:413a-6: 'dir ni rtag tu sbyor shes pa //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-7: ras ris sbyin sreg las la mkhas //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-8: sa 'og bdag po nyid dang ni //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-9: bar snang la ni spyod par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-10: de nas sa bla'i lha dang ni //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-11: gnod sbyin nyid dam gnod sbyin mo //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-12: 'gugs par byed cing rtag tu yang //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-13: rgyal srid kyi ni bdag po nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-15: yang na rig dang rig 'dzin nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-16: lha min nyid dang sems can kun //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-18: sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-19: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che; ;sems chen sa bcur gnas bcas pa //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-20: sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs par byed //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-21: sa stengs mi rnams smos ci dgos //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-22: lhag ma'i bdag po nyid de bzhin //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-23: khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-24: 'byung po kun la yang dag nges //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-25: mi bdag nyid dang de bzhin yang //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-26: dbang gi don du sems can kun //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-27: mi bdag des sam mi des ni //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-28: sa stengs thams cad mnyam pa yis //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-29: las rnams de bzhin kun nas ni //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-30: rtag tu sbyin sreg gis bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:413a-31: nges par las kun yang dag brten //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-0: bdag @413b nyid brtsams pas lhan cig sgrub //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-1: dpal gyi don du de yi las //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-2: mchog dang bar ma nyid dang yang //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-3: yang na chung du nyid bsgrub bya //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-4: de nyid du ni rdzas kun gyi //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-5: dngos grub brjod pa'i don du slar //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-6: lhan cig dngos grub blta bar bya //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-7: sbyin sreg las la legs 'jug pa //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-8: las rnams kun la phyag rgya bcing //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-9: bdag srung mar dang ldan pa yi //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-10: sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug byed //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-11: de nas ras ris gsang sngags 'di //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-12: bdun bzlas pa 'am brgyad bzlas pa //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-13: rtag tu las 'dis spyod lam bya //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-14: na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'an /
K12D0724_H0711:413b-15: aa pra ti ha ta ga ti satr'a n'an /
K12D0724_H0711:413b-18: ru ru bi shva sambha be sv'ah'a /
K12D0724_H0711:413b-19: shing la sbyor ba 'dis bzlas te //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-20: slar yang gnyis sam bdun bzlas pas //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-21: sngags rig me la sbyin sreg gyis //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-22: me tog bdug pa dri yang rung //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-23: kun nas thams cad nyid la ni //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-24: lan bdun bzlas pa 'di nyid kyis //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-25: khyod kyis rab tu brjod par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-26: las rnams thams cad rtsom byed pa //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-27: cho ga rgyu yi snga ma yis //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-28: rab sbyor nyid kyis bya ba 'o //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-29: las rnams kun la sngar bcings pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-30: phyag rgya chen mo grags ldan ma //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-31: de bzhin bsrungs pa byas gyur nas //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-32: dngos grub rgyu la mkhas pa yis //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-33: las rnams thams cad rtsom par byos //
K12D0724_H0711:413b-34: gal te nus pa mthong ba na //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-0: @414a *// dge ba'i sgra rnams nyid dang ni //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-1: rtag tu 'bras can sa de yi //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-2: gsang sngags ji ltar 'dod bzhin du //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-4: dang po las kyi rab sbyor ba //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-5: gsang sngags rgyu yis rab bzhugs pa //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-6: 'bras bur bcas pa kho na yis //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-7: dngos grub de rnams bsgrub par bya //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-8: rgyal ba'i sgra dang sa ta ha //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-9: rnga bo che yi dngos grub nges //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-10: thams cad du ni smad par brjod //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-11: sbyin sreg la ni gnas bcas pa //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-12: gzhan yang dge mtshan mchog dang ni //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-13: 'dab chags can nam dge ba'i sgra //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-14: rnam pa sna tshogs nges sgrogs pa'i //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-15: sgra yang rung ste rgyal bas bsngags //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-16: rab bsngags dus bcas lha rnams dang //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-17: yid 'ong rnam pa sna tshogs sgra //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-18: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-19: btsun mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-20: de bzhin bum pa gang ba dang //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-21: mchod yon mthong na dngos grub rgyu //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-23: rab bsngags 'jig rten gyis mchod pa'i; ;dge slong dang ni dge slong ma //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-24: de rnams mthong na gsang sngags kyi //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-25: sna tshogs spyod yul dngos grub bo //
K12D0724_H0711:414a-27: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg
K12D0724_H0711:414a-28: pa chen po'i mdo sde ral pa gyen brdzes kyi
K12D0724_H0711:414a-29: rtog pa las / bgrang phreng srad bu'i cho ga'i
K12D0724_H0711:414a-30: le'u rab 'byams bcu gcig pa yongs su rdzogs so
K12D0724_H0711:414b-0: rtog pa las / //// de nas ras ris @414b
K12D0724_H0711:414b-1: kyi spyan sngar klu shing gi me tog stong phrag
K12D0724_H0711:414b-2: brgyad kyis mi'i bdag po dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:414b-3: nad thams cad las rkang shu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:414b-4: gdug pa'i rma rnams la sa'i gong bu la lan
K12D0724_H0711:414b-5: bdun mngon par sngags pa byin na nye bar zhi
K12D0724_H0711:414b-6: bar 'gyur ro // sngon spyad pa byas pas ba
K12D0724_H0711:414b-7: byung lngas lus sbyang ba byas nas dus gsum du
K12D0724_H0711:414b-8: khrus byas te 'o ma btung bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:414b-9: rtsa ba'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:414b-10: phyi nas nag po'i brgyad pa la ras ris kyi
K12D0724_H0711:414b-11: spyan sngar ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:414b-12: ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste bil ba'i
K12D0724_H0711:414b-13: yam shing la mar dang; zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:414b-14: sbrang rtsi btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:414b-15: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi spyi bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:414b-16: des sgrub pa po la bskor ba byas nas bcom
K12D0724_H0711:414b-17: ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du mi snang
K12D0724_H0711:414b-18: bar 'gyur ro // de nas 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0724_H0711:414b-19: gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste mchog gsum po rnams gang
K12D0724_H0711:414b-21: rig pa 'dzin pa nyid kyi rgyal srid dang /
K12D0724_H0711:414b-22: khyod ji 'dra ba'i bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba nga'o zhes so //
K12D0724_H0711:414b-23: dngos grub 'di ni bla ma mchod pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:414b-24: snying rjes sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas sbyin pa nyid kyis sgrub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:414b-25: nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas ras ris kyi
K12D0724_H0711:414b-26: spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas aarga'i
K12D0724_H0711:415a-0: yam @415a *// shing gi stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:415a-1: gang 'dod pa de skad cig nyid la 'gugs par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:415a-4: n'a ga ge sar rnams cha mnyam pa phye mar
K12D0724_H0711:415a-5: byas te kham phor kha sbyar du byas nas stong
K12D0724_H0711:415a-6: phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags pas lus la byugs
K12D0724_H0711:415a-7: te g-yul du zhugs na gzhan gyis mi thub par
K12D0724_H0711:415a-8: 'gyur ro // spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan
K12D0724_H0711:415a-9: sngar 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas rig
K12D0724_H0711:415a-13: ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bdun zlos shig /
K12D0724_H0711:415a-15: nad kyis btab pa la ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bco lnga zlos shig /
K12D0724_H0711:415a-17: sngon spyad pa byas pas 'bum phrag bcu gnyis zlos shig /
K12D0724_H0711:415a-19: bcud kyis len so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:415a-20: de bros pas gnyer ma dang /
K12D0724_H0711:415a-22: lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:415a-23: 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas yungs kar rgyal po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:415a-24: rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:415a-25: mtshan mo bdun gyis 'di la nor rab tu sbyin
K12D0724_H0711:415a-26: te 'dod pa nye bar bzhag pa ni ma gtogs
K12D0724_H0711:415b-0: so // @415b ras ris kyi spyan sngar aarga'i yam shing 'bum sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:415b-1: gser srang brgya so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:415b-2: 'bras yos stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:415b-3: bgegs med par 'gyur ro; ;bi n+y'a ka'i shing stong sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:415b-4: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:415b-6: rked pa'i nad med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:415b-7: rims kyis btab pa la ku shas phyag par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:415b-8: pu mos bkal ba'i srad bu la stong phrag brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas bcing bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:415b-10: dong ka'i me tog stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:415b-11: gos bye ba bcu gnyis so sor rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:415b-12: rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i srang shin tu mdzes
K12D0724_H0711:415b-13: pa la 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu pa byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:415b-14: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris
K12D0724_H0711:415b-15: bzhugs nas nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas mchod
K12D0724_H0711:415b-16: pa rgya chen po byas te 'khor lo blangs nas
K12D0724_H0711:415b-17: ji srid du mtshan ma byung ba de srid du
K12D0724_H0711:415b-18: bzlas par bya'o // gang gi che me stag 'phro bar byed pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:415b-19: ji srid 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:415b-20: de nas grub par 'gyur te rig pa 'dzin pa
K12D0724_H0711:415b-21: thams cad 'du bar byed cing 'khor dang bcas pa
K12D0724_H0711:415b-23: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po dang /
K12D0724_H0711:415b-24: bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:415b-25: thogs pa med par 'gro bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:415b-26: snga bar langs nas lor bzlas par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:416a-2: zla ba drug tu lan gcig brjod pas nad chen po grol lo //
K12D0724_H0711:416a-3: zla ba gcig tu zlos shig /
K12D0724_H0711:416a-4: dus ma yin par gu gul gyi bdug pas mche ba'i dug 'bebs par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:416a-8: nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa rnams su'o //
K12D0724_H0711:416a-9: bud med dbang du byed pa la ras ris kyi
K12D0724_H0711:416a-10: spyan sngar l'a pan la sbrang rtsi btags pa mtshan
K12D0724_H0711:416a-11: mo bdun du thun gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu
K12D0724_H0711:416a-12: rtsa gcig gyis shig dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:416a-13: 'di ni yugs sa mos skyes bu yi'o //
K12D0724_H0711:416a-14: rgyal po ni ras ris kyi spyan sngar aarga'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:416a-16: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:416a-18: rgyal po'i blon po la sogs pa la mtshan mo
K12D0724_H0711:416a-19: thun gsum du lan tshva nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin
K12D0724_H0711:416a-20: sreg gyis shig / dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:416a-21: mgo bo la lan gsum mam /
K12D0724_H0711:416a-22: bdun du mngon par sngags nas rgyal po'i sgor 'jug
K12D0724_H0711:416a-23: par byed na rgyal po'i gnang chen por 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:416a-24: // brgyad brgyar mngon par sngags pa'i rma bya'i mdongs kyis phyag par byas na dug 'joms so //
K12D0724_H0711:416a-25: ldong ros aa shvattha'i 'dab ma'i nang du btums par
K12D0724_H0711:416a-26: byas nas stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags pas
K12D0724_H0711:416a-27: yang dag par brtsams par bya ste skal ba bzang
K12D0724_H0711:416b-0: por 'gyur ro // @416b ras ris kyi spyan sngar
K12D0724_H0711:416b-1: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te 'o ma dang
K12D0724_H0711:416b-2: por 'gyur ro // / nas zan za zhing dus
K12D0724_H0711:416b-3: gsum du khrus byas nas gos lan gsum brjes te
K12D0724_H0711:416b-6: tsandan rnams bsregs shing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:416b-7: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma chu las skyes pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:416b-8: thang las skyes pa'i dri zhim po'i me tog dang /
K12D0724_H0711:416b-9: ba'i mar gyis mar me gsum mo //
K12D0724_H0711:416b-10: mthar mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:416b-11: gang don du gnyer ba de rnyed do //
K12D0724_H0711:416b-12: thun mtshams su bza' ba'ang ji ltar nus pa sbyin no //
K12D0724_H0711:416b-13: ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras ris
K12D0724_H0711:416b-14: bzhugs nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas
K12D0724_H0711:416b-15: aa shvattha'i yam shing la zho dang /
K12D0724_H0711:416b-17: mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig /
K12D0724_H0711:416b-18: de nas ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:416b-20: mar me'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:416b-21: phreng ba g-yo bar byed pa ste mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:416b-22: rna ba'i mig sman aa shvattha'i 'dab ma'i nang du
K12D0724_H0711:416b-23: btums te stong phrag rdzogs pa'i sreg blugs byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:416b-24: skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste ji srid
K12D0724_H0711:416b-25: grub pa rnam pa gsum du gyur pa de srid
K12D0724_H0711:416b-27: 'bras bu can la gang 'dod pa'i rdzas de'i ming
K12D0724_H0711:416b-28: bris te stong phrag brgyad du mngon par sngags pa
K12D0724_H0711:417a-1: klu gnas pa'i mtsho phran der dor bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:417a-2: de'i klu des las thams cad rdzogs par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:417a-3: nyi ma bdun gyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gos sbyin
K12D0724_H0711:417a-4: par byed do; ;'bras bu can la mngon par 'dod
K12D0724_H0711:417a-5: pa'i rdzas mngon bar bris nas de bzhin du khron
K12D0724_H0711:417a-6: pa'am / mtsho phran du gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:417a-7: de nas skyes bu chur byi 'dzul byed du gzhug go /
K12D0724_H0711:417a-8: der yang sgra chen po skyes bus thos te phyogs
K12D0724_H0711:417a-9: che ge mo na rdzas la sogs pa gnas so
K12D0724_H0711:417a-10: // de nas blangs par bya ste chu klung gi mtha' sgrol bar byed pa /
K12D0724_H0711:417a-11: bgrod dka' ba can gyi mdun sa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:417a-12: rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang rung ste lha rnams dran
K12D0724_H0711:417a-13: par byas te gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro
K12D0724_H0711:417a-14: // gang du 'dod pa dbang du bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:417a-15: de 'phags pa'i zhal du'ang bcug nas cung zad yang dag par gsungs par mdzod cig /
K12D0724_H0711:417a-16: ring por mi thogs par dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:417a-17: chu snod du byas nas de la 'phags pa spyan
K12D0724_H0711:417a-18: ras gzigs dbang phyug bsam te stong phrag brgyad du
K12D0724_H0711:417a-19: mngon par sngags pa'i chu des mche ba can la
K12D0724_H0711:417a-20: gtong bar bya'o // dug med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:417a-21: de la brjod pa'i tshogs dkyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa ni don med par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:417a-22: sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung blangs nas ts'a
K12D0724_H0711:417a-23: ru bza' zhing mi smra bar dkyil 'khor byas nas
K12D0724_H0711:417a-24: zla ba nya nas brtsams te ji srid gsum pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:417b-0: bar @417b de srid du bzlas par bya ste 'bum
K12D0724_H0711:417b-1: bzlas so // zla ba drug tu tshangs par spyod pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:417b-2: brtul zhugs 'di nyid spyad cing zla bas dngos grub dang /
K12D0724_H0711:417b-3: zla ba drug gis 'gro ba mtha' dag mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:417b-4: lus kyis kyang mchog gi dngos grub thob par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:417b-5: zla bas sngags thams cad grub par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:417b-6: gang 'dod pa'i klu'i rgyal po mngon par bris nas
K12D0724_H0711:417b-7: de'i steng du rkang pa g-yon pa bzhag ste g-yogs
K12D0724_H0711:417b-8: pa'i phyogs su 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:417b-9: klu'i rgyal po de 'ong ste de ci bgyi zhes smra bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:417b-10: klu thams cad kyi gnas su rab tu 'jug par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:417b-11: der rab tu 'jug par byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:417b-12: de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po bris nas sgrub par byed na bka' bsgo ba byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:417b-13: thams cad 'dzin pa'i gtsang ma'i gnas nas rdul chung
K12D0724_H0711:417b-14: du blangs te sbrul gyi steng du yongs su thor
K12D0724_H0711:417b-15: cig / sbrul bzlog pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:417b-16: slar yang gal te grol bar 'dod pa brjod par
K12D0724_H0711:417b-17: bya ste gos dkar po'i kha dog can la sa
K12D0724_H0711:417b-18: las byung ba'i phyag rgya byas nas stong phrag brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:417b-19: mngon par sngags te mche ba'i steng du 'jog tu
K12D0724_H0711:417b-20: bcug nas khug cig shi'ang slong bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:417b-21: ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams dang /
K12D0724_H0711:418a-0: bhu shunda la sogs pa rnams ba byung lngas sbyangs nas stong phrag rdzogs @418a *//
K12D0724_H0711:418a-1: pa'i sreg blugs bya ste rdzas gang yang rung ba
K12D0724_H0711:418a-2: blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar cho ga sngon
K12D0724_H0711:418a-3: du 'gro bas 'bum phrag lngar zlos shig /
K12D0724_H0711:418a-4: phyis nas ji ltar byas pa'i rin gyis ldong ros
K12D0724_H0711:418a-5: blangs nas byang chub shing gi yam shing gis me
K12D0724_H0711:418a-6: sbar te ji srid me'i mdog tu gyur pa de
K12D0724_H0711:418a-8: de nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba las byung ba'i 'o
K12D0724_H0711:418a-9: ma bu mos bsrubs pas mar du byas nas thal
K12D0724_H0711:418a-10: ba mar la gdab par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:418a-11: de bzhin du zhos bkang ba'i snod sbrang rtsis bkang ba la'ang ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:418a-12: de nas blangs te gur gum gyi za ma tog
K12D0724_H0711:418a-13: tu bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid kyis
K12D0724_H0711:418a-14: bdag nyid srung ba byas te zla ba gzas bzung
K12D0724_H0711:418a-15: ba na mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas
K12D0724_H0711:418a-16: ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te
K12D0724_H0711:418a-17: aa shvattha'i 'dab ma gsum gyis kun tu dkris nas
K12D0724_H0711:418a-19: ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste lag pa g-yas pas mnan nas ji srid dro ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:418a-21: 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:418a-22: dro bzhin pa la thig le byas nas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:418a-23: du bas mi snang ba'o; ;'bar bas nam mkha' la 'gro'o //
K12D0724_H0711:418a-24: lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:418a-25: sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
K12D0724_H0711:418b-0: de bzhin du mig sman pa bla sgrub par byed @418b pa dang /
K12D0724_H0711:418b-2: dkar po'i bco lnga la padma'i 'dab mar bzhag ste
K12D0724_H0711:418b-3: ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas lag
K12D0724_H0711:418b-4: pa kha sbyor gyis blangs te ji srid dro ba
K12D0724_H0711:418b-6: 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:418b-7: 'di nyid la dngos grub rnam pa gsum mo //
K12D0724_H0711:418b-8: ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'bum phrag bcur zlos shig /
K12D0724_H0711:418b-9: de nas bzo bo dbang po mtshal ba min pa
K12D0724_H0711:418b-10: gso sbyong can gyis lcags gsum gyis padma 'dab ma
K12D0724_H0711:418b-11: bcu pa'am / brgyad pa gdan dang /
K12D0724_H0711:418b-12: rgyan gyis brgyan pa byas nas gur gum dang /
K12D0724_H0711:418b-14: ga bur rnams nam mkha'i chus btags pa padmar bcug
K12D0724_H0711:418b-15: cing dkar po'i brgyad pa la ras ris la mchod
K12D0724_H0711:418b-16: pa chen po byas nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung
K12D0724_H0711:418b-17: bar gnas pas skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste sdig
K12D0724_H0711:418b-19: gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas nas lag
K12D0724_H0711:418b-20: pa g-yas pas padma blangs nas ji srid du 'bar
K12D0724_H0711:418b-21: ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:418b-22: de nas padma des 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:418b-23: sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
K12D0724_H0711:418b-24: lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:418b-25: de bzhin du gdu bu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:418b-27: lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dang /
K12D0724_H0711:418b-30: 'di ni 'khor lo'i khyad par te lcags lnga pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:418b-31: 'khor lo byas nas so rnon po 'khor lo mtshan
K12D0724_H0711:419a-2: gang+g'a'i 'gram gnyis kyi sa blangs nas ras ris kyi spyan sngar gong bur bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:419a-3: de la 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas tsandan dmar
K12D0724_H0711:419a-4: pos mchod de ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dmar
K12D0724_H0711:419a-5: po dang / phreng ba phul nas dkar po'i brgyad
K12D0724_H0711:419a-6: pa la gso sbyong can gyis smyung bar gnas pas
K12D0724_H0711:419a-7: slong mos dge 'dun la ston mo byas te dngos
K12D0724_H0711:419a-9: gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos pas snying rje'i sems kyis rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:419a-10: ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas dri dang /
K12D0724_H0711:419a-12: bdug pa la sogs pa rnams phul nas ji ltar
K12D0724_H0711:419a-13: nye bar 'byor pa'i mar me phul nas 'khor lo'i
K12D0724_H0711:419a-14: phyogs bzhi ru'ang mar me bzhi dang /
K12D0724_H0711:419a-15: gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o; ;ku sha'i
K12D0724_H0711:419a-16: khres la nye bar 'dug ste tsandan dmar pos btags
K12D0724_H0711:419a-17: pa rnams la lan re bzlas te re res bsnun
K12D0724_H0711:419a-18: par bya'o // ji srid stong phrag brgyad kyi bar du'o //
K12D0724_H0711:419a-22: gnyis pa la 'khor lo nges par 'gro ste de nas sgrub pa pos sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0724_H0711:419a-23: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas rig pa zlos shig /
K12D0724_H0711:419a-25: blangs pa tsam gyis 'khor dang bcas pa rig pa
K12D0724_H0711:419a-26: 'dzin par 'gyur te dpag tshad stong phrag bcur rig
K12D0724_H0711:419b-0: pa @419b 'dzin pa chen po klu dang /
K12D0724_H0711:419b-1: gnod sbyin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi
K12D0724_H0711:419b-2: mang du 'dod par 'gyur te lo stong phrag lnga
K12D0724_H0711:419b-4: shi na'ang bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:419b-5: nas ril bu sgrub par 'dod na se le ta ka dang /
K12D0724_H0711:419b-9: t'a ra bar ta ka'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0724_H0711:419b-17: tu ru shka rnams gcig tu byas nas phye ma zhib mor byed du gzhug go /
K12D0724_H0711:419b-18: de nas ser skyar rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i 'o ma
K12D0724_H0711:419b-19: blangs nas bu mos bsrubs pa'i mar gyis gcig tu
K12D0724_H0711:419b-20: byas nas phye ma des rgya shug gi tshig gu
K12D0724_H0711:419b-21: tsam gyi ril bu byed du gzhug go /
K12D0724_H0711:419b-22: de nas dkar po'i brgyad pa'am /
K12D0724_H0711:419b-23: dkar po'i bcu bzhi pa la nyin mtshan du smyung
K12D0724_H0711:419b-24: bar gnas pas yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong can
K12D0724_H0711:419b-25: gyis ril bu lnga tsam blangs te aa shvatth'i 'dab
K12D0724_H0711:419b-26: ma'i nang du btums pa byas nas ras ris kyis
K12D0724_H0711:419b-29: phye ma la sogs pa gzhan la sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0724_H0711:419b-30: ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste mchod pa'i
K12D0724_H0711:419b-31: cho ga byas pas lag pa g-yas pas mnan te
K12D0724_H0711:419b-32: ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas
K12D0724_H0711:419b-33: par bya'o // yang dag par bgos te khar bcug pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:420a-1: pa rnams thams cad 'thon nas mthong ngo //
K12D0724_H0711:420a-2: lo brgya phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0724_H0711:420a-3: de nas 'bar byed nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:420a-5: 'di'ang bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa'i las sgrub pa'i thabs su 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:420a-7: bdun pa'i sgrub pa la mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0724_H0711:420a-8: rtsa ba'i snying pos kyang las 'di rnams 'grub par
K12D0724_H0711:420a-9: byed pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtog par
K12D0724_H0711:420a-10: byed do // bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog
